0VP.SG.summary: Vichitbhan Palmoil Public Company Limited produces and distributes crude palm oil and kernel products in Thailand. It offers crude palm oil for palm oil refineries in to be used in the food business, such as the production of biscuits, creamer, and ice cream, as well as for shampoo manufacturing industry and used in the production of fatty acid and methyl ester. The company also provides palm kernel oils and fats, used as ingredients in the production of margarine, bread, cosmetics, and health supplements; raw materials for oleo chemicals industry; and ingredient in animal food. In addition, it offers by products, such as shells, empty bunches, decanter cakes, and palm fiber products. Further, the company is also involved in energy production by using waste water of the palm oil and biogas-powered fuel. Vichitbhan Palmoil Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

1949.HK.summary: Platt Nera International Limited provides IT integrated solutions and support services to financial institutions, government departments, and agencies primarily in administrative, telecommunications, and utilities sectors in Thailand. Its IT integrated solutions comprise a range of services, including design and planning, assessment of hardware and/or software options, sourcing and sale of hardware and/or software, system installation, and launch to trial operation and maintenance, such as system upgrades for existing systems. The company also provides operational, support, upgrade, and maintenance services to IT system. Platt Nera International Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Platt Nera International Limited is a subsidiary of Pynk Holding Limited.

1FR.SG.summary: Seafresh Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes frozen raw shrimp, processed shrimp, and other seafood products in Thailand and internationally. It provides raw, cooked, sushi, and value added shrimp products, as well as shrimp powder and peeled head shrimp products. The company offers its products under the Seafresh, Sea Angel, GO-GO, Thai Chia, Phoenix, C Angel, and Ultra brands. It is also involved in the import and distribution of seafood; producing and selling animals feed and nutrition; consulting and installation of computer systems; and shrimp farm business. In addition, the company invests in seafood processing companies and other related business. Seafresh Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Mueang Chumphon, Thailand.

1PT1.SG.summary: Central Pattana Public Company Limited develops and manages real estate properties primarily in Thailand. The company develops and rents shopping centers; office buildings; hotel; residential building; and food court, as well as invests in property leasehold funds and trust, and offers property management services. As of December 31, 2019, its property portfolio comprised 34 shopping centers, 7 office buildings, 2 hotels, and 1 rental housing project and accommodation project. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Central Pattana Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Chirathivat Group.

1SY.SG.summary: Symphony Communication Public Company Limited provides communication high-speed circuit services in Thailand, the Southeast Asian countries, and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Render of Communication High Speed Circuit Services and Network Equipment Services. Its services include metro Ethernet, a high-speed network service using fiber optical Ethernet technology to support data transmissions; ready Ethernet, an Ethernet service for customers in commercial buildings in Bangkok metropolitan area; and time division multiplexing (TDM) transmission technology, a type of multiplexing that combines data streams by assigning each stream a different time slot in a set. The company also offers synchronous digital hierarchy, a high-speed circuit for sending and receiving high speed digital data from TDM technology; Ethernet over synchronous digital hierarchy, a high-speed circuit that provides data transmission through Ethernet connection; and dark fiber, which offers data transmission service through fiber optic to customers that require management and control over internal data transmission within division. In addition, it provides international private leased circuit service for multinational organizations to connect with other counties, as well as with international leased circuit and digital broadcasting providers of TV satellite; virtual private network services; and international Internet gateway and IP transit services, which are internet data communications services for connecting with Internet service providers. Further, the company offers cloud direct connect solution, a service connection from the client's office directly to the cloud service providers instead of using only the internet connection; and submarine cable system, as well as preventive maintenance and installation services of network equipment. Symphony Communication Public Company Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

1TF.SG.summary: Tipco Foods Public Company Limited produces and distributes processed fruits, fresh fruits, fruit juices, vegetable juices, natural mineral water, and ready-to-drink beverages in Thailand. The company is also involved in operating food and drink shops; and herbal extracts and farming business. It operates through Products of Vegetable & Fruit, Beverage, and Other segments. The company offers processed fruit products that include canned pineapple, pineapple juice concentrate, aseptic crushed pineapple, pineapple in plastic cup, pineapple in retort pouch, canned tropical fruit salad, tropical fruit salad in plastic cup, canned aloe vera, aseptic crushed aloe vera, aloe vera in retort pouch, and coconut milk products, as well as provides coconut water. It also produces plant and herbal extracts that serve as ingredients for foods, beverages, cosmetics, dietary supplements, and medicines. In addition, the company produces and distributes ready-to-drink fruit juices and vegetable juices; and ready-to-drink beverages, as well as agricultural products. Further, it operates 34 Squeeze Juice Bar by Tipco shops, including 11 company branches and 23 franchise branches that serve smoothies, and healthy drinks and foods. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Thai Pineapple PLC. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

2MLC.SG.summary: Malee Group Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes canned agriculture products, fruit juices, and non-alcohol beverages in Thailand and internationally. The company offers UHT and pasteurized vegetable and fruit juices under the Malee, Malee Food Service, Malee Tropical, and Malee Coco brands; and UHT box drinking water, other beverages, and PET plastic bottles under the Malee and good water brands. It also provides UHT and pasteurized milk and milk tablets under the brand name Chockhai Farm, as well as corn milk under the Malee I-Corn brand name; and TurBusta Maxx branded canned coffee. In addition, the company offers canned seasonal fruits, including rambutan, rambutan stuffed with pineapple, lychees, longans, water chestnuts, sugar palm, mangoes, etc.; canned sweet corn; canned pineapple; and canned mixed fruits under the brand names Malee, First Choice, Farmer, and Malee Foods Service. Further, it provides research and development services for scientifically transformation agriculture solutions; and engages in the contract manufacturing business. The company was formerly known as Malee Sampran Public Company Limited and changed its name to Malee Group Public Company Limited in April 2016. Malee Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is based in Lam Luk Ka, Thailand.

2PR3.F.summary: Pruksa Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the development and sale of residential real estate properties in Thailand. The company develops townhouses, single houses, and condominiums. It also provides management, home decoration, and construction services; and operates hospitals and clinics, as well as place of examination and treatment. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

2PR4.SG.summary: Pruksa Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the development and sale of residential real estate properties in Thailand. The company develops townhouses, single houses, and condominiums. It also provides management, home decoration, and construction services; and operates hospitals and clinics, as well as place of examination and treatment. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

2SC.SG.summary: Sriracha Construction Public Company Limited engages in construction business, machinery and equipment rental, and consulting on architectural and engineering in Thailand and internationally. The company provides construction services in the areas of mechanical, welding, equipment and vessels, ducts, steel fabrication, shutdown, piping, turbine and generator, tanks, structural steel, pipe rack and buildings, piping work and installation, civil construction, permanent and temporary facilities, as well as sandblasting, grit blasting, and painting services. It also offers manpower supply agency services; and a range of maintenance services for power and petrochemical plants, oil refineries, industrial plants, etc., as well as rents construction equipment and tools. The company was formerly known as Sriracha Construction (1994) Co. Ltd and changed its name to Sriracha Construction Public Company Limited in December 2011. Sriracha Construction Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Si Racha, Thailand.

3OI.SG.summary: Oishi Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates Japanese restaurant in Thailand and internationally. It operates through two segments, Food and Beverage. The company also offers ramen, and snack and frozen foods; ready-to-cook and ready-to-eat products; produces and distributes green tea, fruit juice flavored drinks, herbal drinks, and drinking water; and distributes food and beverage products under the OISHI brand. In addition, it provides brand and marketing management; consulting; and food delivery services, as well as sells food online in Thailand. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Oishi Group Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thai Beverage Public Company Limited.

44M.F.summary: Mermaid Maritime Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides subsea and drilling services to the offshore oil and gas industries in Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Thailand, Indonesia, Malaysia, and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Subsea Group and Holding. It provides subsea services, including inspection, repair and maintenance, infrastructure installation support, remotely operated vehicle (ROV) support, and cable and flexible pipe laying services through operating 7 subsea vessels, 17 saturation and air diving systems, and 13 ROV systems. The company also offers offshore drilling and accommodation rig services through its ownership in 1 tender assist drilling rig, 1 accommodation barge, and 3 high specification premium jack-up drilling rigs. In addition, it engages in the provision of hydrographic survey and positioning services; diving, ROV, and subsea contracting services; and production and exploration drilling services, as well as in the offshore transportation, installation, and decommissioning business. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Mermaid Maritime Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited.

47T.F.long_name: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited
47T.F.summary: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited provides commercial banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Thailand. It operates through Commercial Banking Business, Securities Business, and Asset Management Business segments. The company accepts deposit products, such as current accounts, savings accounts, fixed deposit accounts, and certificates of deposit, as well as cards and bill payment services. It also provides personal loans, such as home loan, new and used car loans, and loans against inheritance pension; and corporate loans, including project and long term loans, short term loans, and guarantee products. In addition, the company offers investment services, including stock and derivative brokerage, mutual funds, private funds, and provident funds, as well as long term equity funds/retirement mutual funds; and insurance services, such as life, retirement, health and critical illness, cancer, personal accident, car, and travel insurance. Further, it provides investment banking services that financial advisory and underwriting for merger and acquisition, privatization advisory and implementation, project financing, debt restructuring, feasibility study, project valuation, general advisory, etc.; and private banking, and wealth and asset management services. Additionally, the company offers mobile banking, custodian, assets for sale, car auction services, hire purchase and retail loan, SME lending, and insurance brokerage services. TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

47TA.F.long_name: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited
47TA.F.summary: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited provides commercial banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Thailand. It operates through Commercial Banking Business, Securities Business, and Asset Management Business segments. The company accepts deposit products, such as current accounts, savings accounts, fixed deposit accounts, and certificates of deposit, as well as cards and bill payment services. It also provides personal loans, such as home loan, new and used car loans, and loans against inheritance pension; and corporate loans, including project and long term loans, short term loans, and guarantee products. In addition, the company offers investment services, including stock and derivative brokerage, mutual funds, private funds, and provident funds, as well as long term equity funds/retirement mutual funds; and insurance services, such as life, retirement, health and critical illness, cancer, personal accident, car, and travel insurance. Further, it provides investment banking services that financial advisory and underwriting for merger and acquisition, privatization advisory and implementation, project financing, debt restructuring, feasibility study, project valuation, general advisory, etc.; and private banking, and wealth and asset management services. Additionally, the company offers mobile banking, custodian, assets for sale, car auction services, hire purchase and retail loan, SME lending, and insurance brokerage services. TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

4M1N.SG.summary: Stark Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the electric wire and cable business in Thailand and internationally. It manufactures, trades in, and provides service test for wire products made from copper and aluminum, which are used in electrical transition, telecommunications, and construction applications. The company's products include bare electric, medium voltage electric, high and extra high voltage electric, and low voltage electric wires; electric wires for general building; telephone line; and fire resistant and flame restardant cables. It also offers manpower services; and services, such as vessel cleaning, off shore construction services, fabrication and maintenance services, etc. related to petroleum business, as well as rents properties. The company was formerly known as Siam Inter Multimedia Public Company Limited and changed its name to Stark Corporation Public Company Limited in July 2019. Stark Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

4QVA.F.long_name: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited
4QVA.F.summary: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) and petrochemical products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum and Petrochemical Products, Transportation Services, and Other segments. It is also involved in the trading of petroleum for household cooking, industry, and transportation sectors. In addition, the company provides transportation services by land and ship; manufactures and distributes LPG cylinders; and offers warehousing and storage, and oil depots and port services. The company was formerly known as VSPP Development Company Limited. Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

4QVB.SG.long_name: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited
4QVB.SG.summary: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) and petrochemical products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum and Petrochemical Products, Transportation Services, and Other segments. It is also involved in the trading of petroleum for household cooking, industry, and transportation sectors. In addition, the company provides transportation services by land and ship; manufactures and distributes LPG cylinders; and offers warehousing and storage, and oil depots and port services. The company was formerly known as VSPP Development Company Limited. Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

5ASA.F.summary: Asiasoft Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision and distribution of online game services in Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, the Philippines, and internationally. The company operates through two segments: Online Game and Distribution. The Online Game segment provides online game services through Internet using servers. The Distribution segment distributes game products, as well as provides payment channel services. The company publishes the games under the PlayPark brand. It also offers @Cafe, which brings online games to Internet cafe gamers, and offers promotional media and various marketing activities for members; @Cash that is an in-game credits top-up system and helps in payments through multiple channels; and @Key, a security device for online games services. The company was formerly known as B.M. Media (Thailand) Company Limited. Asiasoft Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

6DM1.SG.long_name: Bangkok Dusit Medical Services Public Company Limited
6DM1.SG.summary: Bangkok Dusit Medical Services Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates hospitals in Thailand and internationally. The company owns and manages 6 hospital groups, including Bangkok Hospital Group, Samitivej Hospital Group, BNH Hospital, Phyathai Hospital Group, Paolo Hospital Group, and Royal Hospital Group. It operates regenerative and preventive wellness clinics. In addition, the company operates hotels; distributes cosmetic goods; provides accounting, health insurance, laboratory services, investment, technology and information, training, insurance brokerage, air transportation, and property management services, as well as asset management services; and manufactures, distributes, and retails medicine and pharmaceutical products. It operates 49 hospitals in Thailand and Cambodia. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

79PA.SG.summary: Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides finance services in Thailand. The company offers hire purchase and loan, and non-performing assets management services. It also invests in other companies; and provides management and consulting services for retail credit systems in local and foreign country, as well as credit sale in foreign country. In addition, it provides digital personal loan services. The company was formerly known as Srisawad Power 1979 Public Company Limited and changed its name to Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited in July 2017. Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

7BP.F.summary: Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited, an energy company, engages in the refining and marketing of petroleum products. It operates through Refinery and Oil Trading, Marketing, Electricity, Bio-Based Product, Natural Resource, and Other segments. The company explores and produces petroleum, biodiesel, and ethanol; produces electricity through solar, wind, and geothermal; mines lithium; and operates service stations. The company markets its oil products to various sectors, including transportation, aviation, shipping, construction, industrial, and agriculture sectors through oil traders. It operates in Thailand, Malaysia, Japan, Korea, the Philippines, Singapore, Indonesia, Norway, and internationally. The company was formerly known as The Bangchak Petroleum Public Company Limited and changed its name to Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited in April 2017. Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

7BP1.SG.summary: Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited, an energy company, engages in the refining and marketing of petroleum products. It operates through Refinery and Oil Trading, Marketing, Electricity, Bio-Based Product, Natural Resource, and Other segments. The company explores and produces petroleum, biodiesel, and ethanol; produces electricity through solar, wind, and geothermal; mines lithium; and operates service stations. The company markets its oil products to various sectors, including transportation, aviation, shipping, construction, industrial, and agriculture sectors through oil traders. It operates in Thailand, Malaysia, Japan, Korea, the Philippines, Singapore, Indonesia, Norway, and internationally. The company was formerly known as The Bangchak Petroleum Public Company Limited and changed its name to Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited in April 2017. Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

7LA.SG.short_name: Lanna Resources, The PCL Reg. S
7LA.SG.summary: Lanna Resources Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes lignite in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Domestic Coal, Overseas Coal, and Ethanol. It also purchases and sells coal; produces and sells coal and ethanol; and generates and distributes power. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

7TWN.SG.summary: Trinity Watthana Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the securities business in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Securities and Derivatives Business; and Financial Advisory Business and Investment Banking. The company is involved in the broking, trading, borrowing and lending, and underwriting of securities. It also provides investment advisory, private fund asset management, and financial advisory services, as well as operates as a derivatives agent. In addition, the company invests in other companies and listed companies. As of December 31, 2019, it had 7 branches. Trinity Watthana Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

8BCN.SG.short_name: BCPG Public Company Ltd. Reg. S
8BCN.SG.summary: BCPG Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and distribution of electricity from solar cells in Thailand. It also generates electricity from wind and geothermal power, as well as invests in alternative energy business. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. BCPG Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited.

8DM.SG.summary: Demco Public Company Limited engages in the provision of electric system construction and service works in the fields of electric engineering and telecommunication in Thailand. The company operates through six segments: Sales, Electrical Work Services, Mechanical Work Services, Engagement Work Services, Electricity from Solar Power, and Other Services. The Sales segment produces and sells steel structure fabrications for electrical and telecommunication works. The Electrical Work Services segment designs, constructs, and manages electrical work. The Mechanical Work Services segment designs, constructs, and manages mechanical and electric systems and facilities, such as electrical, water management, air-conditioning and ventilation, and steam and hot water systems. The Engagement Work Services segment produces and installs fabricated steel structures and high pressure vessels. The Electricity from Solar Power segment generates and sells electricity from solar power. The Other Services segment provides civil work, communication, and other services. It also manufactures and trades in steel structures and steel towers; and trades in assembled telecommunication equipment, communication equipment, and electrical equipment, as well as sells construction materials. Demco Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

9105.TW.summary: Cal-Comp Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture of electronic products in Thailand and internationally. It manufactures electronic products, such as computer and computer peripheral, telecommunication equipment, and automation equipment. Cal-Comp Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

911622.TW.long_name: Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited
911622.TW.summary: Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and exports steel wire rods, steel annealing wires, reinforced concrete bars, steel screws, and wire products in Thailand. It also provides spheroidized annealing wires, bolts, and thread rods; and engages in trading activities. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Rayong, Thailand. Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Tycoons Group International Co., Ltd.

9AHN.SG.summary: AAPICO Hitech Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of automobile parts, dies, and jigs in Thailand, China, Malaysia, and Portugal. The company operates in three segments: Manufacture of Automobiles Assembly Tools and Parts; Sales of Automobiles and Provision of Automobiles Repair Service; and Others. It offers stamped or pressed parts, including chassis frame components, housing axles parts, pressed and stamped body parts, door check link, and brake lines, fuel lines, engine, and brazing parts; forged and machined parts, such as transmission, power train, steering, and suspension systems, engine, shafts, wheel hubs, and other parts, as well as connecting rods and copper forged parts; and plastic parts and plastic fuel tanks. The company also provides fuel lines, brake lines, engine parts, roof ditch moldings, belt line moldings, door sash products, brazed steel tubing, door checks and hinges, and parking brake lever products; assembly jigs; and stamping dies. In addition, the company is involved in the sale of automobiles; provision of automobile repair, training, technical support, and information technology consulting and advisory services; venture capital business; investment in other companies; and import and export of vehicles and parts. Further, it manufactures 3D car navigation and digital map solutions under the POWERMAP brand with voice activation software, as well as Oracle ERP systems; and operates car dealership service centers. AAPICO Hitech Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Ayutthaya, Thailand.

9CTA.SG.summary: Cho Thavee Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and assembles commercial automotive engineering systems. The company offers dump and 4 axles full trailers; refrigerated fiberglass body; dump, mobile lab, fiber refrigerator, and dry van trucks; and 3 axles and car carrier semi-trailers. It also provides ground support equipment, such as aircraft, maintanance platform, and 53 meter ladder trucks; semi-trailer 7 Axles; mobile advertising trucks; lowbed 3 axles and 16 axles semi-trailers; catering trucks; and rail systems, as well as project management services. It serves in Thailand, Hong Kong, Japan, Vietnam, Korea, Singapore, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Cho Thavee Dollasien Public Company Limited and changed its name to Cho Thavee Public Company Limited in May 2016. Cho Thavee Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Khon Kaen, Thailand.

9UMF.SG.long_name: The Union Mosaic Industry Public Company Limited
9UMF.SG.summary: The Union Mosaic Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes floor and wall tiles in Thailand and internationally. It operates through two segments, Import Floor Tiles and Wall Tiles, Export Floor Tiles and Wall Tiles. The company's products include floor, wall, mosaic, and porcelain tiles. It is also involved in the sale of mineral and soil, real estate, and ceramic agent activities. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

A-R.BK.summary: Areeya Property Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops real estate projects in Thailand. It primarily develops single-homes, village towns, townhomes, home offices, and condominiums; and community malls. The company is also involved in the provision of after sales services for property; construction services; and property management services, as well as in the restaurant business. Areeya Property Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

A.BK.summary: Areeya Property Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops real estate projects in Thailand. It primarily develops single-homes, village towns, townhomes, home offices, and condominiums; and community malls. The company is also involved in the provision of after sales services for property; construction services; and property management services, as well as in the restaurant business. Areeya Property Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AAV-R.BK.summary: Asia Aviation Public Company Limited, through its subsidiary, provides airline services primarily in Thailand. The company operates through Scheduled Flight Operations and Charter Flight Operations segments. The Scheduled Flight Operations segment offers passenger air transportation services to routine destinations for scheduled flights. This segment sells tickets through its distribution channels, including website, sale counters, travel agents, etc. The Chartered Flight Operations segment provides passenger air transportation services to non-routine destinations that serves tourist agency companies. Asia Aviation Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AAV.BK.summary: Asia Aviation Public Company Limited, through its subsidiary, provides airline services primarily in Thailand. The company operates through Scheduled Flight Operations and Charter Flight Operations segments. The Scheduled Flight Operations segment offers passenger air transportation services to routine destinations for scheduled flights. This segment sells tickets through its distribution channels, including website, sale counters, travel agents, etc. The Chartered Flight Operations segment provides passenger air transportation services to non-routine destinations that serves tourist agency companies. Asia Aviation Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ABICO-R.BK.summary: Abico Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, produces and distributes ready-to-drink milk. It is also involved in the rental of office space; and dairy farming business. The company is based in Lam Luk Ka, Thailand.

ABICO.BK.summary: Abico Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, produces and distributes ready-to-drink milk. It is also involved in the rental of office space; and dairy farming business. The company is based in Lam Luk Ka, Thailand.

ABM-R.BK.summary: Asia Biomass Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, trades in biomass in Thailand and internationally. The company also manufactures wood chips and biomass pellets. In addition, it provides transportation services. The company was formerly known as Thai Joss Powder Industrial Co., Ltd. Asia Biomass Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ABM.BK.summary: Asia Biomass Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, trades in biomass in Thailand and internationally. The company also manufactures wood chips and biomass pellets. In addition, it provides transportation services. The company was formerly known as Thai Joss Powder Industrial Co., Ltd. Asia Biomass Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ACAP-R.BK.long_name: ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited
ACAP-R.BK.summary: ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited provides corporate and retail lending services in Thailand and the Asian region. The company operates through Lending and Factoring, Call Center Services and Financial Businesses, and Others segments. It also provides non-performing loan servicing on behalf of client creditors, such as front end customer services to borrowers and carrying out day to day administration and accounting of the recovery process, loans accounts, and asset collateral, as well as NPL portfolio valuation services. In addition, the company offers legal advisory and representation services in the areas of business law, real estate law, civil law, bankruptcy law, tax law, and public sector relations; factoring services; and business process outsourcing services comprising call center, debt and receivables collection, loan approval, payroll, and data entry services. Further, it is involved in the sale of land with buildings and other real estate; and provision of investment banking services. The company was formerly known as ACAP Advisory Public Company Limited and changed its name to ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited in February 2016. ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

ACC-R.BK.long_name: Advanced Connection Corporation Public Company Limited
ACC-R.BK.summary: Advanced Connection Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes ceiling fans in Thailand. The company offers ceiling fans under the Air-Le-Gance, Compass East, and Sunlight brands; and LED decoration lamp under the Lumos brand, as well as accessories. It is also involved in the property development and renting activities. In addition, the company invests in business of electricity production from solar power; operates a solar roof power plant; and engages in the financing and factoring business. The company was formerly known as Compass East Industry (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Advanced Connection Corporation Public Company Limited in November 2015. Advanced Connection Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ACE-R.BK.long_name: Absolute Clean Energy Public Company Limited
ACE-R.BK.summary: Absolute Clean Energy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates biomass, natural gas, municipal solid waste, and solar energy power plants in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Biomass Power Plants, Solid Waste Power Plant, Natural Gas Power Plant, and Solar Energy Power Plant. As of December 31, 2019, it has 14 power plants with installed capacity of 212.18 megawatts. Absolute Clean Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ACG-R.BK.summary: Autocorp Holding Public Company Limited, a dealer, distributes cars and spare parts in Thailand. It also offers car leasing and insurance services; and maintenance, repair, and after sale services. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Khon Kaen, Thailand.

ACG.BK.summary: Autocorp Holding Public Company Limited, a dealer, distributes cars and spare parts in Thailand. It also offers car leasing and insurance services; and maintenance, repair, and after sale services. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Khon Kaen, Thailand.

ADB-R.BK.summary: Applied DB Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic compounds, adhesives, and sealants in Thailand, Nigeria, Kenya, Vietnam, Myanmar, Bangladesh, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Plastic Compound, Adhesive, and Silicone and Sealant. The company's plastic compound products include PVC and non-PVC compounds, such as soft PVC, rigid PVC, pharmaceutical grade, and thermoplastic elastomer compounds, as well as PP split yarn for wire and cable fillers. Its adhesive products comprise contact, grafted, PU, vinyl, and emulsion latex water-based adhesives, as well as thinners, primers, and hardeners. The company's sealant products include acetic silicone, neutral silicone, acrylic, super nail construction, PU, and spur polymer hybrid sealants. It also offers DIY products comprising super glues, RTV gasket makers, household adhesive and sealants, epoxy adhesive and putties, and specialist products. The company provides its products to wire and cable, real estate and construction, and shoes and leather industries, as well as household end-users. Applied DB Public Company Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

AE3.SG.long_name: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited
AE3.SG.summary: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides various retail finance services in Thailand. The company operates through Retail Finance Services and Other Business segments. It offers credit card services, hire purchase services, personal loans, and other loans, as well as cash and installment loans. The company also provides debt collection services; and insurance brokerage services. As of February 29, 2020, it had 105 branches. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AEC-R.BK.summary: AEC Securities Public Company Limited provides securities trading and investment advisory services in Thailand. It offers securities brokerage services comprises various securities trading account, such as cash account, cash balance account, and credit balance account; derivatives brokerage; electronic/internet trading; investment banking, which includes financial advisory, mergers and acquisitions, initial public offerings, real estate investment trust (REIT)/infrastructure fund, debt restructuring, corporate structuring, and capital restructuring services; mutual funds; securities borrowing and lending; manages private funds; and AIPRO trading system, an investment services in security exchange with the program trading system. The company was formerly known as United Securities Public Company Limited and changed its name to AEC Securities Public Company Limited in June 2013. AEC Securities Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1971 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AEONTS-R.BK.long_name: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited
AEONTS-R.BK.summary: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides various retail finance services in Thailand. The company also provides debt collection services; and insurance brokerage services. As of February 29, 2020, it had 105 branches. AF-R.BK.summary: AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited provides receivable factoring services to small and middle businesses in Thailand. It offers short-term financing services for various industries, including electronic equipment and parts, telecommunication, consumer products, and health and beauty. The company was formerly known as Dhanamitr Factoring PLC and changed its name to AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited in September 2011. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of AIRA Capital Public Company Limited.

AF.BK.summary: AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited provides receivable factoring services to small and middle businesses in Thailand. It offers short-term financing services for various industries, including electronic equipment and parts, telecommunication, consumer products, and health and beauty. The company was formerly known as Dhanamitr Factoring PLC and changed its name to AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited in September 2011. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of AIRA Capital Public Company Limited.

AGE-R.BK.long_name: Asia Green Energy Public Company Limited
AGE-R.BK.summary: Asia Green Energy Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of coal for industrial use in Thailand. It also provides transportation and management, water transportation and port, and cargo services, as well as consultancy services for coal extraction and water transportation. In addition, the company generates and supplies electricity; and distributes fuel. It also imports and exports coal. It serves power plants, steel plants, cement plants, and paper factories; and industrial factories relating to textile, food, rubber, and alternative energy products. The company exports coal to China, India, Vietnam, and Taiwan. Asia Green Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AH-R.BK.summary: AAPICO Hitech Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of automobile parts, dies, and jigs in Thailand, China, Malaysia, and Portugal. The company operates in three segments: Manufacture of Automobiles Assembly Tools and Parts; Sales of Automobiles and Provision of Automobiles Repair Service; and Others. It offers stamped or pressed parts, including chassis frame components, housing axles parts, pressed and stamped body parts, door check link, and brake lines, fuel lines, engine, and brazing parts; forged and machined parts, such as transmission, power train, steering, and suspension systems, engine, shafts, wheel hubs, and other parts, as well as connecting rods and copper forged parts; and plastic parts and plastic fuel tanks. The company also provides fuel lines, brake lines, engine parts, roof ditch moldings, belt line moldings, door sash products, brazed steel tubing, door checks and hinges, and parking brake lever products; assembly jigs; and stamping dies. In addition, the company is involved in the sale of automobiles; provision of automobile repair, training, technical support, and information technology consulting and advisory services; venture capital business; investment in other companies; and import and export of vehicles and parts. Further, it manufactures 3D car navigation and digital map solutions under the POWERMAP brand with voice activation software, as well as Oracle ERP systems; and operates car dealership service centers. AAPICO Hitech Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Ayutthaya, Thailand.

The company operates in three segments: Manufacture of Automobiles Assembly Tools and Parts; Sales of Automobiles and Provision of Automobiles Repair Service; and Others. It offers stamped or pressed parts, including chassis frame components, housing axles parts, pressed and stamped body parts, door check link, and brake lines, fuel lines, engine, and brazing parts; forged and machined parts, such as transmission, power train, steering, and suspension systems, engine, shafts, wheel hubs, and other parts, as well as connecting rods and copper forged parts; and plastic parts and plastic fuel tanks. The company also provides fuel lines, brake lines, engine parts, roof ditch moldings, belt line moldings, door sash products, brazed steel tubing, door checks and hinges, and parking brake lever products; assembly jigs; and stamping dies. AAPICO Hitech Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Ayutthaya, Thailand.

AHC-R.BK.summary: Aikchol Hospital Public Company Limited provides medical and nursing care services under the Aikchol Hospital trademark in Thailand. The company offers hospital services, including diseases protection, medical treatment, health strengthening, and health rehabilitation services with 340 beds in service. It serves primarily individuals, group of policyholders of the insurance company, group of contract parties' company, and group of insured on social security. Aikchol Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

AHC.BK.summary: Aikchol Hospital Public Company Limited provides medical and nursing care services under the Aikchol Hospital trademark in Thailand. AIMIRT.BK.long_name: AIM Industrial Growth Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
AIMIRT.BK.summary: AIM Industrial Growth Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust focuses on investing in freehold right of land, cold storage buildings, and immovable assets related to cold storage and warehouses in Thailand. These are located in Samut Sakhon and Chachoengsao areas with total leasable area of 36,908.00 sq.m. It also intends to invest in freehold right of land and warehouses, including 5 units of warehouses with total leasable area of 21,651 sq.m. in Bang Phi, Samut Prakan. The company is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AIPUY.long_name: Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited
AIPUY.summary: Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited engages in developing, managing, and operating international airports in Thailand. The company operates through Airport Business, Hotel Business, Ground Aviation Services, and Security Business segments. It operates six international airports, including Suvarnabhumi, Don Mueang, Chiang Mai, Hat Yai, Phuket, and Mae Fah Luang Chiang Rai airports. The company is also involved in the hotel and restaurant business; and services or rental of ground equipment, as well as provides security services. Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited was founded in 1903 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AIRA-R.BK.summary: AIRA Capital Public Company Limited provides, together with its subsidiaries, financial advisory services in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Securities and Investment, Advisory and Investment Banking, Factoring, and Rental and Service. The company offers securities brokerage, securities trading, investment advisory, securities underwriting, securities borrowing and lending, derivatives brokerage, and private fund management services. It also provides investment banking services, including mergers and acquisitions, such as asset/company valuation, leverage buyout, and joint ventures and spin-offs; and capital restructurings and other financial advisory services to small and medium-sized enterprises, major public and privately-owned companies, government related entities, and private equity firms. In addition, the company provides hire purchase, finance lease, and operating lease for industrial equipment and machines; and private fund, mutual fund management, and securities brokerage of investment units services, Further, it engages in receivable factoring, venture capital, property development, and asset management businesses. AIRA Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AIRA.BK.summary: AIRA Capital Public Company Limited provides, together with its subsidiaries, financial advisory services in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Securities and Investment, Advisory and Investment Banking, Factoring, and Rental and Service. The company offers securities brokerage, securities trading, investment advisory, securities underwriting, securities borrowing and lending, derivatives brokerage, and private fund management services. It also provides investment banking services, including mergers and acquisitions, such as asset/company valuation, leverage buyout, and joint ventures and spin-offs; and capital restructurings and other financial advisory services to small and medium-sized enterprises, major public and privately-owned companies, government related entities, and private equity firms. AIRA Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AISF.F.long_name: Advanced Info Service Public Company Limited
AISF.F.summary: Advanced Info Service Public Company Limited operates as a mobile phone network company primarily in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Mobile Phone Services, Mobile Phone and Equipment Sales, and Datanet and Broadband Services. It is involved in the operation of cellular telephone networks in the frequency of 900 MHz; and in 2.1 GHz and 1800 MHz frequencies. The company also imports and distributes handsets and accessories, as well as distributes cash cards; and provides online data communications services through telephone landlines and optical fiber, as well as electronic payment services. In addition, it provides international telephone service, broadcasting network, and television broadcasting services for various channels, as well as insurance brokerage services. Further, the company offers IT, content aggregator, and billing and collection outsourcing services; call center services; and land and building rental services, as well as related facilities. Additionally, it provides Internet data center, and Internet and satellite uplink-downlink services for communications; and distributes Internet equipment; publishes business telephone directories and advertising; offers mobile contents; and provides online advertising services. Advanced Info Service Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AIT-R.BK.long_name: Advanced Information Technology Public Company Limited
AIT-R.BK.summary: Advanced Information Technology Public Company Limited designs, sells, installs, services, repairs, maintains, and trains information and communication technology network systems in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Sales and Service, and Rental of Equipment. It provides solutions, including carrier grade router/switch, Web/video caching, DDOS protection, software-defined networking or the network controlled by the program to work as defined, network function virtualization, and other. The company also offers data center and cloud solutions, such as consolidation and virtualization, unified data center, converged and hyper converged infrastructure, private and public cloud infrastructure, software-defined networking or the network controlled by the program, and other. In addition, it provides collaboration solutions comprising communication through IP/VoIP system or unified communication, video and Web conferencing, contact center, and others; and various enterprise network solutions consisting of router, switch, wireless LAN, WAN optimization, security, application delivery control, DNS server, identity system, network management, and other. Further, the company offers the services in the development of information technology systems to various projects with the combination of concepts in applying technology with the framework in developing the system accordingly. Additionally, it provides managed services managing complicated IT system; and maintenance service on checking the operational condition of the system, which enables the system to operate continually and reduce the downtime period, and preventing problem to occur simultaneously, as well as spare parts for saving the time in solving the problem and mitigating the risks from the damage of equipment. The company also rents computers and electronic equipment. Advanced Information Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AJ-R.BK.summary: A.J. Plast Public Company Limited manufactures, sells, and exports plastic films and scrap products in Thailand and internationally. It offers biaxially oriented polypropylene (BOPP), biaxially oriented polyester (BOPET), biaxially oriented polyamide (BOPA), biaxially oriented poly lactic acid (BOPLA), and cast polypropylene (CPP) films, as well as metallized BOPP, BOPET, BOPA, BOPLA, and CPP films; and Krystalox and Krystalent films. The company's products are primarily used in packing, industrial, and wrapping applications. A.J. Plast Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AJA-R.BK.long_name: AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited
AJA-R.BK.summary: AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale and retail of electric appliances under the AJ brand in Thailand. It retails and wholesales audio and visual products, home appliances, mobile phones, and accessories. The company also provides top-up services for prepaid phone and service prepaid kiosks. In addition, it is also involved in the distribution of sport shoes; retail of top-up machines; logistic and export business, including TV drama programs and other entertainment media businesses; and provision of e-money services and accept payment through electronic methods. The company was formerly known as Crown Tech Advance Public Company Limited and changed its name to AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited in June 2017. AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company's products are primarily used in packing, industrial, and wrapping applications. A.J. Plast Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AKP-R.BK.summary: Akkhie Prakarn Public Company Limited manages and operates industrial waste management centers in Thailand. The company is involved in the provision of services on incinerating and destroying rubbish, wastes, and used materials, as well as recycles rubbish and wastes to substituted energy and raw materials. It also offers pollution control system to prevent the emission of pollutants generated from hazardous substance incineration; a system for monitoring and inspecting the amount of pollutants released from the chimney; hazardous waste quality improvement systems; laboratory for hazardous waste analysis; and waste transportation system. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand. Akkhie Prakarn Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Better World Green Public Company Limited.

AKR-R.BK.summary: Ekarat Engineering Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes transformers and solar farms in Thailand. It also distributes solar cells and solar panel; and engages in the solar electric power business. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AKR.BK.summary: Ekarat Engineering Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes transformers and solar farms in Thailand. It also distributes solar cells and solar panel; and engages in the solar electric power business. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ALL-R.BK.long_name: All Inspire Development Public Company Limited
ALL-R.BK.summary: All Inspire Development Public Company Limited engages in the development of real estate properties in Thailand. The company develops condominiums and townhomes. It also provides condominium management and real estate brokerage services. In addition, the company engages in the leasing and rental of shopping malls. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ALLA-R.BK.summary: Alla Public Company Limited imports and distributes cranes and electric hoists, industrial doors, loading docks, electronic lifts, shelving and racking systems, and relevant parts and other equipment in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Sales and Relevant Service; and Service. It also offers dock levelers, dock shelters, and other equipment, as well as fire and cold storage doors; warehouse systems; and plastic strip curtains. The company also provides installation and after-sales services. It serves construction, automobile, chemical, power plant, steel, cement, logistics, airport, and government projects. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ALT-R.BK.summary: ALT Telecom Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture, installation, maintenance, rental, and sale of telecommunication network equipment in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Network Equipment Distribution Business, Network Equipment Installation Business, and Network Equipment Rental Business. The company distributes telecommunication products comprising fiber optic cables, telecom shelters, antennas, and other telecommunication equipment, as well as rapid deployment products. It is also involved in the construction of base stations; installation of equipment and optical fiber cables; lease and management of telecommunication basic structures; and sale, installation, and maintenance of electrical equipment and systems. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bang Kruai, Thailand. ALT Telecom Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of ALT Holding Co., Ltd.

ALUCON-R.BK.summary: Alucon Public Company Limited produces and distributes aluminum containers primarily in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Can and Tube, and Slug. It offers aluminum collapsible tubes, monobloc aerosol cans, bottles, and rigid wall containers, as well as marker pen bodies. The company also provides aluminum slugs for impact extrusion; and technical impact extrusions, blank aluminum slugs, aluminum coils, aluminum pellets, strips, plates, etc. Its products are used for hair color products, medical creams, adhesives, etc. The company exports its products to approximately 40 countries, including Japan, Australia, the United States, Indonesia, and South Africa. Alucon Public Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

ALUCON.BK.summary: Alucon Public Company Limited produces and distributes aluminum containers primarily in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Can and Tube, and Slug. The company also provides aluminum slugs for impact extrusion; and technical impact extrusions, blank aluminum slugs, aluminum coils, aluminum pellets, strips, plates, etc. Its products are used for hair color products, medical creams, adhesives, etc. The company exports its products to approximately 40 countries, including Japan, Australia, the United States, Indonesia, and South Africa. AMA-R.BK.summary: Ama Marine Public Company Limited engages in marine transportation business in Southeast Asia regions, China, India, and Thailand. It operates through two segments, Marine Transportation and Logistic Services. The company owns and operates a fleet of 10 tankers that has a total capacity of 91,443 DWT to transport palm oil, vegetable oil, and others chemicals. It also transports petrol, bio diesel, and vegetable oil through operating 216 trucks and semi-trailers in Thailand. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AMANAH.BK.summary: Amanah Leasing Public Company Limited provides hire purchase, financial and operating lease, and inventory finance services to consumers and corporates in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Hire Purchase and Others. It also offers used car, auto, and auto SME financing services, as well as auto to money services. As of June 30, 2020, the company operated 43 branches. The company was formerly known as Nava Leasing Public Company Limited and changed its name to Amanah Leasing Public Company Limited in October 2010. Amanah Leasing Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AMARIN-R.BK.long_name: Amarin Printing and Publishing Public Company Limited
AMARIN-R.BK.summary: Amarin Printing and Publishing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the publishing, advertising, and publications distribution businesses in Thailand. It offers a range of printing services, such as artwork creative design, photography, image retouching, and digital printing services, as well as packaging printing service. The company also conceptualizes, compiles, designs, publishes, and delivers offline content, including books, magazines/newsletters, cards/leaflets/brochures/posters, annual reports, anniversary books, pocket books, and gifts; online content, which include e-books, VDO clips, websites, and applications, as well as augmented reality and social network content; and visual content comprising infographics, illustrations, picture, and photography content. In addition, it engages in the organization of events, fairs, and seminars, as well as offsite training programs for private companies and SMEs; purchase, procurement, lease, and leasehold of various assets; and production, distribution, retail, and wholesale of various publication formats that include Thai and translated foreign language books, Praew and Sudsapda magazines for women, electronic creative media comprising video and multimedia teaching materials, and other printed materials. The company also produces television programmes; and engages in broadcasting and advertising through digital television. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 142 bookstores under the Nai-In name. The company was formerly known as Amarin Printing Group Company Limited and changed its name to Amarin Printing and Publishing Public Company Limited in 1993. Amarin Printing and Publishing Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AMATA-R.BK.summary: Amata Corporation Public Company Limited plans, develops, manages, and markets integrated industrial estates in Thailand and internationally. It also produces, distributes, and treats water for industrial use; provides management services for common area; operates a school; and constructs factory for rent. In addition, the company operates as a REIT manager. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AMATAR.BK.summary: Amata Summit Growth Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is a real estate investment trust externally managed by Amata Summit REIT Management Co., Ltd. It invests in the real estate markets. Amata Summit Growth Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AMATAV-R.BK.summary: Amata VN Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the development of industrial estate in Vietnam. It is also involved in the leasing of industrial land, ready built factories, and commercial and residential land, as well as office rental activities. In addition, the company provides utility services. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Amata VN Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Amata Corporation Public Company Limited.

AMATAV.BK.summary: Amata VN Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the development of industrial estate in Vietnam. It is also involved in the leasing of industrial land, ready built factories, and commercial and residential land, as well as office rental activities. Amata VN Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Amata Corporation Public Company Limited.

AMC-R.BK.summary: Asia Metal Public Company Limited produces and sells processed steel products in Thailand. It offers hot-rolled, pickled and oiled, and cold-rolled products to steel wholesalers and end user factories; and round, square, and rectangular steel pipes, as well as light lips channels and C-shaped furring. The company also trades in round-bars and deformed-bars, as well as square and round steel tubes. In addition, it provides steel cutting and modifying services. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

ANAN-R.BK.summary: Ananda Development Public Company Limited, together with subsidiaries, develops and sells various real estate projects in Thailand. It operates through Real Estate Development, Management of Real Estate Development Project, Construction Service, and Other segments. The company provides management services for real estate projects; house construction services; and car racetrack, real estate brokerage, sport club member, and other services, as well as sells food and beverages. It is also involved in the management of juristic person; manufacture and distribution of building materials; development of software; and media production activities, as well as provides academic seminar services. Further, the company engages in the provision of property rental and procurement of lessee services. Ananda Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

The company is also involved in the hotel and restaurant business; and services or rental of ground equipment, as well as provides security services. Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited was founded in 1903 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AP-R.BK.summary: AP (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development activities in Thailand. The company operates in three segments: Low Â Rise, High Â Rise, and Other. It develops single detached houses, townhouses, and condominiums; and provides after sales, property brokerage, and construction services. AP (Thailand) Public Company Limited is also involved in the education and training businesses. The company was formerly known as Asian Property Development Public Company Limited and changed its name to AP (Thailand) Public Company Limited in May 2013. AP (Thailand) Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

APCO-R.BK.summary: Asian Phytoceuticals Public Company Limited engages in the research and development, manufacture, and distribution of health and natural beauty products in Thailand. Its products include dietary supplements, cosmetics, and personal care products that are developed from natural plant and botanical extracts. The company also provides slimming, anti-wrinkle and anti-spots, skin care, and fat reduction products, as well as products for balancing immunity. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Natural Cosmetics Research Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Asian Phytoceuticals Public Company Limited in July 2005. Asian Phytoceuticals Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Lamphun, Thailand.

APCS-R.BK.summary: Asia Precision Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells precision metal parts for automotive, office automation, heating ventilating, and air-conditioning industries in Thailand and internationally. The company also produces and sells metal spare parts; produces and distributes raw water; and distributes materials and spare parts for the construction of various structures. In addition, it offers engineering services and automation solutions; construction and maintenance services of renewable energy power plants; engineering design consulting services; and project construction and maintenance services for waste management facilities and public infrastructures. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

APP-R.BK.summary: Applicad Public Company Limited sells computer programs and provides maintenance services for computer programs. The company offers computer software for engineering, construction, and architecture services; computer and spare parts; and machines and equipment, as well as materials and other products. It offers education solution and other related services, as well as designs and manufactures industrial parts and prototypes. In addition, the company distributes AutoCAD drawing, 3D pipe drawing, and 3D software in industrial design. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

APTPF.summary: Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited engages in developing, managing, and operating international airports in Thailand. The company operates through Airport Business, Hotel Business, Ground Aviation Services, and Security Business segments. It operates six international airports, including Suvarnabhumi, Don Mueang, Chiang Mai, Hat Yai, Phuket, and Mae Fah Luang Chiang Rai airports. The company is also involved in the hotel and restaurant business; and services or rental of ground equipment, as well as provides security services. Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited was founded in 1903 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

APURE-R.BK.summary: Agripure Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes agro products in Thailand. It offers canned and pouched sweet corn products; fresh vegetable and fruit products; and commercial seeds, as well as breeds and distributes corn seeds. The company also exports its products. Agripure Holdings Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

AQ-R.BK.summary: AQ Estate Public Company Limited acquires, develops, and sells properties in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Property Development Low Rise, Property Development High Rise, Services, and Property Rental and Service. The company provides recreational and sale management services; operates hotels and resorts; manages commercial space; and provides real estate trading and rental services. The company was formerly known as Krisdamahanakorn Public Company Limited and changed its name to AQ Estate Public Company Limited in April 2014. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AQUA-R.BK.summary: Aqua Corporation Public Company Limited primarily rents space for advertising signage in Bangkok. The company operates through Rental Space for Advertising Signage; and Service and Investment Property Lease segments. It provides real estate rental services; warehouse rental services; and structured billboard stand rental and advertising services. The company was formerly known as P Plus P Public Company Limited and changed its name to Aqua Corporation Public Company Limited in April 2012. Aqua Corporation Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ARIN-R.BK.summary: Arinsiri Land Public company limited engages in the property development activities in Thailand. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Chonburi, Thailand.

ARIN.BK.summary: Arinsiri Land Public company limited engages in the property development activities in Thailand. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Chonburi, Thailand.

ARIP-R.BK.summary: ARIP Public Company Limited engages in the management of events and marketing activities in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Media and Contents, Management of Event, and Digital Service. The company sells and distributes advertising spaces and services on traditional media, digital media, and online social media in the fields of business, management, and information communication technologies (ICT), including Business+, a magazine that provides analysis on the economy, business, management strategy, administration, marketing, and business trend updates; and ELEADER, a magazine that offers analysis on ICT system, applications, digital solutions, and communication for enterprises. It also provides Business+ Top 1000 Companies, a magazine that compiles business information of the registered companies in Thailand to list the top 1,000 companies with the highest revenue; Business+ Universities, a compilation of information of every public and private academic institutions; Business+ Top Insurance, a magazine for overview of Thailand's insurance industry; and COMTODAY or techhub.in.th, an ICT and consumer electronics knowledge source. In addition, the company organizes ICT event and exhibition under the name of COMMART; provides event management services for conventions and exhibitions; and offers integrated marketing services. Further, it offers digital marketing services; multimedia e-Bookshelf, a digital platform service for e-Book production, collection, and distribution using cloud technology; and enterprise learning platform. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

ARROW-R.BK.summary: Arrow Syndicate Public Company Limited manufactures and sells various conduits in construction and building; electrical conduits; and PPR pipings for water treatment systems in Thailand. The company offers electrical conduits, such as intermediate metallic, rigid steel, squarelocked and interlocked flexible metallic, and liquid tight flexible metallic conduits, as well as electrical metallic tubings; hot and cool water pipes and fittings; air ducts, including spiral, long seam, wind-flex, flexible metal, rectangular, and post-tensioned ducts; and reinforced thermosetting resin conduits. It also manufactures and produces air cooling conduits, as well as operates as a contractor for electrical systems. In addition, the company engages in the business design technology development software and computer business. Arrow Syndicate Public Company Limited exports its products to Australia, Japan, the United States, Turkey, the Philippines, Singapore, Indonesia, Vietnam, Egypt, Myanmar, Cambodia, Saudi Arabia, and Malaysia. The company was formerly known as J.S.V. Hardware Company Limited and changed its name to Arrow Syndicate Public Company Limited in August 2012. Arrow Syndicate Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

AS-R.BK.summary: Asiasoft Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision and distribution of online game services in Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, the Philippines, and internationally. The company operates through two segments: Online Game and Distribution. The Online Game segment provides online game services through Internet using servers. The Distribution segment distributes game products, as well as provides payment channel services. The company publishes the games under the PlayPark brand. It also offers @Cafe, which brings online games to Internet cafe gamers, and offers promotional media and various marketing activities for members; @Cash that is an in-game credits top-up system and helps in payments through multiple channels; and @Key, a security device for online games services. The company was formerly known as B.M. Media (Thailand) Company Limited. Asiasoft Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ASAP-R.BK.long_name: Synergetic Auto Performance Public Company Limited
ASAP-R.BK.summary: Synergetic Auto Performance Public Company Limited provides car rental services in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Car Rental, Selling of Used Cars, and Renting Property. The company offers operating leasing services for corporate customers; short-term car rental services for ordinary customers; limousine rental services for corporate customers; and car rental services through an asap application. It also operates Lifestyle Mall, a car rental center and complete used cars, which include food and beverage outlets; and asap select franchises that are service centers for short-term car rentals and second-hand car sales. In addition, the company provides car maintenance services. It offers services under asap brand name. Synergetic Auto Performance Public Company Limited is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

ASEFA-R.BK.summary: Asefa Public Company Limited manufactures and provides electrical power distribution, switchboard, and trunking systems in Thailand. The company manufactures and sells modular and licensed type tested switchboards, metal trunking and ladders, luminaire products, and prefabricated mobile units under the ASEFA brand. It also distributes and supplies electrical and control, electrical power distribution, lighting and equipment, energy conservation and renewable energy, cable and accessories, and other products. In addition, the company offers system integration services, such as building automation, chiller management, industrial automation, lighting control and management, energy management, and power quality improvement; and engineering services comprising electrical power distribution, renewable energy, energy conservation, automation and smart control, data center, and others, as well as after sales services. It serves infrastructure, industry, commercial building, residential, healthcare, data center and telecommunication, and power generation sectors. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Samutsakhon, Thailand.

ASIMAR-R.BK.long_name: Asian Marine Services Public Company Limited
ASIMAR-R.BK.summary: Asian Marine Services Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the ship building and ship repairing businesses in Thailand. The company constructs various types of ships; undertakes ship conversion projects; offers a range of offshore support services; and engineering services. It also operates as an agent of machinery and equipment for marine service; and subcontractor of ship repair, as well as provides pollution control and environmental management services. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Samutprakan, Thailand.

ASK-R.BK.long_name: Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited
ASK-R.BK.summary: Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited provides auto hire purchase services primarily in Thailand. It operates through five segments: Hire Purchase, Leasing, Loan, Factoring, and Insurance Broker. The company provides automobile hire purchase services for new and used automobiles, including passenger and commercial cars, such as pickup, van, truck and taxi, etc.; auto and machine leasing services for commercial customers; personal loans, sale and hire purchase back, and floor plan financing to hire purchase customers and automotive dealers; and factoring services to commercial customers in various industries. It also offers car, fire, marine, personal accident, and third party liability insurance to hire purchase and finance lease customers; and auto registrations and transfers, and tax renewal services. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Chailease Holding Company Limited.
