CPH-R.BK.long_name: Castle Peak Holdings Public Company Limited
CPH-R.BK.summary: Castle Peak Holdings Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and exports garments in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Garment Manufacturing, and Development of Real Estate for Sale. The company primarily offers jackets, coats, trousers, and sportswear under the customer's trademark. It exports its garments to the United States and the European Union. Castle Peak Holdings Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CPI-R.BK.long_name: Chumporn Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited
CPI-R.BK.summary: Chumporn Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes palm oil products in Thailand, Singapore, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: The Palm Oil Products; The Palm Seeds, Palm Sprouts, And Coconut Sprouts; and The Electricity. It also provides palm seeds and sprouts, palm seedling products, and crude palm oil and crude palm kernel oil; refined bleached deodorized (RBD) palm oil, palm kernel oil, palm olein, and palm stearin; and palm fatty acid distillate, palm kernel fatty acid distillate, and kernel meal, as well as trades in vegetable oil. The company offers its palm oil products for use in food and non-food industry applications; and supplies cooking oils in PET bottles, tins, and pouches under the LEELA, ARO, and Lek Kitchen brands for household consumer market. In addition, it produces and distributes biodiesel, and electricity from biogas. Chumporn Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Tha Sae, Thailand.

CPL-R.BK.summary: CPL Group Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes leather products in Thailand. It offers footwear leather products, which include full grain and suede split leather products comprising nubuck, oil and wax, pigment, sued, and water proof leather for shoe factories; and aniline and finished splits leather. The company also provides tanning services; and manufactures and distributes personal protective equipment. In addition, it exports its products to China, Vietnam, Indonesia, India, etc. CPL Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

CPN-R.BK.summary: Central Pattana Public Company Limited develops and manages real estate properties primarily in Thailand. The company develops and rents shopping centers; office buildings; hotel; residential building; and food court, as well as invests in property leasehold funds and trust, and offers property management services. As of December 31, 2019, its property portfolio comprised 34 shopping centers, 7 office buildings, 2 hotels, and 1 rental housing project and accommodation project. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Central Pattana Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Chirathivat Group.

At present, CPNREIT invested in a well-diversified portfolio of 5 shopping centers and 1 hotel across Thailand's prime destinations.

CPR-R.BK.long_name: CPR Gomu Industrial Public Company Limited
CPR-R.BK.summary: CPR Gomu Industrial Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells natural and synthetic rubber parts, moldings, and components for automobiles and motorcycles in Thailand and internationally. It also produces and sells metals and metal pipes. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Wangnoi, Thailand.

CPT-R.BK.short_name: CPT DRIVES AND POWER PUBLIC COM
CPT-R.BK.long_name: CPT Drives and Power Public Company Limited
CPT-R.BK.summary: CPT Drives and Power Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electrical equipment and control systems used in industrial plants in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Production and Distribution, Construction Contracts, and Services. The company offers drives and automation products, such as DC drives, LV and MV inverters, and starters, as well as PLC, SCADA and HMI, speed feedback device, and motion-controllers; and electrical power components, including MCCB and ELCB, contactors and relays, air circuit breakers, vacuum circuit breakers, vacuum contactors, power fuses, ring main units, smart motor protection relays, MV switchgear, transformers, bus ducts, liquid and oil-cooled starters/NGRs, and power capacitors. It also provides electric motor products, such as AC/DC motors, IEC standard motors, medium voltage motors, and AC vector motor MAC QI series products. CPT Drives and Power Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CPW-R.BK.summary: Copperwired Public Company Limited retails, distributes, and repairs computers, mobile phones, and accessories in Thailand. It operates various stores under the dotlife, Apple Reseller, U-Store, iServe, and KOAN names. The company is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Copperwired Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Vnet Capital Co., Ltd.

It rents heavy machines for lifting, assembling, installing, and moving materials and equipment. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

CRC-R.BK.long_name: Central Retail Corporation Public Company Limited
CRC-R.BK.summary: Central Retail Corporation Public Company Limited operates as a multi-format multi-category retailing platform in Southeast Asia and Italy. It operates through Fashion, Hardline, and Food segments. The company sells fashion merchandise and other consumer products; consumer electronics, home decoration, construction materials, and DIY products; and grocery, organic and health foods, beverages, and consumer staples under a portfolio of retail banners. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 1,934 stores across 51 provinces in Thailand; 132 stores across 37 provinces in Vietnam; and 9 department stores in 8 cities in Italy. Central Retail Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CRD-R.BK.summary: Chiangmai Rimdoi Public Company Limited provides construction services in Thailand. It also offers solid waste disposal services. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Chiang Mai, Thailand.

CSC-R.BK.summary: Crown Seal Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes crowns and caps for bottles in Thailand and internationally. It operates through Manufacture and Sale of Caps; and Hire of Printing Sheets for Can segments. The company's products include crowns, pilfer-proof, Maxi crown, Maxi, Maxi-PG, plastic, and composite caps, which are used as container seals for various drinks, such as carbonated drinks, soy milk drinks, beers, soda water and energy drinks, fruit juices, liquors, chicken essences, bird's nests, and medical supplies, etc.; hand-crowners; and Maxi crimping machines. It also provides coating and printing services on steel plates and aluminum sheets. Crown Seal Public Company Limited was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Thanyaburi, Thailand.

CSP-R.BK.long_name: CSP Steel Center Public Company Limited
CSP-R.BK.summary: CSP Steel Center Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes steel products. It offers steel sheets in coils as master coils, steel plates, structural steel, and others for industrial and production applications; and imports and purchases steel products from suppliers. The company also provides hot-rolled and cold-rolled steel pipes; and specializes in customizing steel sheets to other shapes. It serves clients in the automobiles and motorcycles, home and electric appliances, steel furniture, general usage, and structure and construction industries. The company was formerly known as CSP Trading Company Limited and changed its name to CSP Steel Center Public Company Limited in July 2005. CSP Steel Center Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CSR-R.BK.summary: City Sports and Recreation Public Company Limited operates golf courses, restaurants, and sport clubs in Thailand. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CSS-R.BK.long_name: Communication & System Solution Public Company Limited
CSS-R.BK.summary: Communication & System Solution Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes and installs production equipment for electricity, water, air conditioning, and telecommunication systems in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Distribution Electrical Equipment and Installation Service. The Distribution Electrical Equipment segment supplies electrical cable and other electrical systems equipment, and passive fire protection materials and equipment. The Installation Service segment designs and installs telecommunication and fire protection systems. The company also distributes and installs tubes. Communication & System Solution Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

CTW-R.BK.long_name: Charoong Thai Wire and Cable Public Company Limited
CTW-R.BK.summary: Charoong Thai Wire and Cable Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electric wires and cables, and telephone cables under the CTW brand in Thailand, India, China, and internationally. It operates in four segments: Power Cable, Communication Cable, Enameled and Non-Enameled Wire, and Fiber Optic Cable. The company offers aluminum wires and cables, high-voltage and low voltage power cables, telecommunication cables, fire resistance and flame retardant cables, control and instrument cables, and other products, as well as aluminum/copper conductor cables. Further, it manufactures and distributes fiber optic cables; and enameled and non-enameled wires, including enameled copper and aluminum wires, and non-enameled copper wires. In addition, the company engages in the fabrication of copper rods. It serves government and private sector. Charoong Thai Wire and Cable Public Company Limited was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CWT-R.BK.long_name: Chai Watana Tannery Group Public Company Limited
CWT-R.BK.summary: Chai Watana Tannery Group Public Company Limited manufactures and exports leather finished products. It operates through six segments: Tannery Hide, Automotive Leather Cutting, Dog Chewable Toys, Furniture, Energy Business, and Design and Distribution of Aluminum Boat and Mini Bus. The company offers trim seat covers, steering wheels and gear knobs, and raw hide dog chews, as well as cutting, spray, and beam house and tanning services. In addition, it is involved in the design and distribution of boats and minibuses; rental of properties; provision of consulting services for renewable energy projects; waste management business; wholesale of wood chips; and generation and sale of electricity using waste fuels. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

D-R.BK.summary: Dental Corporation Public Company Limited provides dental services and products in Thailand. It provides dental diagnosis and general dentistry, oral surgery, dental implants, cosmetics dentistry, endodontic dentistry, periodontics dentistry, prosthodontic dentistry, and orthodontic dentistry services. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 17 branches. Dental Corporation Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

DCC-R.BK.summary: Dynasty Ceramic Public Company Limited manufactures, sells, and distributes ceramic wall and floor tiles in Thailand and internationally. The company offers its products under the Dynasty, Tile Top, Jaguar, Value, Mustang , Chicken, Birdie, Ducky, Swan, M, Cosmo, Rover, and Monte brands. The company was formerly known as Royal Floor Tiles Co. Ltd. Dynasty Ceramic Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

DCON-R.BK.summary: Dcon Products Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells construction supplies in Thailand. The company operates through Sales of Construction Supplies, Sales of Real Estate, and Real Estate for Lease segments. It provides pre-stressed planks and piles, cowboy fences, blocks, and fences and retaining walls under the DCON name; and precast floors, concrete posts, and other products. The company is also involved in the sale and lease of real estate properties. Dcon Products Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

DDD-R.BK.summary: Do Day Dream Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes skin care products and supplements in Thailand. The company, as an original equipment manufacturer, also manufactures and advices in various kinds of skin care products, including cosmetics, such as creams, serums, gels, sprays, mists, masks, etc. In addition, the company provides management, technical, financial, and enterprise services. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

DDD.BK.short_name: DO DAY DREAM PUBLIC COMPANY LIM
DDD.BK.long_name: Do Day Dream Public Company Limited
DDD.BK.summary: Do Day Dream Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes skin care products and supplements in Thailand. It offers its skin care products under the NAMU LIFE brand name. The company, as an original equipment manufacturer, also manufactures and advices in various kinds of skin care products, including cosmetics, such as creams, serums, gels, sprays, mists, masks, etc. In addition, the company provides management, technical, financial, and enterprise services. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

DEMCO-R.BK.summary: Demco Public Company Limited engages in the provision of electric system construction and service works in the fields of electric engineering and telecommunication in Thailand. The company operates through six segments: Sales, Electrical Work Services, Mechanical Work Services, Engagement Work Services, Electricity from Solar Power, and Other Services. The Sales segment produces and sells steel structure fabrications for electrical and telecommunication works. The Electrical Work Services segment designs, constructs, and manages electrical work. The Mechanical Work Services segment designs, constructs, and manages mechanical and electric systems and facilities, such as electrical, water management, air-conditioning and ventilation, and steam and hot water systems. The Engagement Work Services segment produces and installs fabricated steel structures and high pressure vessels. The Electricity from Solar Power segment generates and sells electricity from solar power. The Other Services segment provides civil work, communication, and other services. It also manufactures and trades in steel structures and steel towers; and trades in assembled telecommunication equipment, communication equipment, and electrical equipment, as well as sells construction materials. Demco Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

DEMCO.BK.summary: Demco Public Company Limited engages in the provision of electric system construction and service works in the fields of electric engineering and telecommunication in Thailand. The company operates through six segments: Sales, Electrical Work Services, Mechanical Work Services, Engagement Work Services, Electricity from Solar Power, and Other Services. The Sales segment produces and sells steel structure fabrications for electrical and telecommunication works. The Electrical Work Services segment designs, constructs, and manages electrical work. The Mechanical Work Services segment designs, constructs, and manages mechanical and electric systems and facilities, such as electrical, water management, air-conditioning and ventilation, and steam and hot water systems. The Engagement Work Services segment produces and installs fabricated steel structures and high pressure vessels. The Electricity from Solar Power segment generates and sells electricity from solar power. The Other Services segment provides civil work, communication, and other services. It also manufactures and trades in steel structures and steel towers; and trades in assembled telecommunication equipment, communication equipment, and electrical equipment, as well as sells construction materials. Demco Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

DHOUSE-R.BK.summary: Dhouse Pattana Public Company Limited engages in the development of real estate properties. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Maha Sarakham, Thailand.

DHOUSE.BK.summary: Dhouse Pattana Public Company Limited engages in the development of real estate properties. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Maha Sarakham, Thailand.

DIMET-R.BK.summary: Dimet (Siam) Public Company Limited manufactures and sells coating products in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Manufacturing and Sale of Coating Products, Construction Work, Sale of Construction Supplies, and Maintenance Services of Solar Farm and Others. The company also provides painting, construction, and hot dip galvanized services. In addition, it is involved in the provision of testing and calibration services for electrical and electronic equipment; distribution of thinners and steel towers; and generation, distribution, and transmission of electric power. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

DIMET.BK.summary: Dimet (Siam) Public Company Limited manufactures and sells coating products in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Manufacturing and Sale of Coating Products, Construction Work, Sale of Construction Supplies, and Maintenance Services of Solar Farm and Others. The company also provides painting, construction, and hot dip galvanized services. In addition, it is involved in the provision of testing and calibration services for electrical and electronic equipment; distribution of thinners and steel towers; and generation, distribution, and transmission of electric power. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

DLSF.F.summary: Delta Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, researches and develops, manufactures, and distributes power supplies and electronic components. The company operates through Power Electronics, Infrastructure, and Automation segments. It offers inductors, RF inductors, transformers, networking products, EMI filters, solenoids, current sensing resistors, and power modules; switching power supplies, standard power modules, and lighting ballasts and LED drivers; DC brushless fans and blowers, motors, thermal management products, cabinet thermal solutions, and ventilation and automotive fans; EV/HEV powertrain solutions and power electronics components; and display and visualization, mobile power, industrial power, and medical power products, as well as healthcare devices. The company also provides automation products and solutions, including drives, motion control systems, industrial control and communication products, power quality improvement products, human machine interfaces, sensors, meters, and robot solutions; and information monitoring and management systems, such as SCADA and industrial EMS for smart manufacturing solutions, as well as building automation solutions comprising building management and control, LED lighting, and intelligent surveillance products. In addition, it offers telecom power systems, networking systems, and UPS and datacenter infrastructure; and EV charging and energy storage systems, renewable energy systems, and high power motor drives. Further, the company rents properties. It operates in the United States, China, India, the Netherlands, Germany, Singapore, Malaysia, Taiwan, and internationally. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

DOD-R.BK.summary: DOD Biotech Public Company Limited engages in the food supplements and health drinks business in Thailand. The company provides skin care products, dietary supplements for body shape, and health food supplements. It also offers nutritional supplements under the brand name Daeto. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

DOHOME-R.BK.summary: Dohome Public Company Limited retails and wholesales construction materials, office equipment, and household products. The company also offers logistics and automated storage services, as well as produces and distributes electricity. In addition, it is involved in the property investment activities. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 15 outlets and 1 distribution center. Dohome Public Company Limited is headquartered in Ubon Ratchathani, Thailand.

DOHOME.BK.summary: Dohome Public Company Limited retails and wholesales construction materials, office equipment, and household products. The company also offers logistics and automated storage services, as well as produces and distributes electricity. In addition, it is involved in the property investment activities. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 15 outlets and 1 distribution center. Dohome Public Company Limited is headquartered in Ubon Ratchathani, Thailand.

DREIT.BK.long_name: Dusit Thani Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
DREIT.BK.summary: Dusit Thani Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is a real estate investment trust. The firm focuses on investing in high potential freehold or leasehold properties especially in hotel properties, as well as investing in other assets that favor hotel-related business, such as meeting and convention room, restaurants, fitness center, spa, swimming pool, tennis court etc. The firm is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

DRT-R.BK.long_name: Diamond Building Products Public Company Limited
DRT-R.BK.summary: Diamond Building Products Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes roof tiles, artificial woods, and autoclaved aerated concrete products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers roofing products, wall sidings and ceilings, and artificial boards, as well as equipment for installation of roofs and house structural members. It also provides services for design and installation of roofs under the Diamond Roof, Adamas, and Jearanai trademarks. The company was formerly known as Diamond Roofing Tiles Public Company Limited and changed its name to Diamond Building Products Public Company Limited in January 2011. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Saraburi, Thailand. Diamond Building Products Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Myriad Materials Co., Ltd.

DTAC-R.BK.long_name: Total Access Communication Public Company Limited
DTAC-R.BK.summary: Total Access Communication Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily provides wireless telecommunications services in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Mobile Telephone Service and Related Services; and Sales of Handsets and Starter Kits. It primarily offers its services in 800 MHz and 1800 MHz frequency bands. The company also provides asset management services; online payment services; and telecommunication equipment lease and device services. Total Access Communication Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

DTAC.BK.long_name: Total Access Communication Public Company Limited
DTAC.BK.summary: Total Access Communication Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily provides wireless telecommunications services in Thailand. The company also provides asset management services; online payment services; and telecommunication equipment lease and device services. Total Access Communication Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

DTC-R.BK.summary: Dusit Thani Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, owns and operates hotels and resorts in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Hotel and Hotel Management, Education, Foods, and Others. It operates hotels under the Dusit Thani, Dusit Devarana, dusitD2, Dusit Princess, ASAI HOTELS, and Dusit Residence brands; spas which provide various treatments, including massages, facials, body treatments, and various exclusive programs under the Devarana Spa, Namm Spa, DVN Spa, d v n urban, and dvn brands; and healthy food restaurants. The company also provides hotel management and consultancy services; as well as engages in the food and beverage catering business, and manufactures and distributes sauces, seasonings mixes, condiments, ready to eat meals, vegetarian food, and plant-based protein products. In addition, it operates Dusit Thani College that offers undergraduate and postgraduate hospitality degrees; Dusit Thani Excellence Centre, which provides short courses and corporate training services; and as a REIT manager for real estate investment trust. Further, the company is involved in the leasing and sub-leasing of properties business. Dusit Thani Public Company Limited was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

DTC.BK.summary: Dusit Thani Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, owns and operates hotels and resorts in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Hotel and Hotel Management, Education, Foods, and Others. DTCI-R.BK.summary: D.T.C. Industries Public Company Limited produces and distributes pens and related products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers ball point pens, markers, fine liners and hi-liters, retractable pencils, stamp pads and endorsing inks, erasers, wax crayons, lead dart pencil refills, metal pens, roller pens, and miscellaneous products. It also provides space rental; and packaging and printing services. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

DTCI.BK.summary: D.T.C. Industries Public Company Limited produces and distributes pens and related products in Thailand and internationally. DU4.SI.summary: Mermaid Maritime Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides subsea and drilling services to the offshore oil and gas industries in Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Thailand, Indonesia, Malaysia, and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Subsea Group and Holding. It provides subsea services, including inspection, repair and maintenance, infrastructure installation support, remotely operated vehicle (ROV) support, and cable and flexible pipe laying services through operating 7 subsea vessels, 17 saturation and air diving systems, and 13 ROV systems. The company also offers offshore drilling and accommodation rig services through its ownership in 1 tender assist drilling rig, 1 accommodation barge, and 3 high specification premium jack-up drilling rigs. In addition, it engages in the provision of hydrographic survey and positioning services; diving, ROV, and subsea contracting services; and production and exploration drilling services, as well as in the offshore transportation, installation, and decommissioning business. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Mermaid Maritime Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited.

EA-R.BK.summary: Energy Absolute Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes methyl ester biodiesel and glycerol products in Thailand. It also offers high speed diesel oil and glycerin products. In addition, the company provides electricity through solar and wind power plants; and consulting services in the project regarding alternative electric energy. Additionally, it operates charging stations; and researches and develops electricity vehicles and lithium-ion polymer batteries, as well as manufactures and distributes palm oil. The company was formerly known as Suntech Palm Oil Ltd. and changed its name to Energy Absolute Public Company Limited in 2008. Energy Absolute Public Company Limited was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

EASON-R.BK.summary: Eason & Co Public Company Limited manufactures and sells industrial and automotive paints primarily in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Automotive Paints, and Other Industrial Paints. It offers packaging coatings for interior and exterior application to crown caps, ROPP, screw caps, lug caps, and other closures. The company also provides offset inks comprising metal decorating inks for 2-piece cans; and conventional and UV metal decorating inks for 3-piece cans. In addition, it offers motorcycle coatings, including poly urethane, acrylic, and air dry paints, as well as trades in industrial paints. The company was formerly known as Eason Paint Public Company Limited and changed its name to Eason & Co Public Company Limited in May 2020. Eason & Co Public Company Limited was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Phan Thong, Thailand.

EASTW-R.BK.long_name: Eastern Water Resources Development and Management Public Company Limited
EASTW-R.BK.summary: Eastern Water Resources Development and Management Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and manages water distribution pipeline systems in the eastern seaboard area of Thailand. It produces and supplies tap water; provides waste treatment, waterworks management, operation and maintenance management, and engineering services; recycles water; supplies raw water; and offers renewable energy management services. Eastern Water Resources Development and Management Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

EASTW.BK.long_name: Eastern Water Resources Development and Management Public Company Limited

ECF-R.BK.long_name: East Coast Furnitech Public Company Limited
ECF-R.BK.summary: East Coast Furnitech Public Company Limited manufactures and sells self-assembled furniture in Thailand. The company manufactures, trades in, and distributes furniture made of particleboard and rubber wood under the ELEGA, Finna House, a7, Hasta, Costa, My Fur, VV DÃ©cor, FREELAX, and Leaf brand names, as well as dried rubber wood. It also manufactures and distributes foil paper, which is used in coating the particleboard and sawn timber, as well as offers edge-cutting service of (PVC) to be used in furniture assembly. The company distributes its furniture through showroom, wholesale shops, and retail shops, as well sells furniture online. In addition, it operates biomass and solar power plants. The company also exports its products to Japan, the United States, the Middle East, China, India, Malaysia, the Philippines, and other countries. East Coast Furnitech Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

ECGF.F.summary: Electricity Generating Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, generates and sells electricity to government sector and industrial users primarily in Thailand, the Philippines, and Australia. The company operates in two segments, Electricity Generation and Other Businesses. It generates electricity from various resources, such as natural gas, liquefied natural gas, coal, biomass, hydro, solar, wind, geothermal, and fuel cell. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 28 operating power plants with total equity contracted capacity of 5,475 MW in 6 countries in the Asia Pacific region; and 2 projects under construction with total equity contracted capacity of 171 MW. It also provides operation, maintenance, engineering, and construction services to power plants, petrochemical plants, oil refineries, and other industries. Electricity Generating Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ECL-R.BK.long_name: Eastern Commercial Leasing Public Company Limited
ECL-R.BK.summary: Eastern Commercial Leasing Public Company Limited provides credit services to personal and juristic person in the form of hire purchase, loans, and sale with right of redemption agreement in Thailand. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

EE-R.BK.summary: Eternal Energy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the cassava plantation activities in Thailand. The company is involved in the plantation of tapioca and other energy crops. It also rents real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Sea Horse Public Company Limited and changed its name to Eternal Energy Public Company Limited in October 2009. Eternal Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

EFORL-R.BK.short_name: E FOR L AIM PUBLIC COMPANY LIMI
EFORL-R.BK.long_name: E for L Aim Public Company Limited
EFORL-R.BK.summary: E for L Aim Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes medical devices and equipment to government and private sectors in Thailand and internationally. It operates in two segments, Distributor of Medical Devices and Equipment, and Beauty Treatments. The company also offers healthiness and beauty products, such as cosmetic, healthy drinks, and supplementary food products, as well as snail slime products; educational, and clinical and laboratory microscopes, as well as microscopes for biological scientific researches; and medical laboratory services. In addition, it offers franchising services; and operates a training center. The company was formerly known as Absolute Impact Public Company Limited and changed its name to E for L Aim Public Company Limited in September 2013. E for L Aim Public Company Limited was founded in 2005 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

EKH-R.BK.long_name: Ekachai Medical Care Public Company Limited
EKH-R.BK.summary: Ekachai Medical Care Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates Ekachai hospital in Thailand. It offers plastic surgery, fertility and genetic, pediatric, obstertrics and gynaecology, general medicine clinic, general surgery, orthopedics, ophthalmology, emergency, health promotion, hemodialysis, dental, physical, mobile checkup, pre-employment checkup, aesthetic and dermatology center, and child and teen development center services, as well as ambulatory care services for patients with injuries, functional limitations, disability, and diseases. Ekachai Medical Care Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Muang, Thailand.

EMC-R.BK.summary: EMC Public Company Limited engages in the provision of services under long-term service agreements and construction agreements in Thailand. It also provides real estate development services. The company was formerly known as EMC Engineering Limited Partnership. EMC Public Company Limited was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

EP-R.BK.long_name: Eastern Power Group Public Company Limited
EP-R.BK.summary: Eastern Power Group Public Company Limited engages in the solar power plant business. The company was formerly known as Eastern Printing Public Company Limited and changed its name to Eastern Power Group Public Company Limited in April 2020. Eastern Power Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

EPG-R.BK.long_name: Eastern Polymer Group Public Company Limited
EPG-R.BK.summary: Eastern Polymer Group Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the rubber insulation, automotive and packaging plastics, and other businesses in Thailand and internationally. It also manufactures bed liners and covers of pickup trucks, automotive accessories, plastic packaging, and rubber insulation products. In addition, the company is involved in the import and export of machinery and chemicals; manufacture of rubber for cars, machinery, buildings, and other products; assembly and distribution of molded plastic parts; and injection and molding of plastic parts. Further, it designs, manufactures, and trades in accessories for 2, 4WD, light commercial, and heavy transportation vehicles, as well as provides research and development, and calibration services. The company was formerly known as Eastern Polymer Industry Company Limited. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand. Eastern Polymer Group Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Vitoorapakorn Holding Co., Ltd.

ERW-R.BK.long_name: The Erawan Group Public Company Limited
ERW-R.BK.summary: The Erawan Group Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in hotel and building rental businesses in Thailand. The company operates hotels and resorts under the Grand Hyatt Erawan Bangkok, JW Marriott Bangkok, The Naka Island, Renaissance Koh Samui Resort and Spa, Courtyard by Marriott Bangkok, Holiday Inn Pattaya, Mercure Bangkok Siam, ibis Hotel, Novotel Bangkok Sukhumvit 4, Mercure Bangkok Sukhumvit 24, ibis Style Bangkok Sukhumvit 4, ibis Bangkok Siam, ibis Styles Krabi Ao Nang, ibis Pattaya, ibis Phuket Patong, ibis Phuket Kata, ibis Samui Bophut, ibis Hua Hin, and HOP INN names. As of December 31, 2019, it owned 70 hotels and 9,569 rooms. The company is also involved in the development of properties; provision of management services; rental of units in office buildings and shopping centers; and ownership of land. The Erawan Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ERW.BK.long_name: The Erawan Group Public Company Limited
ERW.BK.summary: The Erawan Group Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in hotel and building rental businesses in Thailand. The Erawan Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ESSO-R.BK.summary: Esso (Thailand) Public Company Limited refines and markets petroleum products in Thailand and internationally. It operates in two segments, Downstream and Petrochemicals. The company provides refined petroleum products, including motor gasoline, gasohol, diesel, aviation fuels, fuel oil, marine fuels, and LPG products; and other petroleum products comprising mineral and synthetic lubricants under the Mobil brand name, as well as asphalt. It offers its refined petroleum products through a retail network of 654 retail service stations under the Esso brand name; and commercial channel consists of sales to industrial end users and wholesalers, as well as to customers in the aviation and marine industries. The company also produces aromatics in the form of Paraxylene, a feedstock for purified terephthalic acid, as well as used as raw material for producing polyester films, packaging resins, and fabrics. In addition, it provides hydrocarbon solvents, such as hexane, which is used primarily in edible oil seed extractions and as a carrier in petrochemical production; rubber solvents that are used as adhesives and rubber cement for use in the manufacture of tires; white spirits for coating and paint industries; and Exxsol D80 for household, industrial, and metal working applications. Further, the company imports and markets aromatic solvents that are used in the automotive paint coating industry; and sells plasticizer for various applications. Additionally, it leases real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Esso Standard Thailand Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Esso (Thailand) Public Company Limited in 1996. The company was founded in 1894 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Esso (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of ExxonMobil Asia Holding Private Limited.

The company was founded in 1894 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Esso (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of ExxonMobil Asia Holding Private Limited.

ESTAR-R.BK.long_name: Eastern Star Real Estate Public Company Limited
ESTAR-R.BK.summary: Eastern Star Real Estate Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates in three segments: Real Estate Business, Golf Course Business, and Rental Business. The company develops and sells land, houses, and residential condominium units; and rents land and units in residential buildings. It also operates golf courses, as well as offers sport memberships. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ETE-R.BK.long_name: Eastern Technical Engineering Public Company Limited
ETE-R.BK.summary: Eastern Technical Engineering Public Company Limited provides installation services for electricity transmission and telecommunication networks primarily in Thailand. The company offers management and construction services; operates a solar power plant; and trades in safety equipment. It also provides personnel outsourcing and work force services, as well as engages in the engineering business. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

EVER-R.BK.summary: Everland Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development business in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Property Development, and Hospital and Dental Clinic. The company develops land for various residential properties, such as townhouses, single-detached houses, and condominiums. It is also involved in the operation and investment in private hospitals and dental clinics; and provision of land and hospital buildings for rent. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

F1P.F.summary: TTW Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells treated water in Thailand. The company supplies water to the Provincial Waterworks Authority in the Amphur Nakorn Chaisri, Amphur Sam Pran, and Amphur Budha Monthon areas of Nakhon Pathom; and Amphur Muang and Amphur Kratumban areas of Samut Sakhon under the water purchase agreement. It is also involved in the management of water production and distribution systems, and waste water treatment systems; and operation and maintenance of water supply project. The company was formerly known as Thai Tap Water Supply Public Company Limited and changed its name to TTW Public Company Limited in April 2014. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

FANCY-R.BK.long_name: Fancy Wood Industries Public Company Limited
FANCY-R.BK.summary: Fancy Wood Industries Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells wood furniture and rubber wood products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers particle board, modified rubber wood, and services related to rubber wood. It is also involved in real estate development activities, as well as rental of property. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

FANCY.BK.long_name: Fancy Wood Industries Public Company Limited

FARE.summary: World Moto, Inc. designs, manufactures, markets, and sells moto-meter products and services primarily in Thailand. Its principal product is the moto-meter, which provides moto-taxi fare metering and other communication capabilities. The company also develops moto-meter related smartphone application, which connects directly to the moto-meter through a secure Bluetooth connection and can access real-time data from the moto-meter, and enables customers to view driver profiles and ratings before getting on a motorcycle taxi. In addition, it develops Yes, a concierge service that enables persons to order products and have them delivered to their address by motor scooter; and HailYes, an integrated mobile platform, which instantly connects consumers to transport and commerce services in a local community, as well as Wheelies, an advertising product that displays static and streaming media on the wheels of motorcycles and automobiles. The company markets its products through social media, direct sales, and trade shows. World Moto, Inc. is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

FLOYD-R.BK.summary: Floyd Public Company Limited engages in the installation of utility and fire suppression systems in Thailand. It offers services in the areas of mains distribution, UPS, generators, general lighting and power, architectural lighting, HVAC, BMS, plumbing, gas systems, fire alarms, data and telecoms, MATV and CCTV, access control, and security systems. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

FMT-R.BK.long_name: Fine Metal Technologies Public Company Limited
FMT-R.BK.summary: Fine Metal Technologies Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes seamless copper tubes in Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore, Japan, and internationally. The company offers smooth, multi-grooved, accumulator, and capillary copper tubes. Its products are used as components in air-conditioner and refrigerator equipment. The company was formerly known as Furukawa Metal (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Fine Metal Technologies Public Company Limited in November 2020. Fine Metal Technologies Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

FN-R.BK.long_name: FN Factory Outlet Public Company Limited
FN-R.BK.summary: FN Factory Outlet Public Company Limited merchandises clothing and consumer products in Thailand. The company retails apparel and non-apparel goods through factory outlets. Its stores also offer clothes, beddings, leather, furniture, cosmetics, and household products; and accessories, such as shoes, bags, belt, and jewelries, as well as snacks. The company offers its products under the Inco Men, Monsieur Inco, Inco Women, Madame Inco, Cheval, Cheval Black Collection, Lady De Cheval, Cheval Kid, Sleepmate, Rollica, Prim, Cushy, and Cherish brands. As of June 30, 2020, it operates 13 branches. FN Factory Outlet Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

FNS-R.BK.summary: Finansa Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the investment, advisory, management, securities, and leasing businesses in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Investment, Advisory and Management Business; Securities Business; and Warehouse and Factory Leasing Business. It invests in and provides finance and management advisory services; and offers warehouse and factory leasing services. The company also provides investment banking services, such as advisory services in the areas of initial public offerings, mergers and acquisitions, limited recourse project financings, and debt-related transactions; underwriting; mutual fund selling agency; bond and proprietary trading; and investment and fund advisory services, as well as develops financial derivatives products. In addition, the company offers private equity investment and loan management services, as well as wealth management services. Finansa Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

FORTH-R.BK.summary: Forth Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes telecommunication and electronic equipment, and assembly electronic parts in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Electronics Manufacturing Service Business, Enterprise Solutions Business, and Smart Service Business. The Electronics Manufacturing Service Business segment procures, designs, produces, and assembles circuit boards and electronic devices; and sources and distributes electronic components and semiconductor raw materials. The Enterprise Solutions Business segment provides telecommunications networks design services; traffic light system integration and distribution services; electricity lamps and lighting equipment procurement and distribution services; electronic electricity meters products distribution services; and enterprise resource planning services, as well as produces and distributes satellite vehicle data transmission equipment. The Smart Service Business segment offers electronic payment services, payment services for business partners, and electronic money services, as well as personal loans; and operates a beverage vending machine and automatic products and offers pre-paid mobile phone top-up and online payment services, as well as operates e-marketplace for online trading and e-commerce. The company also provides consulting services for information management and computer software management; and engineering services. Forth Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

FPT-R.BK.summary: Frasers Property (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily develops industrial real estate properties in Thailand. The company develops, rents, and sells factories and warehouses, as well as manages 2.8 million square meters of factories and warehouses. It is also involved in the development of commercial and hospitality properties, as well as houses, lands, and mixed-use projects; development of residential properties, including rental and related service of commercial buildings; hotel business; and operation of a golf course. In addition, the company operates and manages serviced apartments, hotels, and office and commercial buildings; and operates as a sponsor and manager of the industrial real estate investment trust in Thailand. Further, it offers data center colocation, smart solutions, investment management, and treasury center development services. The company was formerly known as TICON Industrial Connection Public Company Limited and changed its name to Frasers Property (Thailand) Public Company Limited in January 2019. Frasers Property (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1990 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

FSMART-R.BK.summary: Forth Smart Service Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides various top-up services for prepaid phones in Thailand. The company also offers receipt of other online services; and advertising services through online top-up machines, as well as rendering of service relating to online top-up machines. In addition, it offers nano finance and personal loan services. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Forth Smart Service Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Forth Corporation Public Company Limited.

FSS-R.BK.long_name: Finansia Syrus Securities Public Company Limited
FSS-R.BK.summary: Finansia Syrus Securities Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates in the securities and derivatives brokerage business in Thailand. The company operates in three segments: Securities and Derivatives Brokerage, Investment Banking, and Proprietary Trading. It offers securities brokerage and trading, investment and financial advisory, securities underwriting, derivative brokering, securities borrowing and lending, and mutual fund and private fund management services. As of December 31, 2019, the company had 27 branches. The company was formerly known as Syrus Securities Public Company Limited and changed its name to Finansia Syrus Securities Public Company Limited in June 2009. Finansia Syrus Securities Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

FTE-R.BK.summary: Firetrade Engineering Public Company Limited designs, sells, installs, repairs, and maintains fire protection equipment and systems in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Sales of Fire Protection Equipment and Systems, and Project Works and Services. Its products include fire protection equipment and valves, sprinklers and nozzles, grooved coupling and fitting products, fire extinguishers, cold water and sanitary valves, and monitors, as well as clean agent fire suppression, water mist, fire alarm, ASD and linear heat detection, foam, kitchen fire protection, and fire pump systems. The company's products are used in kitchens, server rooms, flammable storage rooms, factories, museums, banks, buildings, etc. Firetrade Engineering Public Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

FTREIT.BK.long_name: Ticon Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
FTREIT.BK.summary: Ticon Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is a real estate investment trust externally managed by TICON Management Company Limited. The firm acquire, lease and/or sub-lease of immovable properties. It will take the transfer of the ownership and/or leasehold rights and/or sub-leasehold rights therein and seek benefits from those properties by way of lease, sub-lease, transferring and/or disposing of immovable properties the Trust invests in or acquires. Ticon Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust was formed on December 12, 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

FVC-R.BK.summary: Filter Vision Public Company Limited engages in the design, assembly, installation, maintenance, and distribution of pure water treatment systems in Thailand. It offers filter cartridges and filter housings, softeners, and vessel assemblies; water filtration systems, rainwater harvesting systems, water injection PAD, ozone spray bottles, and infection control hydro ozonizers; soup kettles, sandwich makers, food warmers, and fryers; and fiberglass filtration tanks, automatic filtration heads, ultraviolet disinfection machines, bun steamers, beverage dispensers, ice making machines, fountain drink dispensers, and pneumatic tube systems, as well as other products. The company also operates clinical centers for providing hemodialysis services for patients in end-stage chronic kidney disease; and rents, distributes, and maintains tools and diagnosis equipment for medical services, including medical supplies and appliances. In addition, it provides medical services and medical beauty treatment services. The company serves the commercial and residential, industrial and original equipment manufacturing, medical service, and medical beauty treatment service sectors. Filter Vision Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GBX-R.BK.summary: Globlex Holding Management Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the gold trading business in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Gold Bar Trading Business, Securities Business, and Other Business. It is also involved in the securities, investment, and financial advisory businesses. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

GBX.BK.long_name: Globlex Holding Management Public Company Limited

GC-R.BK.summary: Global Connections Public Company Limited engages in the wholesale of plastic and plastic-related products in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Commodity Polymer, Specialty and Engineering Polymer, and Specialty Chemical. It offers commodity polymers for use in the transformation process of general plastic-products; specialty and engineering polymers for use in engineering plastics/industrial products; and specialty chemicals and intermediates for use in additives and adhesives, petrochemicals, and industrial cleaning applications. The company also produces and distributes solar power installed on roof. Global Connections Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

GCAP-R.BK.summary: G Capital Public Company Limited provides credit for the hire purchase of agricultural machinery, and personal and retail business loans in Thailand. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GCB.F.long_name: PTT Global Chemical Public Company Limited
GCB.F.summary:
PTT Global Chemical Public Company Limited produces and distributes ethylene,
 propylene, polyethylene plastic pellets, and biochemical products. It operates through seven segments: Refinery, Aromatics, Olefins and Derivatives, Green Chemicals, Performance Materials and Chemicals, Service and Others, and Investments in Other Joint Ventures and Associates. The company offers refined products, including liquefied petroleum gas (LPG), light naphtha, reformate, jet fuel, diesel, and fuel oil. It also provides aromatics products, such as benzene, paraxylene, cyclohexane, and orthoxylene; olefins comprising ethylene and propylene, mixed c4, tail gas, cracker bottom, hydrogen, and pyrolysis gasoline; and polymers consisting of HDPE, LDPE, LLDPE, PP, PTA, PET, PS, and rotomolding compounds. In addition, the company offers EO-based performance products, including ethylene glycol and ethanolamine; green chemicals, such as methyl ester, glycerin, fatty acid and alcohol, ethoxylate, oleochemicals, and bioplastic; and phenol, bisphenol A, and acetone. Further, it provides hexamethylene diisocyanate and derivatives, as well as acrylonitrile and methyl methacrylate. Additionally, the company operates production support facilities, such as jetty and buffer tank farm services for liquid chemical, and oil and gas; and manufactures and distributes health and nutrition products. It also offers factory maintenance and engineering services; real estate development services; safety and environmental services; service for the storage and handling of liquid chemicals, oil, and gas; and research and development of bio-based chemicals. In addition, the company produces and distributes electricity, water, steam, and other utilities. It offers its products in Thailand, the People's Republic of China, Vietnam, Singapore, India, Malaysia, Indonesia, Japan, the United States, and internationally. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GEL-R.BK.summary: General Engineering Public Company Limited manufactures and sells concrete products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers rectangular, hollow, and I-shape prestressed concrete pile products for use in government units, state enterprises, department stores, factories, universities, airports, housing developments and bridge works, etc.; precast concrete walls that are used in factories, department stores, high-rise buildings, stadiums, etc.; precast concrete slabs without beams for car park buildings and high rise building floors; and semi-finished slabs for use in factory and bridge works. It also provides fiber glass reinforced concrete products; special cement products for use in power plants, petro chemical plants, oil refineries, steel works, paper factories, sugar mills, etc. under the Denka and DENKA Capsule brands; noise barrier products that are used in expressways, highways, underground tunnels, power plants, and factories; and super skim coat for wall decorations. In addition, the company offers post-tension slabs, construction chemicals, electric concrete poles, diaphragm walls, and barrette piles, as well as provides manufacturing and installation services for its products. Further, it distributes steel bars and ready-mixed concrete products that are used in construction, as well as manufactures and sells PC wires and strands. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

GENCO-R.BK.long_name: General Environmental Conservation Public Company Limited
GENCO-R.BK.summary: General Environmental Conservation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the treatment and disposal of industrial waste and unavoidable by-products of manufacturing processes in Thailand. It collects, stores, and transports hazardous and non-hazardous industrial waste. The company also develops and sells various real estate properties, including residential townhouses, commercial buildings, and condominiums primarily in the greater Bangkok Metropolitan area, as well as buys, develops, and sells land. In addition, it operates renewable energy power plants. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

GFPT-R.BK.summary: GFPT Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes frozen and cooked chicken products in Thailand and internationally. The company is involved in the chicken evisceration activities; producing and distributing processed chicken food and by-products; and operating a feed mill and parent chicken farm for egg production and distribution. It also operates a grandparent chicken farm for parent stock chicks production and distribution; a parent chicken farm and hatchery for chicks production and distribution; and a broiler farm. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GGC-R.BK.long_name: Global Green Chemicals Public Company Limited
GGC-R.BK.summary: Global Green Chemicals Public Company Limited produces, distributes, and transports oleochemical products in Thailand, the People's Republic of China, India, Korea, and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Methyl Ester and Fatty Alcohols. It provides methyl ester, which is used as an ingredient in biodiesel as alternative chemicals; and fatty alcohols that are used in various goods, including plasticizers, solvents, flavorings, fragrances, detergents, foam stabilizers, lubricants, cosmetics, plastic intermediates, shampoos, paints and coatings, textile and leather auxiliaries, and printing inks. The company also offers refined glycerine, which is used for pharmaceutical and medical products, creams and lotions, oral cares, resins, plastics, and tobacco; and used as a means of emollient to provide lubrication and moisture for personal care products, as well as used as emulsifier for other industrial applications. In addition, it provides fatty acid; fatty amine; other alcohol's ester; other by products, such as crude glycerine, yellow glycerine, potassium sulfate, and methyl ester and fatty alcohol residues; and sells raw materials. The company was formerly known as Thai Oleochemicals Company Limited. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Global Green Chemicals Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of PTT Global Chemical Public Company Limited.

It provides methyl ester, which is used as an ingredient in biodiesel as alternative chemicals; and fatty alcohols that are used in various goods, including plasticizers, solvents, flavorings, fragrances, detergents, foam stabilizers, lubricants, cosmetics, plastic intermediates, shampoos, paints and coatings, textile and leather auxiliaries, and printing inks. The company also offers refined glycerine, which is used for pharmaceutical and medical products, creams and lotions, oral cares, resins, plastics, and tobacco; and used as a means of emollient to provide lubrication and moisture for personal care products, as well as used as emulsifier for other industrial applications. In addition, it provides fatty acid; fatty amine; other alcohol's ester; other by products, such as crude glycerine, yellow glycerine, potassium sulfate, and methyl ester and fatty alcohol residues; and sells raw materials. The company was formerly known as Thai Oleochemicals Company Limited. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Global Green Chemicals Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of PTT Global Chemical Public Company Limited.

GIFT-R.BK.summary: Gratitude Infinite Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, supplies and distributes chemical products in Thailand. The company also sells oil-refinery and power plant equipment, pharmaceutical and medical products; and fragrances and skincare-cosmetic products. The company was formerly known as Union Intraco Public Company Limited and changed its name to Gratitude Infinite Public Company Limited in December 2014. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Gratitude Infinite Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Union Petrochemical Public Company Limited.

GJS-R.BK.short_name: G J STEEL PUBLIC COMPANY LIMITE
GJS-R.BK.long_name: G J Steel Public Company Limited
GJS-R.BK.summary: G J Steel Public Company Limited manufactures and sells flat-rolled steel products in Thailand. The company offers commercial/drawing, structural, pipe, automotive, atmospheric corrosion resistance, and gas cylinder and pressure vessel steel products. It also provides business consulting services. The company was formerly known as Nakornthai Strip Mill Public Company Limited and changed its name to G J Steel Public Company Limited in June 2008. G J Steel Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GLAND-R.BK.long_name: Grand Canal Land Public Company Limited
GLAND-R.BK.summary: Grand Canal Land Public Company Limited develops real estate properties in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Real Estate for Sale Business, and Real Estate for Rental and Service Business. The Real Estate for Sale Business segment develops land and house, and residential condominium projects. The Real Estate for Rental and Service Business segment rents office buildings. Grand Canal Land Public Company Limited also manages a real estate investment trust; and operates hotels. The company was formerly known as Media of Medias Public Company Limited and changed its name to Grand Canal Land Public Company Limited in May 2010. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Grand Canal Land Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of CPN Pattaya Company Limited.

GLOCON-R.BK.summary: Global Consumer Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells plastic packaging products primarily in Thailand. It offers flexible packaging products, such as roll-film rolls, enter seals, die cut bags, center seals, 3 side seals, zipper bags, and stand up zipper pouches for various types of consumer products; plastic trays and other plastic products; and polyethylene terephthalate bottles for consumer products. The company also provides rental service in shopping mall and restaurant equipment rental service; operates quick services restaurants under the A&W name; and manufactures and sells frozen foods, ready meals, and seafood and vegetable products. In addition, it is involved in the network marketing, trading, and distribution of food packaging businesses. The company was formerly known as NPPG (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Global Consumer Public Company Limited in October 2019. Global Consumer Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

GPI-R.BK.long_name: Grand Prix International Public Company Limited
GPI-R.BK.summary: Grand Prix International Public Company Limited operates automotive-related exhibitions in Thailand and internationally. The company organizes events, such as motor sport, quarter mile, off road car, and motorcycle racing activities; and automotive testing, Caravan rally, and safe driving exercise services. It also publishes and distributes auto-related print media, such as Grand Prix, off road, Motorcycle, and XO Autosport magazines, as well as YuadYan Newspaper, life style magazine, and Garage Life; and offers broader and digital media services. In addition, the company provides printing services to enterprise customers in various industries, such as fashion, textile, food, real estate, tourism, automobile industries, government, direct sale, etc. Further, it provides advertising media services in printing, television, and Website. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GPSC-R.BK.long_name: Global Power Synergy Public Company Limited
GPSC-R.BK.summary: Global Power Synergy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and distribution of electricity, steam, and water for industrial purpose in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Independent Power Producer, Small Power Producer, and Others. It generates electricity through solar, hydropower, and cogeneration power plants. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GPSC.BK.long_name: Global Power Synergy Public Company Limited
GPSC.BK.summary: Global Power Synergy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and distribution of electricity, steam, and water for industrial purpose in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Independent Power Producer, Small Power Producer, and Others. It generates electricity through solar, hydropower, and cogeneration power plants. GRAMMY-R.BK.summary: GMM Grammy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in music, satellite television, movies, and home shopping businesses in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Music and Others. It is involved in the production, marketing, and distribution of music products, as well as content management; music distribution in terms of physical and digital products; show business; artist management business; organization of various concerts and music festivals; and copyright and artist management activities. The company also operates digital television channels and three radio stations; produces television programs, such as dramas, news, variety, and games shows; rents studios, as well as engages in wholesale and retail activities. In addition, it produces and distributes satellite television and digital television receivers; operates satellite television platform; and produces movies. Further, the company engages in satellite television set-top-boxes distribution and call center businesses, as well as operates vocal and music schools. It manages artists, singers, actors, and actresses; and offers digital music content through gmember.com and iTunes Store. The company was formerly known as Grammy Entertainment Public Company Limited and changed its name to GMM Grammy Public Company Limited in 2001. GMM Grammy Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GRDAF.summary: Guardforce AI Co., Limited offers cash solutions and cash handling services in Thailand. The company's services include cash-in-transit, vehicles to banks, ATM management, cash center operations, cash processing, coin processing, and cheque center services, as well as cash deposit machine solutions comprising cash deposit management and express cash services. Its customers include local commercial banks, chain retailers, coin manufacturing mints, and government authorities. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

GSC-R.BK.long_name: Global Service Center Public Company Limited
GSC-R.BK.summary: Global Service Center Public Company Limited provides customer support and collection services in Thailand. The company offers call center, customer service, technical support, telemarketing, and telesales and collection services for phone, computer network, and other telecommunication systems. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Global Service Center Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited.

GTB-R.BK.summary: Getabec Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes steam and hot water boilers in Thailand and internationally. The company offers steam, hot water, waste heat, biomass, coal circulating fluidized bed, double flame tube, and water tube boilers; thermal oil heaters; and getabeckessel, and heat recovery and quick steam generators, as well as Smart Boilers 4.0, a boiler monitoring system. It also provides boiler plants engineering, installation, erection, commissioning, maintenance, and repair services, as well as offers spare parts. The company was formerly known as German-Thai Boiler Engineering Cooperation Company Limited and changed its name to Getabec Public Company Limited in September 2015. Getabec Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

GULF-R.BK.long_name: Gulf Energy Development Public Company Limited
GULF-R.BK.summary: Gulf Energy Development Public Company Limited produces and sells electricity, steam, and cold water to public and private clients in Thailand and internationally. It operates in three segments: Power Business, Consulting Business, and Infrastructure Business. The company generates electricity through gas-fired and renewable power projects under the independent power producers, small power producers, and very small power producers programs. It has a total gross installed power capacity of 11,910 MW. The company also undertakes infrastructure projects; and operates in natural gas related businesses, including procurement, and marketing and trading of natural gas. In addition, it engages in the trading activities; and the provision of managerial, technical, and supporting services. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GUNKUL-R.BK.summary: Gunkul Engineering Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, imports, and exports electrical systems and equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company offers components for solar, wind turbine, biomass, hydro, combined cycle, and thermal electricity generation plants. It also provides cables and accessories, fuses and switches, hardware and connectors, insulators, lightning protection products, maintenance equipment, tools and instruments, batteries and chargers, capacitors, meters, transformers, live part covers, grounding and preformed products, explosion proof products, lightening and control products, and hardware products for transmission lines, substations, distribution lines, and low voltage lines. In addition, the company generates and sells electricity from renewable energy resources comprising solar and wind energy, as well as produces and assembles LED products. Further, it constructs alternative energy power plants, as well as provides operation and post-construction maintenance services for the solar farms. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GVREIT.BK.long_name: Golden Ventures Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
GVREIT.BK.summary: Golden Ventures Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust, a real estate investment trust, engages in the rental of properties in Thailand. It holds leasehold rights of Park Ventures Ecoplex building, as well as land and building sub-lease rights of Sathorn Square located at the Central Business District of Thailand. The company has elected to be taxed as a real estate investment trust. As a result, it would not be subject to corporate income tax on that portion of its net income that is distributed to shareholders. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

GYT-R.BK.summary: Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and sells motor vehicle and aero tires in Thailand. The company also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Pathumthani, Thailand. Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company.

GYT.BK.summary: Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and sells motor vehicle and aero tires in Thailand. The company also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Pathumthani, Thailand. Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company.

HANA-R.BK.summary: Hana Microelectronics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and trades in electronic components. It offers printed circuit board and integrated circuit assemblies, as well as produces liquid crystal on silicon devices that are being used for microdisplays and optical telecommunications components. The company also provides agent and customer services. It has operations in Malaysia, China, the United States, Singapore, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

HARN-R.BK.long_name: Harn Engineering Solutions Public Company Limited
HARN-R.BK.summary: Harn Engineering Solutions Public Company Limited engages in the wholesale, retail, repair, renting, leasing, contracting, and installation of fire protection systems and fire suppression agents in Thailand. The company offers sprinklers, fire hose cabinets, floor control valves, pump room, and fire extinguishers for fire protection and safety solutions; and compressors, unit coolers, controllers, inverters, condensing units, refrigerants, and fans for refrigeration, as well as cooling system controlling devices. It also provides air-conditioning and sanitary solutions, such as chillers, cooling towers, PICV, and air handling and fan coil units; and digital printing solutions, including coding and marking solutions, variable QR/2D coding solutions, digital color label press solutions, and after sales services, as well as 3D printers, software packages, scanners, and printing services. In addition, the company is involved in the trading of cold storage devices; and trading, repairing, and renting of printing equipment. The company was formerly known as Fire Victor Public Company Limited and changed its name to Harn Engineering Solutions Public Company Limited in November 2016. Harn Engineering Solutions Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

HFT-R.BK.long_name: Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited
HFT-R.BK.summary: Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes tires and inner tubes in Thailand, rest of Asia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Sale of Goods and Investment. It offers tires and tubes for bicycles, motorcycles, and small logistics vehicles. The company markets its products under the DUNLOP, DURO, Q-UICK, and PREMIUM HFT brands. It is also involved in investing in bonds and securities; and the wholesale and retail trade of tires and tubes, and equipment for vehicles. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand. Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Hwa Fong Rubber Industries Company Limited.

HMPRO-R.BK.long_name: Home Product Center Public Company Limited
HMPRO-R.BK.summary: Home Product Center Public Company Limited operates as a home improvement retailer in Thailand and Malaysia. The company trades in a range of goods and materials for construction, addition, refurbishment, renovation, and enhancement of buildings, houses, and residences; and provides a range of related services. It also offers 3D, installation, maintenance, home makeover, warehousing, and distribution services. In addition, the company rents space. As of December 31, 2019, it had 113 branches. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

HNQ.SG.summary: U City Public Company Limited operates as a diversified real estate investment and development company in Thailand and internationally. The company operates in three segments: Hotel Business; Rental and Management Business; and Real Estate for Sale Business. It develops, rents, and sells real estate properties; leases land and structures; invests in securities; and manages and operates golf course and sports club, as well as manages and operates hotels; owns property; and engages in the office rental business. The company was formerly known as Natural Park Public Company Limited and changed its name to U City Public Company Limited in April 2015. U City Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
