HPT-R.BK.summary: Home Pottery Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and sells fine China tableware in Thailand. The company offers its products and accessories for hotels and restaurants. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Lampang, Thailand.

HPT.BK.summary: Home Pottery Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and sells fine China tableware in Thailand. The company offers its products and accessories for hotels and restaurants. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Lampang, Thailand.

HTC-R.BK.summary: Haad Thip Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes soft drinks primarily in Southern Thailand. Its products and brands include Coca Cola, Coke Light, Coke Zero, Fanta, Sprite, Schweppes, Root Beer A&W, Minute Maid Splash, Minute Maid pulpy, Minute Maid Vitamin Kids, and Namthip water. The company manufactures and distributes plastic bottles and semi-finished plastic bottles; and provides plastic bottles blowing service. Haad Thip Public Company Limited is headquartered in Songkhla, Thailand.

The company manufactures and distributes plastic bottles and semi-finished plastic bottles; and provides plastic bottles blowing service. Haad Thip Public Company Limited is headquartered in Songkhla, Thailand.

HTECH-R.BK.summary: Halcyon Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells cutting tools, jig and fixtures, and custom metallic devices in Thailand and internationally. The company offers polycrystalline diamond (PCD) endmills, reamers, hollow tools, inserts, boring tools, brazed tools, chipbreakers, face mills, and other customized PCD tools, as well as monoblocks; polycrystalline carbon boron nitride (PCBN) inserts and boring tools; monocrystalline diamond cutting tools; and special carbide cutting tools, such as carbide inserts, boring tools, drills, endmills, reamers, hollow tools, and micro drills. It also provides customized metal fabricated products, such as cutting tool holders, jigs and fixtures, and other high-precision parts. In addition, the company distributes and retails PCD and PCBN cutting tools under various brands comprising Kyocera, Widia, Vargus, etc.; and automated industrial vending machine under the AutoCrib brand. It serves manufacturers of electronic parts, automotive parts, aerospace parts, and other mechanical related industries. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

HTU.F.summary: POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited produces, sells, and exports cold-rolled stainless steel products in Thailand and internationally. It offers austenitic and ferritic stainless steel products used as raw material in the production of automotive and transportation parts; electrical home appliances; kitchenware; food processing and medical equipment; heavy industry, energy, and environmental equipment; and architecture, building, and construction equipment. The company was formerly known as Thainox Stainless Public Company Limited and changed its name to POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited in 2011. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of POSCO.

I93.F.summary: Indorama Ventures Public Company Limited produces and distributes polyethylene terephthalate (PET), purified terephthalic acid (PTA), paraxylene, isophthalic acid, ethylene oxide and ethylene glycol, naphthalene dicarboxylate (NDC), polyester fibers and yarns, and wool products. It operates in five segments: Integrated PET, Integrated Oxides and Derivatives, Fibers, Specialty Chemicals, and Packaging. \The company produces various PET resins, including hot fill, low and high IV, heavy metal free, plant PET, fast re-heat, and general grade products to serve beverages, pharmaceuticals, homecare, and industrial packaging applications, as well as PET packaging materials, such as PET preforms, bottles, and closures. It also provides ethylene glycol used as raw material in the production of polyester fibers, PET, antifreeze, films, and chips; monoethylene glycol for use in polyester polymer production and antifreeze industry; diethylene glycol for unsaturated polyester resin, polyurethanes, and liquid detergent production, as well as cement grinding; triethylene glycol for oil and gas industry and natural gas dehydration; and ethylene oxide. In addition, the company offers polyolefin and polyester fibers, yarns, and chips for various market verticals, such as non-woven, home textile, technical textile, automotive, and apparel; and bicomponent fibers. Further, it produces worsted wool yarns that are used in various applications, such as woven and non-woven products, active apparels, and technical and interior textiles. The company operates in Thailand, North America, Europe, and internationally. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Indorama Ventures Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Indorama Resources Limited.

In addition, the company offers polyolefin and polyester fibers, yarns, and chips for various market verticals, such as non-woven, home textile, technical textile, automotive, and apparel; and bicomponent fibers. Further, it produces worsted wool yarns that are used in various applications, such as woven and non-woven products, active apparels, and technical and interior textiles. The company operates in Thailand, North America, Europe, and internationally. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Indorama Ventures Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Indorama Resources Limited.

ICC-R.BK.summary: I.C.C. International Public Company Limited distributes consumer products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Cosmetics Toiletries & Perfumeries; Women's Apparel; and Men's Apparel. It offers tops, pants, blazers, dresses, skirts, sportswear, lingerie and night wear, maternity wear, bags, shoes, accessories, cosmetics, and other products for women; and shirts and T-shirts, trousers, jackets, sportswear, underwear, blazers and suits, bags, shoes, accessories, and other products for men. The company also provides tops, pants, skirts, underwear, bags, shoes, accessories, beds, and other products for kids and babies, as well as products for newborn. In addition, it offers leather goods, watches, home appliances, foods, soy milk mixed with corn, drinking and spring water, etc., as well as and household items, such as laundry detergent and fabric care products. Further, the company is also involved in the manufacturing of ready-made garments; and real estate activities. It sells its products through shops and department stores, as well as online channels. The company was formerly known as International Cosmetics Public company Limited and changed its name to I.C.C. International Public Company Limited in 1996. I.C.C. International Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ICHI-R.BK.summary: Ichitan Group Public Company Limited manufactures and sells ready-to-drink tea beverage in Thailand. It offers green tea under the Ichitan Green Tea and Shizuoka Green Tea brands; herbal drink under the Yen Yen by Ichitan brand; green tea mixed nanta de coco products under the Ichitan Chew Chew brand; juice mixed jelly and juice non-carbonated beverage under the Bireley's brand; and energy drink under the T247 brand. The company was formerly known as Mai Tan Company Limited. Ichitan Group Public Company Limited was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ICHI.BK.summary: Ichitan Group Public Company Limited manufactures and sells ready-to-drink tea beverage in Thailand. It offers green tea under the Ichitan Green Tea and Shizuoka Green Tea brands; herbal drink under the Yen Yen by Ichitan brand; green tea mixed nanta de coco products under the Ichitan Chew Chew brand; juice mixed jelly and juice non-carbonated beverage under the Bireley's brand; and energy drink under the T247 brand. The company was formerly known as Mai Tan Company Limited. Ichitan Group Public Company Limited was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ICN-R.BK.long_name: Information and Communication Networks Public Company Limited
ICN-R.BK.summary: Information and Communication Networks Public Company Limited operates as a telecommunication system integrator company in Thailand. The company provides construction services for telecommunication networks; various services for the expansion of the installed base; and services for the improvement, upgrade, and alteration of software/ firmware/ license and/or hardware of telecommunication networks. It also offers electrical system installation services; designing and installing services for various other systems, such as mechanical and electrical, air refrigeration and control, automatic fire detection and alarm, and security systems for data centers; and develops supervisory control and data acquisition that facilitate data validation and analysis for monitoring the status of information and controlling industrial and engineering systems, telecommunication and communication, water supply, wastewater treatment, energy management, etc. In addition, the company distributes telecommunication spare parts to support wired and wireless networks comprising 3G/4G or LTE mobile systems, Internet protocol (IP) network for the Internet of Things, optical and microwave networks, SIM card security verification systems, synchronization systems for telecommunication devices to prevent mismatch in data communication, IT infrastructure servers and storage for cloud computing, mobile device management for subscribers' system monitoring and management, software defined networks for data center management, and fiber optic cables and installation-related equipment. Further, it provides preventive, corrective, and proactive/adaptive maintenance services for main mobile exchange, mobile equipment of the base stations, optical and microwave networks, IP routers/carrier switches, and IP networks for voice, video telephony, images, and data. Information and Communication Networks Public Company Limited was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IFS-R.BK.summary: IFS Capital (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides factoring, hire purchase, leasing, and office rental services. The company offers factoring services for traders; manufacturers of electronics, packaging, automobile parts, plastic products, etc.; and providers of services, such as advertising agency, security guard, manpower supply, etc. It is also involved in the leasing and hire purchase of machinery, instruments, vehicles, and other equipment. In addition, the company offers confirming LC/TR, inventory financing, and contract financing services, as well as provides auto financing for passenger cars, pickups, trucks, and vans. Further, it offers block discounting services that consist of financing a trader's hire purchase, credit sale, and rental agreements. It operates in Malaysia, Indonesia, Singapore, and Thailand. IFS Capital (Thailand) Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

IHL-R.BK.summary: Interhides Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes leather coverings for car seats and other related products in Thailand, England, China, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines, Japan, Hong Kong, Vietnam, and Switzerland. It offers finished leather products, cut parts, and trim covers for use in car seats, steering wheels, and gear knobs, as well as lining leather and safety shoes. The company also provides spray and tanning services; and bleaching, dyeing finishing, and other services. In addition, it manufactures and distributes hydrolyzed protein from leather scrap. The company also exports its products. It primarily serves automotive industry. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

IHL.BK.summary: Interhides Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes leather coverings for car seats and other related products in Thailand, England, China, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines, Japan, Hong Kong, Vietnam, and Switzerland. It offers finished leather products, cut parts, and trim covers for use in car seats, steering wheels, and gear knobs, as well as lining leather and safety shoes. The company also provides spray and tanning services; and bleaching, dyeing finishing, and other services. In addition, it manufactures and distributes hydrolyzed protein from leather scrap. The company also exports its products. It primarily serves automotive industry. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

IIG-R.BK.summary: I&I Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a digital and technology consulting company in Thailand. The company provides consultation on computer systems and sell subscription and support on computer software licenses. It also offers services in the areas of business analytics and marketing strategy, data management and technology, customer relationship and experience management, and cross-channel and campaign management. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Ratchathewi, Thailand.

III-R.BK.long_name: Triple i Logistics Public Company Limited
III-R.BK.summary: Triple i Logistics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides domestic and international freight forwarding and integrated logistics services. It operates through Air freight; Sea and In-Land Freight Logistics Management; Chemical and Hazardous Goods Logistics; and Other Management Services segments. The company offers air freight services, such as wholesale air freight, forwarding, general sales agency for airlines, and airport cargo terminal services; sea freight and inland transportation services, including shipping line agency, less than container load, and inland container transport services; logistic management, and warehouse and distribution services; and chemical and specialty logistics services, such as hazardous and dangerous goods logistics integrating, and dangerous goods packaging solutions. It also provides packaging services. In addition, the company offers office rental and other management services. Triple i Logistics Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ILINK-R.BK.summary: Interlink Communication Public Company Limited imports and distributes IT network cabling system products in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Distribution Business, Telecommunication Business, and Engineering Business. It also outsources design and installation service of network and cabling system for computers and telecommunications. In addition, the company operates as a telecommunication service provider, which invests in the construction of fiber-optic cable network to provide high-speed leased line service; and a contractor in submarine cable and transmission lines, including fiber optic and high voltage. Further, it provides data center services, such as co-location, cloud computing, and disaster recovery to enterprise customers. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ILINK.BK.summary: Interlink Communication Public Company Limited imports and distributes IT network cabling system products in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Distribution Business, Telecommunication Business, and Engineering Business. It also outsources design and installation service of network and cabling system for computers and telecommunications. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ILM-R.BK.long_name: Index Living Mall Public Company Limited
ILM-R.BK.summary: Index Living Mall Public Company Limited engages in the retail and wholesale of furniture, electronic, and home decorative products in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Retail of Furniture, Manufacturing of Furniture, Rental Area, and Others. It is also involved in the manufacture, import, export, and distribution of furniture and home appliances; and building and warehouse rental activities, as well as in the franchise business. Index Living Mall Public Company Limited sells its products through 36 branches, as well as online. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Index Living Mall Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Tummada Panich Family Co., Ltd.

IMH-R.BK.long_name: Intermedical Care and Lab Hospital Public Company Limited
IMH-R.BK.summary: Intermedical Care and Lab Hospital Public Company Limited operates occupational medicine hospital in Thailand. It also engages in the environmental analysis business. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IMH.BK.long_name: Intermedical Care and Lab Hospital Public Company Limited
IMH.BK.summary: Intermedical Care and Lab Hospital Public Company Limited operates occupational medicine hospital in Thailand. It also engages in the environmental analysis business. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IND-R.BK.long_name: Index International Group Public Company Limited
IND-R.BK.summary: Index International Group Public Company Limited operates as an engineering consultancy company in Thailand. The company provides a range of services in specialized fields, such as project planning; city and district planning; architectural design involving landscaping and architecture; and engineering design involving structural, electrical, mechanical, transportation, sanitary, geotechnical, environmental, and water resources engineering. Its services also comprise master planning in the fields of site reconnaissance and survey, socio-economic survey and analysis, and feasibility analysis; and complete design and engineering services for construction and contract bidding, such as preliminary engineering design, detailed engineering design, scale models when required, specification and drawings, bills of quantities, other technical description required for procurement and construction, and geographic information system. In addition, the company offers project management/construction supervision and designÂbuild services. Index International Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is based in Pathumthani, Thailand.

INDOY.summary: Indorama Ventures Public Company Limited produces and distributes polyethylene terephthalate (PET), purified terephthalic acid (PTA), paraxylene, isophthalic acid, ethylene oxide and ethylene glycol, naphthalene dicarboxylate (NDC), polyester fibers and yarns, and wool products. It operates in five segments: Integrated PET, Integrated Oxides and Derivatives, Fibers, Specialty Chemicals, and Packaging. \The company produces various PET resins, including hot fill, low and high IV, heavy metal free, plant PET, fast re-heat, and general grade products to serve beverages, pharmaceuticals, homecare, and industrial packaging applications, as well as PET packaging materials, such as PET preforms, bottles, and closures. It also provides ethylene glycol used as raw material in the production of polyester fibers, PET, antifreeze, films, and chips; monoethylene glycol for use in polyester polymer production and antifreeze industry; diethylene glycol for unsaturated polyester resin, polyurethanes, and liquid detergent production, as well as cement grinding; triethylene glycol for oil and gas industry and natural gas dehydration; and ethylene oxide. In addition, the company offers polyolefin and polyester fibers, yarns, and chips for various market verticals, such as non-woven, home textile, technical textile, automotive, and apparel; and bicomponent fibers. Further, it produces worsted wool yarns that are used in various applications, such as woven and non-woven products, active apparels, and technical and interior textiles. The company operates in Thailand, North America, Europe, and internationally. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Indorama Ventures Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Indorama Resources Limited.

INET-R.BK.summary: Internet Thailand Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides Internet access, and information technology and communication integrated services for businesses and individuals in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Access Business and Business Solutions. It offers full Internet access services with various speeds through leased lines and MetroLAN network connected to the offices' Intranet networks; and Internet data center services comprising business continuity planning/disaster recovery center, co-location, INET security center, and server leasing services for business organizations or agencies that need to present data through Internet/Intranet for public and private networks. The company also provides cloud services, which is a virtual computing service that includes infrastructure as a service, platform as a service, and software as a service; and EDC network pool services, which is a credit card payment system center linked between banks and other merchants through telecommunications networks, such as landline telephone, mobile phone, and Internet. In addition, it offers online applications, such as online recruitment, mail services, etc. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

In addition, it offers online applications, such as online recruitment, mail services, etc. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

INGRS-R.BK.summary: Ingress Industrial (Thailand) Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and distribution of automotive components in Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia, and India. The company offers roll forming products, such as door sashes, rain rails, glass guides, bellows, and EGR pipes and cover, as well as beltline, roof, window, and hinge mouldings; stamping products; and tool making and automation solutions. It also provides engineering and automatic production system design services. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Ingress Industrial (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Ingress Corporation Berhad.

INGRS.BK.summary: Ingress Industrial (Thailand) Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and distribution of automotive components in Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia, and India. The company offers roll forming products, such as door sashes, rain rails, glass guides, bellows, and EGR pipes and cover, as well as beltline, roof, window, and hinge mouldings; stamping products; and tool making and automation solutions. It also provides engineering and automatic production system design services. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Ingress Industrial (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Ingress Corporation Berhad.

INOX-R.BK.summary: POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited produces, sells, and exports cold-rolled stainless steel products in Thailand and internationally. It offers austenitic and ferritic stainless steel products used as raw material in the production of automotive and transportation parts; electrical home appliances; kitchenware; food processing and medical equipment; heavy industry, energy, and environmental equipment; and architecture, building, and construction equipment. The company was formerly known as Thainox Stainless Public Company Limited and changed its name to POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited in 2011. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of POSCO.

INOX.BK.summary: POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited produces, sells, and exports cold-rolled stainless steel products in Thailand and internationally. It offers austenitic and ferritic stainless steel products used as raw material in the production of automotive and transportation parts; electrical home appliances; kitchenware; food processing and medical equipment; heavy industry, energy, and environmental equipment; and architecture, building, and construction equipment. The company was formerly known as Thainox Stainless Public Company Limited and changed its name to POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited in 2011. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of POSCO.

INSET-R.BK.summary: Infraset Public Company Limited constructs data centers in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Construct of Data Center and Information Technology, Infrastructure and Telecommunication Network, and Maintenance and Services. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

INSET.BK.summary: Infraset Public Company Limited constructs data centers in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Construct of Data Center and Information Technology, Infrastructure and Telecommunication Network, and Maintenance and Services. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

INSURE-R.BK.summary: Indara Insurance Public Company Limited primarily provides non-life insurance services in Thailand. It offers fire, marine and transportation, motor, personal accident, and miscellaneous insurance products. The company was formerly known as Inter life Insurance Company Limited and changed its name to Indara Insurance Public Company Limited. Indara Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Indara Insurance Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of T.C.C. Land Company Limited.

INSURE.BK.summary: Indara Insurance Public Company Limited primarily provides non-life insurance services in Thailand. It offers fire, marine and transportation, motor, personal accident, and miscellaneous insurance products. The company was formerly known as Inter life Insurance Company Limited and changed its name to Indara Insurance Public Company Limited. Indara Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Indara Insurance Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of T.C.C. Land Company Limited.

INTUCH-R.BK.summary: Intouch Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the satellite, Internet, telecommunications, and media and advertising businesses. It operates through Local Wireless Telecommunications, Satellite and International Businesses, and Other Businesses segments. The company offers transponder rental and related services for domestic and international communications; broadband content services; advertising services; Internet data center, Internet, satellite uplink-downlink, and telecommunication services;, sale and service related to media, telephone network, mobile content, and engineering development services on communication technology and electronics. It also sells user terminals of IPSTAR and direct television equipment. In addition, the company offers computer program and related services, as well as information technology services; and trades in and rents telecommunications equipment and accessories. It has operations in Thailand, the People's Republic of China, India, Japan, Myanmar, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Shin Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to Intouch Holdings Public Company Limited in March 2014. Intouch Holdings Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

INTUCH.BK.summary: Intouch Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the satellite, Internet, telecommunications, and media and advertising businesses. It operates through Local Wireless Telecommunications, Satellite and International Businesses, and Other Businesses segments. It also sells user terminals of IPSTAR and direct television equipment. It has operations in Thailand, the People's Republic of China, India, Japan, Myanmar, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Shin Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to Intouch Holdings Public Company Limited in March 2014. Intouch Holdings Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IP-R.BK.summary: Inter Pharma Public Company Limited develops, produces, and sells healthcare products in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Human Healthcare and Animal Healthcare. The company offers human beauty products, such as medical supplies, nutrition therapy, cosmetics, supplementary foods, probiotic and prebiotic products, health food products, general food products, medical equipment, etc.; a range of wellness and anti-aging products; aesthetic products, such as anti-wrinkle creams, hyaluronic fillers, and EGF cosmeceuticals; and diagnostic products, including blood group tests and cool box systems. It also provides pet healthcare and livestock products comprising medical supplies, nutrition therapy, vaccines, supplementary foods, probiotic and prebiotic products, animal health food products, premium grade animal foods, general formula animal foods, etc., as well as medical equipment related to pet and livestock care products. In addition, the company imports and distributes dietary supplement products for humans and animals. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IRC-R.BK.summary: Inoue Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of motorcycle tires and tubes in Thailand and internationally. The company also provides industrial elastomer rubber parts, including rubber bushing, railway rubber, housing gasket, rubber chip, grommet, rubber level crossing, hole protection, covers, cushion rubber, rubber protector, trim bonnet rear, and rubber isolator for sport track, agriculture and fishery, infrastructure project, construction, and other industries. It also offers automotive elastomer products, such as hose air intake, socket covers, lamp and lens gasket, door and front grommets, column hole/cover assy-hole, weather strip inner and hood, shield fuel tank, gauge oil level, door stoppers, trunk lids, weather strip front window, rubber strap and mirror, and plug for automotive industry; and cover rubbers, socket body products, rubber seats, grommets, guide chains, chain guards, vale comp inlets, rollers, sprockets, O-ring, float, pealing fuel, and rubber bushes for motorcycle industry. In addition, the company provides cooling machine rubber cushions for electrical appliances, construction material, container seals, and other products. Further, it manufactures, repairs, and modifies metal molds and equipment for the production of motorcycle tires, tubes, and automotive rubber parts. The company also exports its products. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Thunyaburi, Thailand.

IRC.BK.summary: Inoue Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of motorcycle tires and tubes in Thailand and internationally. The company also provides industrial elastomer rubber parts, including rubber bushing, railway rubber, housing gasket, rubber chip, grommet, rubber level crossing, hole protection, covers, cushion rubber, rubber protector, trim bonnet rear, and rubber isolator for sport track, agriculture and fishery, infrastructure project, construction, and other industries. IRCP-R.BK.long_name: International Research Corporation Public Company Limited
IRCP-R.BK.summary: International Research Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the distribution and rendering system development services of information technology, network information, and telecommunication information systems in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Project Business and Non-Project Business. It provides telecommunication network to connect points to points via fiber optic and wireless technologies, such as DWDM, SDH, Multiplexer, wireless, and broadband; next generation network solutions to link public telephone network with IP network that include VOIP, VDO, instant messaging, etc.; soft switch technology solutions; mobile telephone network solutions; FTTx networking total solutions; and 3G and LTE services. The company also offers solutions for enterprise, such as enterprise resource planning, enterprise application integration, data warehouse and business intelligence, custom application development, and implementation services. In addition, it provides software replication and pad printing services; and digital broadcasting solutions, including headend equipment, television transmission systems, new media, and content production solutions, as well as designs, builds, and installs digital TV system equipment for television and broadcasting industry. Additionally, it provides project management and maintenance services for integrated radio and television broadcasting systems. International Research Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

IRCP.BK.long_name: International Research Corporation Public Company Limited
IRCP.BK.summary: International Research Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the distribution and rendering system development services of information technology, network information, and telecommunication information systems in Thailand. Additionally, it provides project management and maintenance services for integrated radio and television broadcasting systems. International Research Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

IRPC-R.BK.summary: IRPC Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides petroleum and petrochemical products in Thailand, Singapore, and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum Products, Petrochemical Products, and Other Business segments. Its petroleum products include refined oil comprising liquefied petroleum gas, naphtha, gasoline, diesel, and fuel oil; and lube base oil and asphalt. The company's petrochemical products comprise olefins, such as ethylene, propylene, and butadiene; aromatics comprising benzene, toluene, and xylene; polymers consisting of high-density polyethylene, polypropylene, acrylonitrile-butadiene-styrene, acrylonitrile styrene, polystyrene, and expandable polystyrene; and polyols. It also provides electricity, steam, and infrastructure, including wastewater treatment and other related services; wastewater treatment for industrial customers; port and tank services; and other business services. In addition, the company also offers tugboats, pilots, service boats, mooring, freshwater, bunkers, nautical charts, cranes, hopper cars, weighing, cargo yards, and warehouse services; and tank storage services, as well as operates liquid and chemical, and bulk and container terminals. Further, it offers asset management services in Rayong and other provinces; and various support services, as well as engages in the power plant, jetty, and other utilities operations. Additionally, the company manufactures and distributes plastic resins, as well as chemical products for polyurethanes; operates vocational schools; distributes petrochemical products; and provision of oil vessel renting services. The company was formerly known as Thai Petrochemical Industry Public Company Limited and changed its name to IRPC Public Company Limited in October 2006. IRPC Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

IT-R.BK.summary: IT City Public Company Limited engages in the retail of computers, tablets, peripherals, smartphones, and other related accessories and IT products under the IT CITY name. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 130 branches. IT City Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ITD-R.BK.summary: Italian-Thai Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the civil and infrastructure construction and development businesses in Thailand, India, and internationally. The company undertakes various construction projects, including office buildings, condominiums, skyscrapers, and hotels, as well as industrial plants; and pipeline and utility works, such as oil, gas, and water transmission pipelines, as well as conduit and manhole systems, and storage tanks. It also undertakes highway, railway, high speed rail, runway viaduct, track work, underground and elevated mass transit system, bridge, and expressway projects; airports, ports, and marine works; dams, tunnels, and power plants; and steel structure, telecommunications, and mining projects. In addition, the company offers coal digestion, and foundation and piling work services; manufactures and distributes cement, as well as steel pipes for civil construction; produces and distributes electricity; and holds concession for constructing elevated expressway, as well as deep sea port and railway in Mozambique. Further, it is involved in rock quarrying, processing, and distribution activities; manufacturing, distribution, and installation of concrete panels and products for real estate; production and sale of vessels and equipment; and real estate development activities. Additionally, the company engages in the construction of track doubling project; an airport terminal in India; and underground electrical train station in Taiwan. Italian-Thai Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ITEL-R.BK.summary: Interlink Telecom Public Company Limited provides telecommunication services through fiber optic network in Thailand. The company offers various services, such as interlink dark fiber, interlink wavelength, interlink international personal leased circuits, and interlink multi-protocol label switching based Internet protocol virtual private network services, as well as broadcast services. It also provides date center services, including co-location, virtual server, and disaster recovery services. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Interlink Telecom Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Interlink Communication Public Company Limited.

IVL-R.BK.summary: Indorama Ventures Public Company Limited produces and distributes polyethylene terephthalate (PET), purified terephthalic acid (PTA), paraxylene, isophthalic acid, ethylene oxide and ethylene glycol, naphthalene dicarboxylate (NDC), polyester fibers and yarns, and wool products. It operates in five segments: Integrated PET, Integrated Oxides and Derivatives, Fibers, Specialty Chemicals, and Packaging. \The company produces various PET resins, including hot fill, low and high IV, heavy metal free, plant PET, fast re-heat, and general grade products to serve beverages, pharmaceuticals, homecare, and industrial packaging applications, as well as PET packaging materials, such as PET preforms, bottles, and closures. It also provides ethylene glycol used as raw material in the production of polyester fibers, PET, antifreeze, films, and chips; monoethylene glycol for use in polyester polymer production and antifreeze industry; diethylene glycol for unsaturated polyester resin, polyurethanes, and liquid detergent production, as well as cement grinding; triethylene glycol for oil and gas industry and natural gas dehydration; and ethylene oxide. In addition, the company offers polyolefin and polyester fibers, yarns, and chips for various market verticals, such as non-woven, home textile, technical textile, automotive, and apparel; and bicomponent fibers. Further, it produces worsted wool yarns that are used in various applications, such as woven and non-woven products, active apparels, and technical and interior textiles. The company operates in Thailand, North America, Europe, and internationally. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Indorama Ventures Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Indorama Resources Limited.

IWBB.summary: IWEB, Inc. operates as a technology development and services company that provides coding services in various industries and markets primarily in Thailand. It focuses on image, audio, Web, and security coding technologies. The company's technology enables enterprises to imbed or imprint invisible digital identities to media and objects. Its coding technology provides the means to infuse persistent digital information to computers and digital devices into various forms of media content; and permits smartphones, tablets, industrial scanners, and other computer interfaces to identify relevant data from media content. IWEB, Inc. is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

J-R.BK.summary: JAS Asset Public Company Limited provides rental and related services in Thailand. The company operates in four segments: Rental and Related Services Business, Food and Beverage Business, Real Estate Business and Others. It also organizes rented space for mobile phones and IT products in shopping centers for retail sellers under the IT Junction name; develops and manages community markets and community malls under the J Market, The Jas, and The Jas Urban names; manages food courts and indoor amusement park under the Urban Food Ville and Totem Kingdom brands; and develops properties and condominium projects under the Newera Condominium name. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. JAS Asset Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Jay Mart Public Company Limited.

JAK-R.BK.summary: Jakpaisan Estate Public Company Limited operates as a property developer in Thailand. It specializes in housing estate projects, commercial buildings, and condominiums. The company is based in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

JAK.BK.summary: Jakpaisan Estate Public Company Limited operates as a property developer in Thailand. It specializes in housing estate projects, commercial buildings, and condominiums. The company is based in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

JAS-R.BK.summary: Jasmine International Public Company Limited provides telecommunications services to individual and corporate clients in Thailand. The company provides high-speed connectivity; Internet services and applications; and software development, distribution, and general software services, including software system that supports value added services for broadband Internet business. It also offers marine and submarine optical fiber maintenance services; international private leased-circuit, Internet protocol virtual private network services, leased line Internet services, managed network services via optic fiber and copper cable networks, National Internet Exchange services, and co-location services and satellite communications. In addition, the company provides data center services; BranchConnext via asymmetric digital subscriber line; very high bit rate digital subscriber line; FTTx and 4G; Voice over Internet Protocol; electronic data interchange; and international calling cards; and consultancy, design, and sourcing for IP solutions. Further, it offers wireless communication services via very small aperture terminal; distributes network equipment and optical power meters; offers Internet and international calling services; and provides satellite phone services, and small mobile handset and fixed handset for users to use the service from a fixed indoor location in a remote area. Additionally, the company engages in system integration, equipment sourcing, system design, and network implementation for government and private sectors; cloud computing; the consultancy, design, and implementation of computer and IT network systems; the provision of space rental services; and investing in telecommunications infrastructure business, other assets, securities, and/or instruments. Jasmine International Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

JAV.F.summary: Esso (Thailand) Public Company Limited refines and markets petroleum products in Thailand and internationally. It operates in two segments, Downstream and Petrochemicals. The company provides refined petroleum products, including motor gasoline, gasohol, diesel, aviation fuels, fuel oil, marine fuels, and LPG products; and other petroleum products comprising mineral and synthetic lubricants under the Mobil brand name, as well as asphalt. It offers its refined petroleum products through a retail network of 654 retail service stations under the Esso brand name; and commercial channel consists of sales to industrial end users and wholesalers, as well as to customers in the aviation and marine industries. The company also produces aromatics in the form of Paraxylene, a feedstock for purified terephthalic acid, as well as used as raw material for producing polyester films, packaging resins, and fabrics. In addition, it provides hydrocarbon solvents, such as hexane, which is used primarily in edible oil seed extractions and as a carrier in petrochemical production; rubber solvents that are used as adhesives and rubber cement for use in the manufacture of tires; white spirits for coating and paint industries; and Exxsol D80 for household, industrial, and metal working applications. Further, the company imports and markets aromatic solvents that are used in the automotive paint coating industry; and sells plasticizer for various applications. Additionally, it leases real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Esso Standard Thailand Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Esso (Thailand) Public Company Limited in 1996. The company was founded in 1894 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Esso (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of ExxonMobil Asia Holding Private Limited.

JCK-R.BK.summary: JCK International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the property development activities in Thailand and the United Kingdom. It operates through five segments: Land and Factory Building for Sale; Land and Warehouse Building for Rent; Office Building for Rent; Residential Condominium Units for Sale; and REIT Manager. The company develops land for industrial estates; rents office and factory spaces; develops and sells residential condominium units; and provides construction and property management services. It also invests, leases, and sells land and warehouses; and manages a real estate investment trust. The company was formerly known as Thai Factory Development Public Company Limited and changed its name to JCK International Public Company Limited in April 2018. JCK International Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

JCKH-R.BK.summary: JCK Hospitality Public Company Limited operates restaurants in Thailand. The company's restaurants provide a la carte and buffet menus that offer Suki Shabu under the Hot Pot brand name; Japanese grilled food under the Daidomon brand name; and fusion food and steak under the Signature brand, as well as operates Toomato Italian Kitchen, Signor Sassi, Zheng Dou, Zheng Dou Grand, Zheng Dou express, and Bonsai restaurant. It also produces and distributes finished food and beverage products. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 93 branches. The company was formerly known as Hot Pot Public Company Limited and changed its name to JCK Hospitality Public Company Limited in March 2018. JCK Hospitality Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

JCT-R.BK.summary: Jack Chia Industries (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, manufactures and distributes pharmaceuticals and toiletries in Thailand. It also offers other consumer products. The company also exports its products. Jack Chia Industries (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1966 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

JKN-R.BK.long_name: JKN Global Media Public Company Limited
JKN-R.BK.summary: JKN Global Media Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in content distribution business in Thailand. It is involved in the distribution of contents of the movies, series, and documentaries, as well as the production and distribution of related DVD and Blu-ray. The company also provides advertising services, as well as produces television programs. JKN Global Media Public Company Limited is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

JMART-R.BK.summary: Jay Mart Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale and retail of mobile phones and related accessories in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Trading Business, Debt Collection Business, Rental Business, and Other. It also offers tablets, cameras, smart home gadgets, home appliances, smart living products, and sports and health products, as well as products for mom and kids. In addition, the company acts as the sales agent or distributor of subscriber identification module (SIM) card packages and prepaid SIM cards of mobile phone operators, including GSM, DTAC, GSM1800, and TRUE MOVE through various distribution channels. Further, it provides debt tracking, collection, and management services; car and personal loans; and finance leasing, consumer lending, insurance brokerage, and asset management services. Additionally, the company engages in the distribution of food and beverage products; and property development, e-commerce, and retail space rental businesses. Jay Mart Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

JMT-R.BK.long_name: JMT Network Services Public Company Limited
JMT-R.BK.summary: JMT Network Services Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides debts tracking and collection services in Thailand. It is also involved in the purchase of non-performing accounts receivable for debts management and collection. In addition, the company offers asset management, non-life insurance, and personal loan services, as well as operates as an insurance broker. Further, it provides auto leasing services for used cars and second hand cars. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. JMT Network Services Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Jay Mart Public Company Limited.

JR-R.BK.summary: J.R.W. Utility Public Company Limited engages in the design, procurement, construction, and installation of electrical power systems and telecommunication systems. It is involved in the construction of high voltage transmission line systems; construction and installation of substations and equipment in a substation; and construction work to change air power and underground power cables. The company engages in the design, procurement, and installation of telecommunication systems and information technology by telecommunication systems. In addition, it maintains, repairs, and sells equipment related to electrical and telecommunication systems, and information technology products. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

JSP-R.BK.summary: J.S.P. Property Public Company Limited primarily engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Real Estate Business and Rental and Service Business. The Real Estate Business segment develops and sells houses, townhouses, commercial buildings, and residence condominium projects, as well as provides property management services to other related companies. The Rental and Service Business segment engages in the rental of community mall and parking lot. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

It operates through two segments, Real Estate Business and Rental and Service Business. The Rental and Service Business segment engages in the rental of community mall and parking lot. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

JTS-R.BK.long_name: Jasmine Telecom Systems Public Company Limited
JTS-R.BK.summary: Jasmine Telecom Systems Public Company Limited engages in the design and installation of telecommunication systems, and telecom service and other businesses in Thailand. It is involved in information and communication technology system integration, computer systems integration, WiFi system design and implementation, smart building system design and implementation, and LAN and fiber optic installation services. The company also offers cloud computing services, such as infrastructure-as-a-service and software-as-a-service via internet network. In addition, it is involved in the distribution of telecommunications equipment; development of software applications; and maintenance service for computer hardware and other peripheral equipment. The company serves customers in the government and private sectors. Jasmine Telecom Systems Public Company Limited has a strategic collaboration agreement with KT Corporation for the operation of the data center and cloud service business. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

JUBILE.BK.summary: Jubilee Enterprise Public Company Limited operates as a retailer and wholesaler of diamond jewelry in Thailand. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

JUTHA-R.BK.summary: Jutha Maritime Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides marine transportation services. It operates through two segments, Time Charter Service and Cargo Shipping Business. The Time Charter Service segment manages fleets, which covers routes in Europe, the United States, Central America, the Caribbean Sea, and Australia. The Cargo Shipping Business segment offers liner services on the route between Thailand-Japan-South Korea-Thailand; and tramps services with no fixed route or time table, as well as sailing to ports in Asia, Europe, and the United States. The company engages ship management services and owns multi-purpose vessels, as well as transportation service. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

JWD-R.BK.summary: JWD InfoLogistics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the integrated in-land and oversea logistics business in Thailand, Taiwan, the United States, Myanmar, Laos, Cambodia, and internationally. The company operates through six segments: Integrated Logistics, Supply Chain and Warehouse Management; Transportation Services; Domestic and International Removal; Record and Information Storage; Foods; and Others. It offers warehousing and yard management, customs clearance, and transportation and distribution management consultancy, as well as logistics software development services; and other value added services. The company also develops and manages office and warehouse properties; provides investment consultation, and warehouse management services; and offers property management services, including facility, financial, environment and power, and safety management, as well as building inspection and fire exercise services. In addition, it offers household, factory, office, and fine arts and exhibition items removal services; self storage services; record and information management services; and IT solutions for supply chain management. Further, the company provides buildings and other construction facilities rental, moving, land rental, port, carriage, goods packing and handling, cargo container, cold storage, and art storage services; sells temperature controlled equipment; and sells and installs electronics devices, software applications, and network services. It primarily serves customers in automotive and parts, chemicals and dangerous goods, and food and cold chain sectors. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

K-R.BK.summary: Kingsmen C.M.T.I. Public Company Limited engages in interior design and decoration, and exhibition businesses in Thailand. It offers retail and corporate interior services, including retail interiors, roll-outs, retail fixtures, corporate interiors, and restaurants; exhibitions and event services, such as custom-designed stands, official shows, pavilions, suites and chalets, and rental services; thematic and museums comprising theme parks and attractions, galleries and visitor centers, and museums; and event management services. Kingsmen C.M.T.I. Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KAMART-R.BK.summary: Karmarts Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, manufactures and distributes consumer products in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Manufacture and Distribution of Consumer Products; and Warehouse Rental and Warehouse Service. The company offers facial care and cleanser, body care and cleanser, makeup, beauty accessories, hair care, supplement, scented, acne and sensitive skin care, and oral care products under the Cathy Doll, Baby Bright, Boya, Jejuvita, Reunrom, Crayon, Cathy Choo, Skylab, Bergamo, and Keumyon brands. It distributes products through convenience stores; supermarkets/hypermarkets, and discount stores; and specialty stores, as well as through catalogs and online. The company operates 60 shops under the KARMART brand. It also exports its products to Singapore, Cambodia, Vietnam, Myanmar, China, Laos, Indonesia, the Philippines, the United Arab Emirates, Malaysia, Taiwan, the United States, Iraq, Hong Kong, Russia, and India. The company was formerly known as Distar Electric Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to Karmarts Public Company Limited in April 2011. Karmarts Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KASET-R.BK.summary: Thai Ha Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes agricultural products, processed agricultural products, and instant products in Thailand and internationally. The company's products include rice; vermicelli noodles; bean vermicelli; vegetable oil; rice porridge seasoning; rice porridge; green mung bean; jasmine, white, brown, and glutinous rice; and snacks. It offers its products primarily under the KASET, SMART CHEF, IMPERIAL TASTE, FIRST LADY, COCO RIZ, COCO JAS, and COCO RICE brands. In addition, it operates rice mill business, and rice processing plant, as well as exports rice. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Thai Ha Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Cheer Group Holding Co., Ltd.

KBANK-R.BK.summary: Kasikornbank Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides commercial banking products and services in Thailand and internationally. The company's personal banking products and services include savings, current, fixed deposit, and foreign currency accounts; personal, home, and auto loans; debit and credit cards; life and non-life insurance products; investment products, such as mutual funds, stocks, and derivatives/futures exchange; money transfer and bill payment, cheque and draft, and foreign exchange services; and mobile banking services. It also offers various products and services for small and medium enterprises, including savings, current, and fixed deposits; working capital, commercial, and special loans, as well as letters of guarantee; collection and payment services; life, non-life, and group insurance products; and import, export, and money transfer services. In addition, the company provides various products and services for corporate customers, such as cash management solutions, including current, savings, special savings deposit, and fixed deposit accounts, as well as collection, payment, liquidity management, and electronic solutions; international trade solutions comprising import and export, global money transfer, guarantee, and trade finance solutions; working capital loans, term loans, special loans, and letters of guarantee; supply chain financing; life, non-life, and group insurance products; and foreign exchange and derivatives, corporate finance, securities, investment, and business card services. Further, it offers auto and equipment leasing, and venture capital management services. Kasikornbank Public Company Limited was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KBS-R.BK.summary: Khonburi Sugar Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes sugar in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Sugar Cane, Sugar and Molasses Trading, and Utilities. The Sugar Cane segment produces and distributes sugar cane, as well as provides related services to planters. The Sugar and Molasses Trading segment purchases and sells sugar, molasses, and by products; and offers refined, brown, and raw sugar. The Utilities segment generates and distributes electricity and steam using bagasse as fuel. The company also manufactures and distributes ethanol. Khonburi Sugar Public Company Limited was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KCAR-R.BK.long_name: Krungthai Car Rent and Lease Public Company Limited
KCAR-R.BK.summary: Krungthai Car Rent and Lease Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides operating lease in car rental business in Thailand. The company is also involved in buying, selling, and exchanging used and unused cars and spare parts. In addition, the company offers car maintenance services, such as fitting and repairing services; and car insurance and replacement services, as well as third party insurance. It serves individuals; and corporate customers, including government agencies, state enterprises, and private sector. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KCE-R.BK.summary: KCE Electronics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electric printed circuit boards (PCBs) under the KCE trademark worldwide. The company's PCBs, manufactured from copper clad laminate, are used in various applications, including automotive, industrial, computer, and telecom systems. It also manufactures and distributes chemicals products, and prepreg and laminate products. The company was formerly known as Kuang Charoen Electronics Company Limited. KCE Electronics Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Khon Kaen, Thailand. K.C. Metal Sheet Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Charoenkij Group.

KDH-R.BK.summary: Thonburi Medical Centre Public Company Limited engages in the hospital business in Thailand. It provides services in the areas of hair and weight loss, aesthetic surgery, sexual health, and facial treatment. The company was formerly known as Krungdhon Hospital Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thonburi Medical Centre Public Company Limited in April 2013. Thonburi Medical Centre Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

KEX-R.BK.summary: Kerry Express (Thailand) Public Company Limited offers parcel delivery services in Thailand, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Vietnam, Cambodia, and Malaysia. It primarily serves international express firms, e-commerce companies, home shopping channels, banks, technology firms, telecom companies, financial institutes, and schools, as well as local retail chains. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Kerry Express (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Kerry Logistics Network Limited.

KGI-R.BK.summary: KGI Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the securities business in Thailand. The company provides securities brokerage, securities dealing, investment advisory, securities underwriting, securities borrowing and lending, and securities registrar services. It also offers over-the-counter derivate products, equity and derivative trading, equity derivative, exchange traded fund, trailing trading system, bridge, and fixed income services; and investment banking services, including fund raising, mergers and acquisitions, financial instruments, and corporate advisory services. In addition, the company provides wealth management, derivatives brokerage, and financial advisory services; and operates as a sales agent for mutual fund units. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 14 branches in Bangkok and 18 branches in other provinces. The company was formerly known as KGI Securities One Public Company Limited and changed its name to KGI Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited in May 2001. KGI Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KGTFY.short_name: KRUNG THAI BANK PUBLIC CO LTD
KGTFY.long_name: Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited
KGTFY.summary: Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited provides various commercial banking products and services. The company operates through three segments: Retail Banking, Wholesale Banking, and Treasury and Investment. It provides various retail banking products and services, including current, savings, and fixed deposit accounts; time and foreign currency deposits; personal and housing loans; debit, travel, cash and top up, and credit cards; investment services; travel, motor, and home asset insurance products; money transfer, payment and top up, foreign exchange, and overseas education services; and e-banking services. The company also offers SME loans for small and medium businesses; and international business loans. In addition, it provides corporate banking products and services comprising cash management services, such as collection, liquidity management, and transfer and payment services; fixed deposit and current accounts; foreign currency and term deposits; cards; Fx, interest rate, equity, commodity, and credit derivatives; investment solutions; financial advisory services related to merger and acquisition transactions; financial advisory, underwriting, and selling agent services for products offered through the equity capital markets; and project finance advisory and feasibility study services, as well as e-banking services. The company provides its services through a network of branches in Thailand and various centers internationally. Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KGTHY.summary: Krungthai Card Public Company Limited engages in the credit card, personal loan, and other related businesses in Thailand. It operates as a payment service provider, as well as offers utilities payment services. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KIAT-R.BK.summary: Kiattana Transport Public Company Limited provides transportation services in Thailand and internationally. The company offers integrated logistics services for dangerous goods, including chemicals, petroleum products, and specialty products through a fleet of approximately 400 trucks. It also provides warehousing, product sourcing, customs clearance and documentation, transportation management, and goods custodial services, as well as trades in chemicals used in industry. In addition, the company distributes and rents hardware and software accessories relating to IT systems and various types of global positioning systems; and offers rail freight services. Kiattana Transport Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

KIFF.F.summary: Kiatnakin Phatra Bank Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking products and services in Thailand. The company operates through Commercial Banking Business, Capital Market Business, and the Debt Restructuring segments. Its deposit products include current, savings, and fixed deposit accounts. The company also provides auto, home, and personal loans; and corporate loans, including real estate, apartment and hotel, specialized industrial, logistics, and construction machinery and materials loans. In addition, it engages in the property, car auction, securities, real estate, investments, and fund management businesses; and offers debit and ATM cards, e-banking services and bancassurance products and SME banking products. Kiatnakin Phatra Bank Public Company Limited operates through 65 branches. The company was formerly known as Kiatnakin Bank Public Company Limited. Kiatnakin Phatra Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KK-R.BK.long_name: K&K Superstore Southern Public Company Limited
KK-R.BK.summary: K&K Superstore Southern Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of consumer products in Thailand. Its utensils products comprise household cleaning products, including detergents, fabric softeners, compressed petals, etc.; products for daily use, which include toothpaste, toothbrush, mouthwash, etc.; skin and hair products, such as shampoo, shower cream, soap, etc.; beauty products comprising powder, cream, skin care, cologne, etc.; and products for children and adults, such as brushes for milk, baby diapers, adult diapers, etc. The company's consumer products include beverage products, which include cocoa powder, coffee, non-dairy cream, etc.; flavored milk products, such as milk powder, sweetened condensed milk, UHT milk, etc.; beverage products, including drinking water, soft drinks, health drinks, etc.; condiments and dry food products, such as condiments, vegetable oil, rice, etc.; and snack products comprising chewing gum, candy, etc. It operates 26 stores under the K&K Superstore brand name. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Songkhla, Thailand.

KKC-R.BK.summary: Kulthorn Kirby Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes hermetic compressors for refrigerators, freezers, water coolers, commercial refrigerators, and air conditioners. The company operates through four segments: Compressors and Parts, Enameled Wire, Steel Sheet, and Steel Coil Center. It also produces iron castings for compressor parts and automotive parts; enameled copper wires and thermostats for use in air conditioners and refrigerators; forging, machining, and heat treatment metal parts; and motor compressors, electrical motors, and other parts. In addition, the company is involved in the slitting of electrical steel for compressors. Further, it offers condensing units for refrigeration products, electrical motor parts, and other motor compressor parts. The company serves in Thailand, Hong Kong, China, Indonesia, Saudi Arabia, and internationally. Kulthorn Kirby Public Company Limited was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand

KOOL-R.BK.summary: Masterkool International Public Company Limited researches, develops, manufactures, and supplies alternative cooling products to corporate, industrial, or home users under the MASTERKOOL and COOL TOP brands in Thailand and China. It offers evaporative air coolers, misting fans, centrifugal force fans, and industrial and ventilation fans; and ozone generators. The company also engages in the rental of equipment, systems, and related products, such as evaporative air coolers, high pressure systems, drink machines, air conditioners, umbrellas, tables, chairs, fog machines, and tents. In addition, it offers after sales and other services. The company serves various markets, such as animal farms, companies-factories-warehouses, events, hotels and resorts, places of worship, public transport, residences, restaurants, schools, sport arenas, and tourism places through dealers. It also exports its products to approximately 34 countries worldwide. The company was formerly known as Masterkool International Company Limited and changed its name to Masterkool International Public Company Limited in September 2014. Masterkool International Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KSL-R.BK.long_name: Khon Kaen Sugar Industry Public Company Limited
KSL-R.BK.summary: Khon Kaen Sugar Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes sugar and molasses in Thailand, the Lao People's Democratic Republic, and the Kingdom of Cambodia. It offers raw sugar, high polarization sugar, white sugar, liquid sugar, and refined sugar, as well as molasses, bagasses, and filter cakes. The company also manufactures and distributes bio-fertilizers; and trades in agricultural spare parts, as well as supplies. In addition, it produces and distributes electricity and ethanol, as well as exports sugar. Further, the company is involved in the agricultural business; and provision of transport, goods shipping, and consulting services. Additionally, it operates a resort that provides accommodation and facilities for holiday vacation, as well as training center for employees and other general customers; and a commercial rental property. The company serves industrial enterprises, re-export manufacturing enterprises, sugar traders, and oil companies. Khon Kaen Sugar Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KSL.BK.summary: Khon Kaen Sugar Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes sugar and molasses in Thailand, the Lao People's Democratic Republic, and the Kingdom of Cambodia. It offers raw sugar, high polarization sugar, white sugar, liquid sugar, and refined sugar, as well as molasses, bagasses, and filter cakes. The company also manufactures and distributes bio-fertilizers; and trades in agricultural spare parts, as well as supplies. In addition, it produces and distributes electricity and ethanol, as well as exports sugar. Further, the company is involved in the agricultural business; and provision of transport, goods shipping, and consulting services. Additionally, it operates a resort that provides accommodation and facilities for holiday vacation, as well as training center for employees and other general customers; and a commercial rental property. The company serves industrial enterprises, re-export manufacturing enterprises, sugar traders, and oil companies. Khon Kaen Sugar Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KTB-R.BK.long_name: Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited
KTB-R.BK.summary: Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited provides various commercial banking products and services. The company operates through three segments: Retail Banking, Wholesale Banking, and Treasury and Investment. It provides various retail banking products and services, including current, savings, and fixed deposit accounts; time and foreign currency deposits; personal and housing loans; debit, travel, cash and top up, and credit cards; investment services; travel, motor, and home asset insurance products; money transfer, payment and top up, foreign exchange, and overseas education services; and e-banking services. The company also offers SME loans for small and medium businesses; and international business loans. In addition, it provides corporate banking products and services comprising cash management services, such as collection, liquidity management, and transfer and payment services; fixed deposit and current accounts; foreign currency and term deposits; cards; Fx, interest rate, equity, commodity, and credit derivatives; investment solutions; financial advisory services related to merger and acquisition transactions; financial advisory, underwriting, and selling agent services for products offered through the equity capital markets; and project finance advisory and feasibility study services, as well as e-banking services. The company provides its services through a network of branches in Thailand and various centers internationally. Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KTC-R.BK.summary: Krungthai Card Public Company Limited engages in the credit card, personal loan, and other related businesses in Thailand. It operates as a payment service provider, as well as offers utilities payment services. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KTC.BK.summary: Krungthai Card Public Company Limited engages in the credit card, personal loan, and other related businesses in Thailand. KTIS-R.BK.long_name: Kaset Thai International Sugar Corporation Public Company Limited
KTIS-R.BK.summary: Kaset Thai International Sugar Corporation Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes sugar in Thailand and internationally. It offers raw, white, and refined sugar; molasses products or sugar residues that are used as raw material in various products, such as food and ethanol; dry and wet pulp; bio-fertilizers; and ethanol products, including industrial and fuel alcohol. The company is also involved in the generation and sale of electricity through a biomass power plant with a capacity of 60 MW; trade and rental of properties; and rental of agricultural machinery for farmers. In addition, it engages in the manufacture and distribution of containers made from bagasse and organic fertilizers; and provision of asset management, and research and development services. The company was formerly known as Kaset Thai Industry Sugar Company Limited. Kaset Thai International Sugar Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Nakhon Sawan, Thailand.

KTIS.BK.long_name: Kaset Thai International Sugar Corporation Public Company Limited

KUMWEL-R.BK.summary: Kumwell Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the production and distribution of electrical equipment, graphite molds, metal powders, and ground wires in Thailand and internationally. The company provides grounding and lightning protection systems. It offers exothermic welding products, such as connections, powders, molds, handle clamps, ignitors, and tools and accessories; grounding components, including ground rods, pits, and plates, as well as ground monitoring systems, grounding clamps, MEG, and accessories and tools; and lightning protection components comprising connection components, conductor and earth electrodes, isolating spark gaps, conductor fasteners, earth electrode inspection housings, lightning strike counters, earthing enhancing compounds, and high voltage cables. The company also provides surge protective devices for AC and DC power systems, photovoltaic systems, and data/signal lines; isolating spark gaps for equipotential bonding; and lightning and surge counters; lightning detection warning systems; measuring devices consisting of clamp and double clamp earth resistance testers, earth impulse impedance, and remote ground monitoring systems; electric arc protection systems; and copper lugs, C-clamp connectors, and related tools and accessories. It serves the electricity, industrial, transportation, telecommunication, and building sectors. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KWC-R.BK.summary: Krungdhep Sophon Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in developing and leasing of real estate properties in Thailand. The company also engages in the warehouse and wharf business that offers space renting and port of loading/unloading goods services to retail customers. In addition, it provides management consulting, document storage and data management, and computer back-up media storage services. The company was formerly known as Krungdhep Warehouse Company Limited and changed its name to Krungdhep Sophon Public Company Limited in December 1995. Krungdhep Sophon Public Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
