The company provides engine parts, transmission parts, final drives, chassis parts, transmission housings, clutch housings, hubs, turbo modules, compressor housings, and throttle-controlled turbo products. It also engages rental of properties. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Nakhon Ratchasima, Thailand.

PDG-R.BK.summary: Prodigy Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes polyethylene terephthalate (PET) packaging products in Thailand. It offers PET bottles for drinking water, juices, vegetable oils, seasoning sauces, preform, and other packaging products. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

PDG.BK.summary: Prodigy Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes polyethylene terephthalate (PET) packaging products in Thailand. It offers PET bottles for drinking water, juices, vegetable oils, seasoning sauces, preform, and other packaging products. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

PDI-R.BK.summary: Padaeng Industry Public Company Limited engages in the renewable energy and other businesses in Thailand and internationally. It focuses on producing energy from renewable energy sources, including solar, wind power, hydropower, biomass, and biogas. The company operates six solar farms located in Prachinburi, Samut Sakhon, and Khon Kaen; and a solar farm in Kha-Ne-Jue district, as well as solar farms in Asia. It is also developing solar projects with 30 MW in Japan. In addition, the company offers property services; and trades in various base metals and by-products. Further, it is involved in the hotel and real estate activities. Padaeng Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PDI.BK.summary: Padaeng Industry Public Company Limited engages in the renewable energy and other businesses in Thailand and internationally. Further, it is involved in the hotel and real estate activities. Padaeng Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PDJ-R.BK.summary: Pranda Jewelry Public Company Limited engages in the production, distribution, and retail of fine jewelry in Thailand, the United States, Germany, and internationally. The company offers gold and silver jewelry, and brass and fashion costume jewelry products under the Prima Gold, Prima Diamond, Prima Art, Julia, Merii, H.Gringoire, Esse, and Gemondo brands. It is also involved in dormitory rental activities. The company operates retail and franchise outlets in Asia and the Middle East, as well as offers its products through TV shopping channels, independent retailers, chain stores, upscale department and specialty stores, e-commerce, etc. It manages approximately 100 owned and franchised retail networks. The company was formerly known as Pranda Design Company Limited. Pranda Jewelry Public Company Limited was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PERM-R.BK.long_name: Permsin Steel Works Public Company Limited
PERM-R.BK.summary: Permsin Steel Works Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes steel products in Thailand. The company offers coil products, such as hot and cold rolled products; galvanized iron products; steel, and aluminum or zinc products; high strength purlin products; and steel coatings, as well as c-line, c-u, t-bar, roll forming metal, and electro-galvanized steel products. It also offers metal sheets and PU foam sheets; and steel pipes. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

PERM.BK.long_name: Permsin Steel Works Public Company Limited

It also offers metal sheets and PU foam sheets; and steel pipes. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

PEXNY.long_name: PTT Exploration and Production Public Company Limited
PEXNY.summary: PTT Exploration and Production Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration and production of petroleum in Thailand and internationally. It is also involved in gas pipeline transportation business; investment funding; the provision of petroleum technology; and the provision of petroleum products, such as natural gas, crude oil, condensate, naphtha and liquefied petroleum gas. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. PTT Exploration and Production Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of PTT Public Company Limited.

PF-R.BK.summary: Property Perfect Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Property Development, Hotel, and Others. The company develops shopping malls and commercial areas; rents office buildings, assets, and shopping plazas; and offers apartment and construction services, as well as invests in other companies and projects. It is also involved in the hotel business, producing and assembling prefabricated building systems, and clubhouse management. Property Perfect Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PF.BK.summary: Property Perfect Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Property Development, Hotel, and Others. The company develops shopping malls and commercial areas; rents office buildings, assets, and shopping plazas; and offers apartment and construction services, as well as invests in other companies and projects. It is also involved in the hotel business, producing and assembling prefabricated building systems, and clubhouse management. Property Perfect Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PG-R.BK.summary: People's Garment Public Company Limited manufactures and sells ready-to-wear garments in Thailand. The company offers menswear, ladies wear, children's wear, swimwear, sportswear, cycling wear, and men's underwear under the Arrow, Elle, Felix Buhler, Lecoq Sportif, Streamline, BSC, Primo Linea, Proud, 360, Swoop, and Oberon brands. It also produces and sells knitted fabrics, and ready-to-wear garments made from woven and knitted fabrics, as well as uniforms. The company also exports its products to Asia, the United States, and the Europeans Union. People's Garment Public Company Limited was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PHOL-R.BK.summary: Phol Dhanya Public Company Limited distributes occupational safety, health, and environment products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Trading in Health and Safety Products, Water Treatment System, and Water Supply Systems for Villages. It offers personal protection equipment, including respirator, hand, hearing, face, and hand protection products, as well as firefighting suits, protective cloths, hearing protection, and safety shoes and glasses; and workplace safety equipment, such as system containment systems, emergency showers, portable ventilators, positive respirators, fall protection products, measurement products, leak and spill controls, and lockout tagouts. The company also provides cleanroom products, including swaps, sticky rollers, cleanroom bonds, and wipers; and clean agents and PPE vending machine. In addition, it is involved in the production, distribution, and service of water treatment systems, industrial water treatment systems, and water purifiers; and production and distribution of water in the form of concessions to the government and private sector. Phol Dhanya Public Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Pathumthani, Thailand.

Phol Dhanya Public Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Pathumthani, Thailand.

PICO-R.BK.summary: Pico (Thailand) Public Company Limited primarily engages in event marketing and brand image building businesses in Thailand. The company operates through five segments: Exhibition, Event Marketing, Museum Exhibit, Knowledge Communication, and Organizer. It offers meeting, incentive, convention, and exhibition (MICE) management and services; public relation services; and knowledge communication services, including production and distribution of digital content and media. In addition, the company designs, fabricates, and decorates booths for trade shows and exhibitions, as well as rents related equipment; and distributes educational contents. Further, it offers interior design and other related services; building design and construction services; and museum design and decoration services. Pico (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PIMO-R.BK.summary: Pioneer Motor Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in manufacturing and distributing of electric motors in Thailand. It offers air conditioner motors, industrial motors, submersible and centrifugal pumps, and pool and spa pump motors. The company also exports its products to ASEAN countries, as well as to Australia, New Zealand, North America, Europe, and the Middle East. Pioneer Motor Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

PIMO.BK.summary: Pioneer Motor Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in manufacturing and distributing of electric motors in Thailand. It offers air conditioner motors, industrial motors, submersible and centrifugal pumps, and pool and spa pump motors. The company also exports its products to ASEAN countries, as well as to Australia, New Zealand, North America, Europe, and the Middle East. PJW-R.BK.summary: Panjawattana Plastic Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes plastic packaging products for consumer products, agro chemicals, automotive parts, lubricants, and fresh and yoghurt milk in Thailand and China. The company operates through Plant - Samuthsakhon, Plant - Chonburi, Plant - Bangkok, Plant - Tianjin (China), Plant - Jiangsu (China), and Business Trading segments. It also trades in lid and plastic resins; and provides service to check the amount/standards of various goods and inspect measurement tools. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PJW.BK.summary: Panjawattana Plastic Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes plastic packaging products for consumer products, agro chemicals, automotive parts, lubricants, and fresh and yoghurt milk in Thailand and China. The company operates through Plant - Samuthsakhon, Plant - Chonburi, Plant - Bangkok, Plant - Tianjin (China), Plant - Jiangsu (China), and Business Trading segments. It also trades in lid and plastic resins; and provides service to check the amount/standards of various goods and inspect measurement tools. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PK-R.BK.summary: Patkol Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in and services various engineering products in Thailand and internationally. It offers turnkey sales services in design, manufacturing, and installation of various industrial refrigeration machinery for the ice making, supermarket, dairy and ice-cream processing, and food related processing plants and supplies industries. The company provides ice making machines, ice storage equipment, and ice handling machines; and cold room products, chillers, refrigeration equipment, freezers, and supermarket showcases. It also offers food and dairy machinery, including thermization and pasteurization machinery, UHT units, pouch filers, tubular heat exchangers, clean in place machinery; mixing and blending systems, extraction systems, fermenter systems, dissolving systems, filling systems, heating and cooling systems, and utilities systems, as well as control and automation systems, milk collection centers, and hot water units. In addition, the company provides receiving tanks, storage tanks, milk transport tanks, aseptic storage tanks, mixing tanks, ultra mixers, jacket tanks, fermenter tanks, pharmaceutical grade tanks, fiter vessels, and cooling tanks. Further, it manufactures and imports foam plate and equipment for cold room business; sale of evaporative condensers, share parts, and equipment for evaporative condensers; and designs, manufactures, installs, and maintains pressure and no pressure tanks. The company serves meat processing, frozen food, non-alcoholic, sauce and seasonings, pharmaceutical, chemical, cosmetics, alcoholic drink, and cold storage and distributor industries. The company was formerly known as Patanakolkarn Co., Ltd and changed its name to Patkol Public Company Limited in 1993. Patkol Public Company Limited was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PKW.F.summary: Polyplex (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes polyester films and chips, metalized films, extrusion coated films, cast polypropylene films, silicone coated films, and PET resins in Thailand and internationally. It offers Sarafil range of plastic films, such as BOPET, bi-oriented polypropylene, cast polypropylene, blown polypropylene, and sustainable films for use in packaging, electrical, industrial, pressure sensitive, and other applications. The company also provides Saracote range of silicone coated films, including silicone coated release liner-labels and specialty, shingle roofing tapes, release film liners, and silicone primer coated liners for use in labels, tapes, and roofing shingles, as well as in peel and stick underlayments. In addition, it offers Saralam range of extrusion coated film products comprising reflective insulation films; decorative lamination films; thin and thick gauge polyester thermal lamination films; and polypropylene, polyester, nylon, and UV polyester thermal lamination films for use in book covers, identity cards, carton lamination, wide format commercial films, etc. The company also manufactures and distributes recycled plastic products. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Polyplex (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Polyplex Corporation Limited.

PL-R.BK.summary: Phatra Leasing Public Company Limited provides leasing services primarily to corporate enterprises in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Land Vehicles and Others segments. The company offers various types of vehicles, such as executive cars, business cars, service cars, or trucks, as well as business jets and various types of commercial leasing. It also leases other machinery, computers, and general equipment. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PLANB-R.BK.short_name: PLAN B MEDIA PUBLIC COMPANY LIM
PLANB-R.BK.long_name: Plan B Media Public Company Limited
PLANB-R.BK.summary: Plan B Media Public Company Limited provides advertising media production services in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Advertising Media and Engagement Marketing. Its services include out of home advertising media services, such as mass transit static outdoor advertising, digital outdoor advertising, airport advertising, in-mall advertising, retail and classic, and online advertising media services. The company also offers digital advertising agency, advertising space rental, and air time rental services; and mobile software applications. In addition, it operates as an agency to sell and administrate the benefit contracts; manages and develops artists; operates as an advertising media design and production, and advertising agency; and offers billboard rental services. Further, the company organizes an esports tournament under the Thai E-League Pro name; and provides sports marketing services. It serves small and medium-sized enterprises, private companies, government agencies, or state enterprises. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PLAT-R.BK.long_name: The Platinum Group Public Company Limited
PLAT-R.BK.summary: The Platinum Group Public Company Limited engages in the real estate development and investment business in Thailand. The company develops and rents retail space in shopping centers, as well as offers related services; and operates hotel, and food and beverages centers. The Platinum Group Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2013 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PLE-R.BK.long_name: Power Line Engineering Public Company Limited
PLE-R.BK.summary: Power Line Engineering Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, engineering, and installation of mechanical and electrical systems for private and government sectors in Thailand and internationally. It operates through System Installation and Construction, and Real Estate Development segments. The company is also involved in the installation of telecommunication, air conditioning, sanitary and plumbing, and fire protection systems; and civil construction operations in the areas of super structures, reinforced concrete roads, diaphragm and curtain walls, and tunneling and site drainage facilities. Power Line Engineering Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PM-R.BK.summary: Premier Marketing Public Company Limited distributes consumer products in Thailand, Japan, and internationally. The company operates in three segments: Distribution of Consumer Products, Manufacture of Food, and Cold Storage Warehouse and Services. It distributes snack foods, confectionery, food and beverages, nutrition food and supplements, and personal care products. It also manufactures and sells fish strips and fish sheets under the Taro brand name; fried seaweed products under the Taro Biggu brand; and tuna related products, such as pouched and canned ready-to-eat tuna, and tuna pet food under the customer brand. In addition, the company manufactures ketchup and chilli sauce under the King's Kitchen brand; and frozen processed food. Further, it provides space and cold storage rental services. The company distributes its products through wholesalers and sales staff; and general retailers, including trade stores. It also exports its tuna products to Asia, Europe, and the Middle East. Premier Marketing Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1977 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PMTA-R.BK.long_name: PM Thoresen Asia Holdings Public Company Limited
PMTA-R.BK.summary: PM Thoresen Asia Holdings Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells fertilizer and agrochemical products primarily in Vietnam. The company operates in two segments, Manufacture of Fertiliser and Crop Care Products; and Factory Area Management Services. Its products include NPK (nitrogen, phosphorus, and potassium) compounds, NPK synthesized chemical and microelement fertilizers, compound and single fertilizers, and foliar, as well as pesticides and insecticides. The company sells its fertilizers under the STORK trademark in Vietnam. It also exports fertilizer products to 32 countries worldwide. In addition, the company supplies seeds and agriculture materials; and operates and leases storage and warehousing facilities. Further, it imports and exports plant protection chemicals, as well as provides factory area management services. PM Thoresen Asia Holdings Public Company Limited sells its products through a network of wholesalers and international dealers. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. PM Thoresen Asia Holdings Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited.

PORT-R.BK.summary: Sahathai Terminal Public Company Limited engages in the shipping and logistics businesses in Thailand. The company offers coastal port, coastal port arrangement consultancy, tug boat, inland transport, and related merchant marine services. It also provides on-site container inspection, cleaning, maintenance, repair, and upgradation services; multipurpose terminal services, such as bulk and project cargo, and coastal shipping; warehousing services; and value added logistics services inside the port. Sahathai Terminal Public Company Limited was founded in 2007 and is based in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

POST-R.BK.summary: Bangkok Post Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, publishes and distributes newspapers, magazines, and books in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Publishing and Advertising, Production of Television Programs, and Other. The company publishes, distributes, and advertises newspapers, including the Bangkok Post, an English-language daily newspaper; Post Today, a Thai-language online news site; and News Clear, an online video channel for current affairs and trends, as well as Thai-language magazines, including Elle Thailand, Forbes Thailand, and Cleo Thailand in print and online formats. It also publishes books under the Post Books name; produces multimedia and video content for television and digital media; and organizes events and conferences. In addition, the company provides information services through various social media platforms; and general printing services to various government and business organizations. In addition, it publishes and distributes English-language lifestyle magazines, such as Guru and B Magazine, as well as offers content creation, event management, and digital marketing solutions for public agencies and private organizations. The company was formerly known as The Post Publishing Public Company Limited and changed its name to Bangkok Post Public Company Limited in May 2017. Bangkok Post Public Company Limited was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PPM-R.BK.long_name: Porn Prom Metal Public Company Limited
PPM-R.BK.summary: Porn Prom Metal Public Company Limited distributes metal products in Thailand. The company sells copper and brass products; aluminum alloy sheets, foils, and strips; steel and stainless steel wires; aluminum roof sheets; copper tubes, pancake coils, and fittings; insulation products; spiral ducts; and welding consumables and machines. It also manufactures and distributes flexible packaging products; provides services for design, supply, and installation of electricity; assembles and exports solar cells; and sells construction materials. Porn Prom Metal Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PPP-R.BK.summary: Premier Products Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes environmental products, construction materials, and industrial products in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Water Treatment Solution, Environmental Preservation Products, and Clean energy business. The company offers wastewater treatment systems; wastewater equipment; water storage systems; integrated water management systems; air pollution treatment system; and wastewater treatment system monitoring and maintenance services. It also provides environmental preservation products, such as precast lightweight wall panels and building decoration materials, noise barrier systems, chemical corrosion resistant tanks and components; and solar PV systems. In addition, the company produces electricity from solar power. Further, it exports its products. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PPPM-R.BK.summary: PP PRIME Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes feeds for aquatic animals and pets in Thailand and Japan. The company operates in three segments: Aquatic Animal Feed; Pets Food; and Production and Distribution of Electricity. It offers black tiger and other shrimp feed products; fish and frog feed products; and dog and cat food products. The company also distributes raw materials for animal feed; generates geothermal power; and offers business consulting and management services. In addition, it invests in wind power and other energy businesses. The company was formerly known as Thai Luxe Enterprises Public Company Limited and changed its name to PP PRIME Public Company Limited in September 2018. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Muang, Thailand.

PPS-R.BK.long_name: Project Planning Service Public Company Limited
PPS-R.BK.summary: Project Planning Service Public Company Limited provides engineering and architectural services for the private and public sectors in Thailand and internationally. The company offers various project management/construction services, such as project planning/scheduling, project feasibility study, financial planning, design management, quantity survey, design review, project budgeting, value engineering, architectural and engineering design, and green and sustainable design. Its project management/construction services also include quantity survey, engineering procurement and construction, construction management and supervision, project cost control, progress report presentation, and contact management; and claim management, facility management, and quality inspection and deliver to site administrator. In addition, the company provides technical services support; BIM objects creation, rendering and animation, construction simulation, and software training; and land management and development, residential property development, facility service management, hospitality management, and construction project management services. Further, it is involved in the repair, maintenance, and installation of power systems, as well as provides computer and media services; provision of services as a consultant for energy efficient buildings, green building, and sustainable building projects; and provision of advisory for investment in information technology system and other investment, as well as services for trading, renting, leasing, exchanging, mortgage, and consignment related to real estate. Project Planning Service Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PR9-R.BK.summary: Praram 9 Hospital Public Company Limited operates a hospital under the Praram 9 Hospital name in Thailand. The company offers a range of tertiary care services, including health promotion, preventive healthcare, diagnosis, treatment, and rehabilitation in the medical areas of obstetrics and gynecology, surgery, medicine, pediatrics, kidney transplant, cardiovascular, and orthopedist. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 166 licensed bed. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PRAKIT-R.BK.summary: Prakit Holdings Public Company Limited engages in media and advertisement, media agency, and investment businesses in Thailand and internationally. The company is involved in the brokerage of media; creation of advertisements; direct advertising; and public relation activities. It also produces various advertising materials, such as TV commercials, Web TV, radio spots, printed materials, video, and others; provides media planning and buying services; and invests in securities. The company was formerly known as Prakit & FCB Public Company Limited and changed its name to Prakit Holdings Public Company Limited in December 1999. Prakit Holdings Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PRAPAT-R.BK.summary: Peerapat Technology Public Company Limited engages in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of cleaning chemicals under the PEERAPAT trademark in Thailand. The company provides laundry products, such as powder and water detergents, bleaching products, alkali additive products, degreasing products, water conditioning products, and fabric softener products; general cleaning and disinfectants; and kitchen detergents, such as utensil cleaning dry agents, etc., as well as imports and distributes automatic utensil washing machines under the STEWARD brand. It also distributes chemicals for automatic container washing machines; produces and distributes floor cleaning agents, such as general room floor, kitchen floor, bathroom floor, etc., as well as floor cleaning machines or equipment, and cleaning equipment; distributes household products through online channels; distributes swimming pool chemicals and equipment, as well as constructs and installs concrete and prefabricated swimming pools; and distributes energy-saving hot water heaters for use in the hospitality industry, such as hotels, resorts, hospitals, restaurants. In addition, the company provides contract manufacturing services for cleaning agents; manages food court and cafeteria; rents automatic container washer; provides swimming pool design, installation, and maintenance services; installs and repairs automatic container washing machines; provides cleaning equipment systems used in a range of food and beverage industries; and offers laundry and cleaning services in public and private hospitals, as well as sanitation cleaning services for food and beverage factories. The company was formerly known as Peerapat Chemical Industry Company Limited and changed its name to Peerapat Technology Public Company Limited in August 2008. Peerapat Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PRG-R.BK.long_name: Patum Rice Mill and Granary Public Company Limited
PRG-R.BK.summary: Patum Rice Mill and Granary Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the processing and packaging of rice and related business in Thailand, the United States, Canada, Europe, the Asia Pacific, and internationally. It operates through two segments, Improving the Quality and Packaging of Milled Rice, and Food Center Business. It offers organic, Japanese, and quinoa rice, as well as rice berry granola; maboonkrong plus, white, hom mali, and other rice products; and other products, such as NUTRA ORIS 10 capsules, as well as drinking water. The company is also involved in the operation of a restaurant and food center; rental of a factory building, warehouse, and plant; provision of transportation services; and distribution of rice. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand. Patum Rice Mill and Granary Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of MBK Public Company Limited.

PRIN-R.BK.summary: Prinsiri Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops, leases, and sells real estate properties. The company is also involved in the construction distribution and acts as a contractor; and provision of real estate services. In addition, it generates and distributes electricity current from solar cell and alternative energy; and provides entertainment park and education center services, as well as food service in restaurant and food shop. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PRM-R.BK.summary: Prima Marine Public Company Limited engages in the marine transportation of petroleum products and accommodation work barges in Thailand and Singapore. The company engages in the transportation and storage of crude oil, petroleum products, semi-petroleum products, and liquefied petroleum products; transportation of chemical products; and provision of oil tankers, floating storage and offloading units, and anchor handling tugs to support offshore petroleum exploration and production. It also offers recruitment and ship management services. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Prima Marine Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Nathalin Co., Ltd.

PROUD-R.BK.summary: Proud Real Estate Public Company Limited engages in the construction and real estate development businesses in Thailand. The company develops residential condominiums. It also acts as the construction contractor. The company was formerly known as Focus Development and Construction Public Company Limited and changed its name to Proud Real Estate Public Company Limited in May 2019. Proud Real Estate Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company develops townhouses, single houses, and condominiums. It also provides management, home decoration, and construction services; and operates hospitals and clinics, as well as place of examination and treatment. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PSL-R.BK.summary: Precious Shipping Public Company Limited owns and operates dry bulk ships on a tramp-shipping basis worldwide. It is involved in the chartering and technical management of ships. The company primarily handles cement, agricultural products, steel, fertilizers, ore and concentrates, coal, logs, and other item cargoes. As of December 31, 2019, it owned and operated 36 dry bulk ships, including 9 Supramax, 8 Ultramax, and 15 Handysize, including 4 cement carrier vessels with a total capacity of 1,585,805 deadweight tons. Precious Shipping Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PSQ.F.long_name: Somboon Advance Technology Public Company Limited
PSQ.F.summary: Somboon Advance Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells pick-up axles and truck trunnion shafts in Thailand. It offers axel shafts, disc and drum brakes, exhaust manifolds, leaf springs, stabilizer bars, hot coil springs, and other products. The company also provides its parts for passenger cars, pick-ups, and trucks, as well as for the agriculture machinery industry. In addition, it rents and invests in real estate. The company serves original equipment manufacturers and replacement equipment manufacturers. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

PSTC-R.BK.long_name: Power Solution Technologies Public Company Limited
PSTC-R.BK.summary: Power Solution Technologies Public Company Limited primarily distributes and installs various types of power control and power backup systems in Thailand. It operates through Power Control System and Power Backup System; Electricity Generating from Solar Power; Petroleum Distribution and Logistics; and Construction segments. The company is also involved in the production and distribution of electricity using solar, wind, biological, biomass, and municipal solid waste, as well as alternative power resources; construction of power plants; and invests in other companies. In addition, it engages in the distribution of petroleum and logistics of fuel through a pipeline transport system; and operation of gas stations. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PT-R.BK.summary: Premier Technology Public Company Limited, through its subsidiary, Datapro Computer Systems Company Limited, distributes and provides services relating to computer and computer systems in Thailand. It develops its own products; and distributes products of other companies. The company's products include hardware and software products, including IT and multimedia products; and system and data management, and application software. It also offers annual maintenance, training and consulting, outsourcing, and other services; and engages in the rental of an office building. The company was formerly known as Premier Engineering and Technology Public Company Limited and changed its name to Premier Technology Public Company Limited in October 2006. Premier Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PTG-R.BK.summary: PTG Energy Public Company Limited trades in petroleum products, gas products, and supplies and equipment for oil service stations in Thailand. The company also trades in consumable products; and operates petrol stations. Its fuel products include diesel and gasoline. The company also trades in foods and beverages; operates coffee shops under the Pun Thai Coffee name; and engages in the transportation of fuel. In addition, it is involved in the production and trading of ethanol; provision of construction services; and operation of tank farms and service stations. Further, the company develops communication tools equipment. The company was formerly known as Paktai Chueplerng Company Limited. PTG Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PTL-R.BK.summary: Polyplex (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes polyester films and chips, metalized films, extrusion coated films, cast polypropylene films, silicone coated films, and PET resins in Thailand and internationally. It offers Sarafil range of plastic films, such as BOPET, bi-oriented polypropylene, cast polypropylene, blown polypropylene, and sustainable films for use in packaging, electrical, industrial, pressure sensitive, and other applications. The company also provides Saracote range of silicone coated films, including silicone coated release liner-labels and specialty, shingle roofing tapes, release film liners, and silicone primer coated liners for use in labels, tapes, and roofing shingles, as well as in peel and stick underlayments. In addition, it offers Saralam range of extrusion coated film products comprising reflective insulation films; decorative lamination films; thin and thick gauge polyester thermal lamination films; and polypropylene, polyester, nylon, and UV polyester thermal lamination films for use in book covers, identity cards, carton lamination, wide format commercial films, etc. The company also manufactures and distributes recycled plastic products. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Polyplex (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Polyplex Corporation Limited.

PTOG.F.summary: PTT Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the upstream and downstream petroleum, natural gas, and other related businesses in Thailand, other Asian countries, Europe, the United States, and internationally. It operates through Upstream Petroleum and Natural Gas Business Group, Downstream Petroleum Business Group, and Technology and Engineering Group segments. The company engages in the exploration and production of petroleum; and natural gas procurement, pipeline transmission, distribution, and separation activities. In addition, it is involved in the exploration, production, and distribution of coal; marketing of petroleum products and lube oil through an operating system of procurement, storage, and distribution of products, as well as the retail business at service stations. Further, it imports and exports petroleum and petrochemical products, as well as other related products; and produces and distributes electricity, steam, and water for industrial purpose, as well as offers project management services. Additionally, the company provides human resource support, petroleum related technology, consultant management, technical consultant, petrol station and convenience store management, factory maintenance and engineering, oil and gas, safety and environmental, and business services, as well as services for the storage and handling of liquid chemicals. It also invests in liquefied natural gas business; produces and distributes chilled water/constructs and installs electricity generating systems; develops electricity power production projects; invests in other companies; develops, markets, and distributes polymers products, by products, and other polymers-related products; and manufactures and distributes biochemical products, as well as engages in transportation, warehouse, and bagging packing management of polyethylene. PTT Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. PTT Exploration and Production Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of PTT Public Company Limited.

PTTGC-R.BK.long_name: PTT Global Chemical Public Company Limited
PTTGC-R.BK.summary:
PTT Global Chemical Public Company Limited produces and distributes ethylene,
 propylene, polyethylene plastic pellets, and biochemical products. It operates through seven segments: Refinery, Aromatics, Olefins and Derivatives, Green Chemicals, Performance Materials and Chemicals, Service and Others, and Investments in Other Joint Ventures and Associates. The company offers refined products, including liquefied petroleum gas (LPG), light naphtha, reformate, jet fuel, diesel, and fuel oil. It also provides aromatics products, such as benzene, paraxylene, cyclohexane, and orthoxylene; olefins comprising ethylene and propylene, mixed c4, tail gas, cracker bottom, hydrogen, and pyrolysis gasoline; and polymers consisting of HDPE, LDPE, LLDPE, PP, PTA, PET, PS, and rotomolding compounds. In addition, the company offers EO-based performance products, including ethylene glycol and ethanolamine; green chemicals, such as methyl ester, glycerin, fatty acid and alcohol, ethoxylate, oleochemicals, and bioplastic; and phenol, bisphenol A, and acetone. Further, it provides hexamethylene diisocyanate and derivatives, as well as acrylonitrile and methyl methacrylate. Additionally, the company operates production support facilities, such as jetty and buffer tank farm services for liquid chemical, and oil and gas; and manufactures and distributes health and nutrition products. It also offers factory maintenance and engineering services; real estate development services; safety and environmental services; service for the storage and handling of liquid chemicals, oil, and gas; and research and development of bio-based chemicals. In addition, the company produces and distributes electricity, water, steam, and other utilities. It offers its products in Thailand, the People's Republic of China, Vietnam, Singapore, India, Malaysia, Indonesia, Japan, the United States, and internationally. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

Q-CON-R.BK.summary: Quality Construction Products Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, produces and distributes autoclaved aerated concrete blocks, reinforced wall panels, floor panels, and lintels for construction uses. The company develops and sells land and houses, and condominium units; rents office buildings; and services residential buildings. It also engages in hotel operations; management of serviced apartments; lease of land; and management of public utilities of real estate business and land owners, as well as the manufacture and distribution of precast concrete. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

It serves oil and gas, metal manufacture/importer, fabrication and construction, power generation, and tank and terminal industries. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

QTC-R.BK.summary: QTC Energy Public Company Limited manufactures and sells electric transformers in Thailand and internationally. The company offers hermetically sealed oil type distribution, on load tap changer, amorphous metal distribution, dry type class F and H, pad mounted, earthing, CSP-type, gas sealed, DE bus duct, dry type cast resin, and power transformers, as well as open type transformers with conservators. It also provides various services, such as scheduled checks and maintenance, transformer repairs and maintenance, transformer oil fill services, transformer rental services, etc. In addition, the company invests in renewable energy business; and produces and distributes electricity from solar energy. It offers its products under the QTC name, as well as under customer specific brands. The company was formerly known as QTC Transformers Co., Ltd. and changed its name to QTC Energy Public Company Limited in August 2010. QTC Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

Its music business comprises the selection of artists, music production, music promotion, strategic media planning and marketing, artist management, and managing music content. The company also sells music in various formats through digital content, mobile music formats, and online streaming, as well as engages in the copyright collection. In addition, it organizes concerts; and is involved in the marketing business. Further, the company offers skin care products under the Magique brand; hair care products under the Revive brand; and food supplements under the S.O.M. brand, as well as home and lifestyle products and accessories and others. RWI-R.BK.summary: Rayong Wire Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes wire products primarily in Thailand. It also provides hard drawn wires for use in mattress, auto parts, wire mesh, and spring industries; low carbon steel wires, which are used in piling industry, electricity posts, and drains; and wire mesh products used in the construction of roads, buildings, and finished walls. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Rayong, Thailand. Rayong Wire Industries Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Capital Engineering Network Public Company Limited.

SAMART-R.BK.summary: Samart Corporation Public Company Limited designs and installs telecommunications systems, and sells telecommunications equipment in Thailand, Cambodia, and internationally. It operates through ICT Solution and Service, Digital, Call Center, Utilities and Transportations, and Technology Related Services segments. The ICT Solution and Service segment offers solutions and services in information and communication technology, including network solutions; and consulting, system design, installation and implementation, and operation and maintenance solutions and services for clients in the government and private sectors. The Digital segment provides integrated services in digital network, solution, and content. The Call Center segment offers outsourced contact center and customer management services, and turnkey total solutions, as well as digital service innovation and debt collection services; and operates a training institute. The Utilities and Transportations segment provides air traffic control services; supplies electricity in Cambodia; and offers construction design and installation services of electrical power transmission systems. The Technology Related Services segment manufactures and distributes television, and radio antennas and satellite dishes; and distributes, installs, and maintains communication and security systems. The company also provides broadcast network and system integrator services; distributes communication and electronic equipment; offers wire and wireless communication systems, nuclear technology services, and radiation for commercial purposes; leases freehold land; and invests in public utilities in the Indochina region. In addition, it provides engineering, procurement, and construction contractor, as well as maintenance services; and traffic control, electricity transportation, public rural telephone, TV media, and sport license and related services. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

SAMCO-R.BK.summary: Sammakorn Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development activities in Thailand. The company develops single houses, town homes, condominiums, and office parks. It also develops land into community malls; and offers real estate management and other related services. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SAMTEL-R.BK.summary: Samart Telcoms Public Company Limited engages in the fully-integrated telecommunications, communication network, and information technology businesses in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Network Infrastructure Solutions, Enhanced Technology Solutions, and Business Application. The Network Infrastructure Solutions segment provides advanced solutions and services for telecommunications and data communication networks comprising consultation, survey, design, installation and implementation, and system management services, as well as professional maintenance services for wired and wireless networks, including core networks, access networks, and network equipment and end devices; and various communications services through high-speed networks and satellite communications. The Enhanced Technology Solutions segment offers solutions, such as consultation, engineering design and software development to installation, project management, management, and maintenance services for information technology systems comprising advanced systems customization. The Business Application segment provides advanced software application services that enhance the operations of corporate and public sector clients. It is also involved in the repair and maintenance of systems; electronic fund transfer; electronic data interchange; provision of internet services; e-learning software development consultation; cyber security; and design and installation of enterprise resource planning (ERP) system and fully integrate ERP solution for government and public sectors. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Pak Kret, Thailand. Samart Telcoms Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Samart Corporation Public Company Limited.

SANKO-R.BK.summary: Sanko Diecasting (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes aluminum products and parts in Thailand and internationally. Its automotive parts include alternators/motor start parts, fan clutches, air compressors, safety belts, pipes, water coolers, wipers, and audio parts, as well as headlamp heatsink parts; motorcycle parts comprise carburetors, clutches, cosmetic, housing, and frame arm parts; electric products consisting of CCTV and camcorders; and electric air and pump parts. The company also offers home decoration products from brass, copper, iron, and aluminum by lost wax casting; and tractors, grass cutters, oil, and air compressor parts, as well as mower assembly and components in agricultural industry. Sanko Diecasting (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

SAPPE-R.BK.summary: Sappe Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes healthy food and beverage products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers functional drinks under the Sappe Beauti Drink, Sappe Beauti Shot, and St. Anna brands; fruit-flavored vitamin water under the B'lue Water brand; fruit-flavored drinks with aloe vera flesh under the Sappe Aloe Vera Drink brand; fruit and ready-to-drink vegetable juices under the Sappe For One Day brand; juices with coconut jelly under the Mogu Mogu brand; and aromatic coconut water under the All Coco brand. It also provides ready-to-drink coffee powder under the Preaw Coffee and SlimFit Coffee; chlorophyll powder under the Preaw Chlorophyll; and dietary supplement powders under the Sappe Beauti Powder brands. In addition, the company offers jelly for health and beauty purpose under the Beauti Jelly; grilled fish snacks under the ZeaMax; shrimp snacks under the Chimdii; jelly format product for men under the Maxtive; and organic soy pudding under the DeNosh brands, as well as imports, exports, and distributes goods. The company was formerly known as Sapanan General Food Company Limited and changed its name to Sappe Public Company Limited in September 2013. Sappe Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SAT-R.BK.long_name: Somboon Advance Technology Public Company Limited
SAT-R.BK.summary: Somboon Advance Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells pick-up axles and truck trunnion shafts in Thailand. It offers axel shafts, disc and drum brakes, exhaust manifolds, leaf springs, stabilizer bars, hot coil springs, and other products. The company also provides its parts for passenger cars, pick-ups, and trucks, as well as for the agriculture machinery industry. In addition, it rents and invests in real estate. The company serves original equipment manufacturers and replacement equipment manufacturers. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

SAUCE-R.BK.summary: Thaitheparos Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes sauces and condiments in Thailand and internationally. It offers seasoning food products under the Golden Mountain brand, including seasoning sauces, chilli sauces, distilled vinegar products, tomato ketchups, chilli and tomato sauces, and oyster sauces, as well as fermented soy sauces and powdering sauces, and fermented soy sauce powders; chilli sauces under the Sriraja Panich brand; and Japanese soy sauce under the Kinzan Shoyu brand. The company was formerly known as Thai Theparos Food Products Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thaitheparos Public Company Limited in April 2011. Thaitheparos Public Company Limited was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Muang, Thailand.

SAWAD-R.BK.summary: Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides finance services in Thailand. The company offers hire purchase and loan, and non-performing assets management services. It also invests in other companies; and provides management and consulting services for retail credit systems in local and foreign country, as well as credit sale in foreign country. In addition, it provides digital personal loan services. The company was formerly known as Srisawad Power 1979 Public Company Limited and changed its name to Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited in July 2017. Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SAWANG-R.BK.summary: Sawang Export Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of precious stones and jewelry in Thailand, Europe, Australia, the United States, and internationally. The company offers jewelry accessories, including rings, pendants, earrings, and necklaces made with 8k, 9k, 10k, 14k, and 18k gold or silver consisting of diamond and color stones. It also provides diamond, precious, semi-precious, and created stones; color stones, such as rubies, and natural blue and yellow sapphires, as well as synthetic stones; and gold and silver jewelry sets. The company markets its products under the Beawelry brand name. It also exports its products. Sawang Export Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SC-R.BK.long_name: SC Asset Corporation Public Company Limited
SC-R.BK.summary: SC Asset Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a real estate development company in Thailand. The company operates through Real Estates sales; Rental and Rendering of Services; and Consulting and Management Service segments. It develops and sells single detached houses, townhomes, and condominiums, as well as home offices; and rents office and technical buildings. It also provides consulting and management services. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCB-R.BK.long_name: The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited
SCB-R.BK.summary: The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited provides various financial products and services. It operates in four segments: Corporate, SME, Retail, and Insurance. The company offers deposit products, such as savings, current, fixed deposit, long term deposit, foreign currency, and E passbook deposit accounts; home, car, personal, and mortgage loans; debit and credit cards; investment products comprising mutual funds, debentures, bonds, and treasury bills; accident, savings, health expense, cancer, heritage and life protection, income protection, travel, motor, loan protection, property, unit linked, and other insurance products; and various payment services. It also provides credit facilities, such as overdrafts, promissory note, clean bill discount, long term loans, letter of guarantee, standby letter of credit, and acceptance/Aval; financial advisory and merger acquisition services; fixed income instrument and underwriting service; structured and project finance; foreign exchange and interest rate risk management services; and investment solutions. In addition, the company offers business collection, business payments, and bank accounts and liquidity management solutions; corporate trust services, including custody, mutual fund supervisor, registrar, escrow agent, security agent, and debenture holder's representative services; international trade remittance, fund transfer, and foreign exchange services; and digital banking services. It operates through its head office and branch network in Thailand; and through its branches in Singapore, Hong Kong, Laos, Vietnam, Shanghai, the Cayman Islands, and Myanmar, as well as through its subsidiary in Cambodia. The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCC-R.BK.long_name: The Siam Cement Public Company Limited
SCC-R.BK.summary: The Siam Cement Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in cement, building materials, chemicals, packaging, and investment businesses in Thailand, Vietnam, Indonesia, China, and internationally. The company operates through Cement-Building Materials Business, Chemicals Business, Packaging Business, and Other segments. The Cement-Building Materials Business segment manufactures and sells grey cement, ready-mixed concrete, white cement, dry mortar, roof tiles, concrete paving blocks, ceramic tiles, and sanitary wares and fittings. It also distributes cement, building, and decorative products through distributors; and imports fuel products and waste paper. The Chemicals Business segment manufactures and sells olefins, polyolefins, and other chemical products. The Packaging Business segment manufactures and distributes paper and plastic packaging products, pulp, dissolving pulp, and printing and writing paper. The Other segment invests primarily in agricultural machine, automotive parts and components, and steel businesses, as well as other services. The company was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCCC-R.BK.long_name: Siam City Cement Public Company Limited
SCCC-R.BK.summary: Siam City Cement Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells cement products primarily in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Cement, Concrete and Aggregate, Trading, and Others. The company offers portland, hydraulic, mixed, and masonry cement under the INSEE Cement brand; plastering, bricklaying, floor leveling, tile adhesive, dry concrete, cementitious grout, and other mortars under the INSEE Mortar brand; and blocks, lintels, and panels under the INSEE SUPERBLOCK brand. It also provides ready-mixed concrete and aggregates; construction materials and light-weight concrete products; and industrial waste disposal, alternative fuel, raw material trading, and industrial cleaning services. In addition, the company generates electricity from waste heat; and provides technical services, and information technology management and development services. Siam City Cement Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCG-R.BK.summary: Sahacogen (Chonburi) Public Company Limited produces and distributes electricity and steam in Thailand. It operates a cogeneration power plant with a capacity to produce 214 megawatts of electricity and 96 tons of steam per hour. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

SCGP-R.BK.summary: SCG Packaging Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells packaging, pulp, and printing and writing paper products in Thailand, Vietnam, Indonesia, the Philippines, and internationally. The company operates in Integrated Packaging Chain and Fibrous Chain segments. It offers corrugated containers, retail display packaging products, and flexible and rigid packaging products; packaging paper, paper grocery bags, and industrial bags; and dissolving pulp and food containers. The company also provides fiber-based, performance, and polymer packaging products; packaging design services; and wastepaper collection services. In addition, it engages in the marketing and event, energy and utilities, asset and intellectual property management, and forestry businesses. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. SCG Packaging Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of The Siam Cement Public Company Limited.

SCI-R.BK.summary: SCI Electric Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of electrical switch boards and galvanized steel structures to various public/private sector projects. It operates through three segments: Manufacture of Switch Board, Manufacture and Galvanized Service, and Services and Others. The Manufacturer of Switch Board segment offers low and medium voltage electrical switch boards, cable trays, support systems, and related equipment. The Manufacture and Galvanized Service segment provides transmission line and telecommunication towers, as well as galvanizing steel structures; sells wiring equipment; and offers hot dip galvanized services. The Services and Others segment offers project management services under the engineering, procurementm and construction contract; and distributes and sells electricity produced from the hydroelectric power plant. SCI Electric Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bang Bo, Thailand.

SCM-R.BK.summary: Successmore Being Public Company Limited operates as a network marketing company. The company operates through Multi-Level Marketing, Distributor Sales, and Rendering Services segments. It is involved in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of dietary supplements, cosmetics, skin care products, lifestyle products, home products, and plant supplement products. The company also arranges seminars; and provides render services for staff training. Successmore Being Public Company Limited was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCN-R.BK.summary: Scan Inter Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in trading natural gas through vehicle service stations in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Gas Related Business, Car Dealer and Spare Parts, Renewable Energy, and Others. The Gas Related Business segment engages in trading gas through natural gas for vehicle (NGV) service stations; filling gas of industrial compressed natural gas for industrial applications; providing service for quality improvement of natural gas; and transporting natural gas. This segment is also involved in the design, installation, repair, and maintenance of natural gas dispenser equipment; and design and installation of gas system in vehicles, as well as the testing of vehicle cylinders. It owns 13 NGV service stations. The Car Dealer and Spare Parts segment trades in cars and related spare parts. The Renewable Energy segment operates a solar power plant. The Others segment trades in liquid carbon dioxide, engine oil, and lubricants; and operates convenient stores, as well as provides transportation, warehousing, and distribution services.it also exports battery and glass. Scan Inter Public Company Limited is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

SCP-R.BK.long_name: Southern Concrete Pile Public Company Limited
SCP-R.BK.summary: Southern Concrete Pile Public Company Limited manufactures, sells, installs, and services prestressed concrete products primarily in Thailand. Its prestressed concrete products include prestressed concrete piles, prestressed concrete spun piles, prestressed concrete slabs, prestressed plank girders, and retaining prestressed concrete piles. The company also offers electricity concrete products comprising prestressed concrete poles, concrete cross-arms, and concrete stabs, as well as prestressed anchors and pole foundations; and precasted concrete product, such as concrete flooring tiles, concrete mortar flooring tiles, concrete paving blocks, round big curbs, precast reinforced concrete, and main-holds. It sells its products to the public sector and state enterprises, provincial electricity authority, key accounts, retail customers, contractors, and project owners. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SDC-R.BK.summary: Samart Digital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes communications and electronics equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Mobile and Non-Mobile. The Mobile segment distributes mobile phones bundling with contents under the i-mobile and other brands; and provides retail and wholesale 3G services. The Non-Mobile segment offers voice, audiovisual or multimedia, and infotainment services through mobile phones; content services through multimedia channels; multimedia and interactive media services; Website services; and entertainment services, as well as produces television and radio programs, printed media, and billboards. The company also provides real estate agency, space rental, and other services. The company was formerly known as Samart I-Mobile Public Company Limited and changed its name to Samart Digital Public Company Limited in October 2017. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand. Samart Digital Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Samart Corporation Public Company Limited.

The Non-Mobile segment offers voice, audiovisual or multimedia, and infotainment services through mobile phones; content services through multimedia channels; multimedia and interactive media services; Website services; and entertainment services, as well as produces television and radio programs, printed media, and billboards. The company also provides real estate agency, space rental, and other services. The company was formerly known as Samart I-Mobile Public Company Limited and changed its name to Samart Digital Public Company Limited in October 2017. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand. Samart Digital Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Samart Corporation Public Company Limited.

SE-ED-R.BK.summary: SE-Education Public Company Limited operates bookstores in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Retail Business, Other Distribution Channels, and School Business. It operates SE-ED book centers, network stores, and various university bookstores in Bangkok and other provinces. The company also publishes books, and academic and educational journals, as well as monthly magazines. In addition, it operates Plearnpattana School, which provides courses for students from pre-kindergarten to Matayom 6; offers consulting services; designs, develops, and distributes software and hardware products; and distributes books of other publishers to bookstores. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SE-R.BK.summary: SiamEast Solutions Public Company Limited distributes and provides services related to industrial equipment. The company offers centrifugal pumps for utility systems and industrial production processes; positive displacement pumps for high viscosity fluids; other equipment used in liquid ring gas compressor and centrifugal gas compressor; and energy efficiency measurement of pump systems, as well as engineering services for pumps. It also provides production process equipment, including strainers, filters, decanter centrifuges, mist eliminators, desiccants, ceramic catalyst bed support product, equipment to exchange materials, thermal and combustion units, air pollution treatment units, plastic pipes, plastic lined galvanized steel pipes, fire hoses, plastic tanks, breather valves, pressure relief valves, pressure relief plates, flameless explosion venting devices, isolation valves, and explosion suppression. In addition, the company offers adhesive products comprising cyanoacrylate glues, anaerobic adhesives, thread sealings, retainings, liquid gaskets, gasket sheet and spiral wound gaskets, and epoxy glues; sealant materials consisting of silicone and acrylic sealants, and polyurethane grouts; coating materials, such as coating and rust treatment products; and occupational health and safety products, including industrial cleaning paper products, machine tool removers, hand cleansers, gasket removers, safety glasses, safety gloves, body protection suits, fire blankets, chemical protection guards, heat resistant glass products, insulation products, pipe repairing kits, and cutting and grinding discs. Further, it provides surface coating services for machinery and equipment; design and sewing services for insulating covering machinery and equipment; demolition, assembly, installation, and testing services; and other services for the installation of a new pump. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

SEAFCO-R.BK.summary: Seafco Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the contractual construction of foundation and general public works in Thailand and internationally. It offers bored piling services, such as small and large diameter bored piling, auger drilling for bored piles, and drilling with bucket under slurries; rectangular, L shape, and T shape barrette piling services; and diaphragm walling services for deep basements, underpass tunnels, MRTA subway stations, and cut and cover tunnels. The company also undertakes substructure works, including foundation pile and diaphragm wall construction, temporary bracing installation, excavation, and construction of foundation mat and basement slabs. In addition, it engages in the civil construction of turnkey projects comprising underpass tunnels, fish marketplaces, and sports stadiums; and ground improvement works, such as soil improvement, deep mixing, and jet grouting for embankment foundations of highways, canals, river banks, tunnel openings, etc., as well as provision of vertical drain installation services. Further, the company offers ancillary services, including as sonic integrity test, drilling monitoring, pile load testing, and inclinometer monitoring, as well as rental services for movable and immovable assets. Seafco Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SEAOIL-R.BK.summary: Sea Oil Public Company Limited engages in the retail sale of fuel and lubricant oils, and related products primarily for tankers, fishery boats, and reefer vessels in Thailand, Singapore, Laos, Cambodia, Myanmar, and internationally. It offers marine fuel oil, high speed diesel oil, lubricants, and benzene. The company also provides catering and housekeeping services for oil and gas drilling crew; management services for solar power plant; generates electricity from solar power plant, and sells solar roof tops; and produces and distributes solvents and liquefied petroleum products, including white spirit, rubber solvent, diesel, and fuel oil. It serves land customers, factories, and transportation industries. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SELIC-R.BK.summary: Selic Corp Public Company Limited researches, manufactures, and distributes industrial adhesives in Thailand. The company offers hot melt, water based, and solvent based adhesives; and services, such as sample testing, consultation, recommendation, production line audit, foundation training, and other services. It also produces and distributes self-adhesive labels; and wholesales industrial chemicals. The company serves various industries, such as leather and shoes, furniture, packaging and labelling, food and beverage, printing, woodworking, automotive parts, etc. It also exports its industrial adhesives to Asia, Africa, Australia, the Middle East, South America, and New Zealand. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SENA-R.BK.summary: Sena Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development and sale of properties in Thailand. The company operates through Property Development for Sales, Golf Course Services, and Services Apartment segments. It primarily develops single-detached houses, townhouses, commercial buildings, and condominiums; and rents apartment, small shopping center, and office building. The company is also involved in golf course; and juristic person management businesses. In addition, it manufactures and distributes electricity from solar energy; distributes prefab steel and construction materials, as well as solar panels and inverters, including solar system installment; provides tool rental machinery and equipment for electricity, and engineering services and construction work on solar energy; acts as a real estate agents and brokers; manages real estate; and trades in non-residential real estate property. The company was formerly known as Krungthep Keha Group Co., Ltd. Sena Development Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SF-R.BK.long_name: Siam Future Development Public Company Limited
SF-R.BK.summary: Siam Future Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the rental of building space and provision of utility services in Thailand. The company is involved in the development and management of shopping centers; and installation of electricity and water meters. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 20 centers with gross leasable area of approximately 441,158 square meters. The company also provides utility services that comprise electricity, gas, water supply, and telephone services; and location procurement services. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SFLEX-R.BK.summary: Starflex Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes flexible packaging in Thailand. It offers packaging products for food and non-food. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bang Bo, Thailand.

SFP-R.BK.long_name: Siam Food Products Public Company Limited
SFP-R.BK.summary: Siam Food Products Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, grows, manufactures, and distributes processed food from agricultural products. Its products include pineapples in cans; aseptic and plastic bags; pineapple juice concentrates; other fruits in can and plastic cups; and canned pineapple juices, as well as animal feeds. The company is also involved in the commercial and investment activities. It also exports its products to the United States, the United Kingdom, Japan, Scandinavia, Germany, the Netherlands, France, Italy, and Spain. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Siam Food Products Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Plantheon Company Limited.

SFT-R.BK.summary: Shrinkflex (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes shrink sleeve label printing manufacturing systems in Thailand. The company offers high definition printing systems, which include gravure and digital printing systems. It also provides shrink and stretch films; and consulting services. The company also exports its products. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Chachoengsao, Thailand.

SGF-R.BK.summary: SGF Capital Public Company Limited provides factoring, loans, personal loans, and leasing services in Thailand. The company operates through Purchase of Account Receivable, Leasing and Hire Purchase, and Loan segments. It provides automobile and motorcycle hire purchase loans; personal loan against vehicle registration as collateral; long and short term loan; personal loan; and Nano finance. The company also offers financial advice and legal counsel services, as well as purchase or transfer of loan receivables. In addition, it provides services related to building and place. The company was formerly known as Siam General Factoring Public Company Limited and changed its name to SGF Capital Public Company Limited in May 2017. SGF Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SGP-R.BK.long_name: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited
SGP-R.BK.summary: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) and petrochemical products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum and Petrochemical Products, Transportation Services, and Other segments. It is also involved in the trading of petroleum for household cooking, industry, and transportation sectors. In addition, the company provides transportation services by land and ship; manufactures and distributes LPG cylinders; and offers warehousing and storage, and oil depots and port services. The company was formerly known as VSPP Development Company Limited. Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
