Thai Beverage Public Company Limited was founded in 2003 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TC-R.BK.summary: Tropical Canning (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and trades in canned and pouched seafood products in Thailand and internationally. The company is based in Hat Yai, Thailand.

TC.BK.summary: Tropical Canning (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and trades in canned and pouched seafood products in Thailand and internationally. The company is based in Hat Yai, Thailand.

TCAP-R.BK.summary: Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides various financial services in Thailand. It operates through six segments: Company, Banking Business, Asset Management Business, Securities Business, Life Insurance Business, and Non-Life Insurance Business. The company offers commercial banking and asset management, securities brokerage and analysis, proprietary trading, securities borrowing and lending, and investment and financial advisory services, as well as operates as an underwriter and securities registrar. It also provides mutual fund, private fund, and provident fund management services; life and health insurance to individuals, institution clients, and general organizations;  fire, automobile, marine and transportation, and miscellaneous insurance products; hire purchase services for trucks, pick-up cars, taxies, and big bikes; and leasing service for cranes, fork lifts, motorcycles, excavators, etc. The company was formerly known as National Finance Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited in April 2006. Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1959 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TCAP.BK.summary: Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides various financial services in Thailand. It operates through six segments: Company, Banking Business, Asset Management Business, Securities Business, Life Insurance Business, and Non-Life Insurance Business. The company offers commercial banking and asset management, securities brokerage and analysis, proprietary trading, securities borrowing and lending, and investment and financial advisory services, as well as operates as an underwriter and securities registrar. It also provides mutual fund, private fund, and provident fund management services; life and health insurance to individuals, institution clients, and general organizations;  fire, automobile, marine and transportation, and miscellaneous insurance products; hire purchase services for trucks, pick-up cars, taxies, and big bikes; and leasing service for cranes, fork lifts, motorcycles, excavators, etc. The company was formerly known as National Finance Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited in April 2006. Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1959 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TCJ-R.BK.summary: T.C.J. Asia Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, imports and distributes machinery and lifting equipment for construction work, and loading and unloading services in Thailand and internationally. It provides tractors, wheel loaders, excavator, and cranes. The company also manufactures and distributes stainless steel pipes, as well as trades in stainless steel products. In addition, it is involved in the rental and repair of cranes and trucks; and installation works. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

TCJ.BK.summary: T.C.J. Asia Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, imports and distributes machinery and lifting equipment for construction work, and loading and unloading services in Thailand and internationally. It provides tractors, wheel loaders, excavator, and cranes. The company also manufactures and distributes stainless steel pipes, as well as trades in stainless steel products. In addition, it is involved in the rental and repair of cranes and trucks; and installation works. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

TCMC-R.BK.summary: TCM Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture, distribution, and sale of various rugs and carpets in Thailand, the United Kingdom, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Flooring, Carpet and Upholstery Fabrics, and Sofa Chair. It offers Axminster and hand carpets under the Royal Thai brand; carpets for internal flooring of the vehicles; upholstery fabrics for vehicles; and carpets for the corporate sector, including offices and commercial spaces. The company also provides sofa chairs; manufactures wooden flames for sofa chair; and sells flooring products. It serves hotels, theatres, airports, houses, palaces, cruise ships, casinos, and convention centers. TCM Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TCMC.BK.summary: TCM Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture, distribution, and sale of various rugs and carpets in Thailand, the United Kingdom, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Flooring, Carpet and Upholstery Fabrics, and Sofa Chair. It offers Axminster and hand carpets under the Royal Thai brand; carpets for internal flooring of the vehicles; upholstery fabrics for vehicles; and carpets for the corporate sector, including offices and commercial spaces. The company also provides sofa chairs; manufactures wooden flames for sofa chair; and sells flooring products. It serves hotels, theatres, airports, houses, palaces, cruise ships, casinos, and convention centers. TCM Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TCOAT-R.BK.long_name: Thai Coating Industrial Public Company Limited
TCOAT-R.BK.summary: Thai Coating Industrial Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells plastic sacks and beads in Thailand. It also exports its products. Thai Coating Industrial Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Prachinburi, Thailand.

TCOAT.BK.long_name: Thai Coating Industrial Public Company Limited
TCOAT.BK.summary: Thai Coating Industrial Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells plastic sacks and beads in Thailand. It also exports its products. Thai Coating Industrial Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Prachinburi, Thailand.

TDZ2.SG.summary: Samart Digital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes communications and electronics equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Mobile and Non-Mobile. The Mobile segment distributes mobile phones bundling with contents under the i-mobile and other brands; and provides retail and wholesale 3G services. The Non-Mobile segment offers voice, audiovisual or multimedia, and infotainment services through mobile phones; content services through multimedia channels; multimedia and interactive media services; Website services; and entertainment services, as well as produces television and radio programs, printed media, and billboards. The company also provides real estate agency, space rental, and other services. The company was formerly known as Samart I-Mobile Public Company Limited and changed its name to Samart Digital Public Company Limited in October 2017. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand. Samart Digital Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Samart Corporation Public Company Limited.

TEAM-R.BK.summary: Team Precision Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and assembles printed circuit and electronics circuit boards in Thailand and internationally. The company offers electronics manufacturing services, such as through-hole assembly; surface mount technology assembly; fine pitch ball grid array, flip chip, and chip-on-board assembly in clean-room environment; de-ionized water-cleaning; chemical compound encapsulation; and box build and retail packing services. It also provides design and prototyping services consisting of design for manufacturing, design for test, PCB layout design, and complete product software and hardware design. In addition, the company offers logistics and warehousing services comprising build to order, configure to order, fulfillment warehouse, hub warehousing with online monitoring, and overseas milk run services. The company serves customers in the industrial, medical, specialty, telecommunication, automotive, and consumer industries. Team Precision Public Company Limited is headquartered in Mueang Prachinburi, Thailand.

TEAMG-R.BK.long_name: TEAM Consulting Engineering and Management Public Company Limited
TEAMG-R.BK.summary: TEAM Consulting Engineering and Management Public Company Limited provides integrated engineering, environment, and management consultancy services in Thailand and internationally. It also prepares environmental impact assessment reports. The company offers planning, design, study, and construction supervision and management services for mass transportation systems, railways, motorways, roads and rural highways, bridges and crossings, airports, harbors, mass transportation systems, and traffic engineering and logistics management. It also provides services related to basin-wide water resource management and development, irrigation, flood control and drainage, hydropower, coastal engineering, and water supply. In addition, the company offers services, including research, planning, designing, project management, construction supervision, operation, and maintenance for building and infrastructure projects; and services related to environmental studies for various projects, such as water resource development, transportation systems, building and infrastructure, and clean energy, as well as wastewater, solid waste, and hazardous waste management projects. Further, it provides services related to power system development, oil and gas industry, fossil-fuel and renewable energy technology, energy conservation, and clean energy. Additionally, the company offers consulting services; strategic management, finance and investment, accounting, marketing, project management, and project development services; and energy engineering comprising energy conservation, energy utilization, energy management system, energy measurement, energy utilization inspection, and analysis for government and private sectors, as well as plans and designs building architecture, interior design, and landscape architecture. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TEAMG.BK.long_name: TEAM Consulting Engineering and Management Public Company Limited
TEAMG.BK.summary: TEAM Consulting Engineering and Management Public Company Limited provides integrated engineering, environment, and management consultancy services in Thailand and internationally. It also prepares environmental impact assessment reports. The company offers planning, design, study, and construction supervision and management services for mass transportation systems, railways, motorways, roads and rural highways, bridges and crossings, airports, harbors, mass transportation systems, and traffic engineering and logistics management. It also provides services related to basin-wide water resource management and development, irrigation, flood control and drainage, hydropower, coastal engineering, and water supply. In addition, the company offers services, including research, planning, designing, project management, construction supervision, operation, and maintenance for building and infrastructure projects; and services related to environmental studies for various projects, such as water resource development, transportation systems, building and infrastructure, and clean energy, as well as wastewater, solid waste, and hazardous waste management projects. Further, it provides services related to power system development, oil and gas industry, fossil-fuel and renewable energy technology, energy conservation, and clean energy. Additionally, the company offers consulting services; strategic management, finance and investment, accounting, marketing, project management, and project development services; and energy engineering comprising energy conservation, energy utilization, energy management system, energy measurement, energy utilization inspection, and analysis for government and private sectors, as well as plans and designs building architecture, interior design, and landscape architecture. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TFBF.F.summary: Kasikornbank Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides commercial banking products and services in Thailand and internationally. The company's personal banking products and services include savings, current, fixed deposit, and foreign currency accounts; personal, home, and auto loans; debit and credit cards; life and non-life insurance products; investment products, such as mutual funds, stocks, and derivatives/futures exchange; money transfer and bill payment, cheque and draft, and foreign exchange services; and mobile banking services. It also offers various products and services for small and medium enterprises, including savings, current, and fixed deposits; working capital, commercial, and special loans, as well as letters of guarantee; collection and payment services; life, non-life, and group insurance products; and import, export, and money transfer services. In addition, the company provides various products and services for corporate customers, such as cash management solutions, including current, savings, special savings deposit, and fixed deposit accounts, as well as collection, payment, liquidity management, and electronic solutions; international trade solutions comprising import and export, global money transfer, guarantee, and trade finance solutions; working capital loans, term loans, special loans, and letters of guarantee; supply chain financing; life, non-life, and group insurance products; and foreign exchange and derivatives, corporate finance, securities, investment, and business card services. Further, it offers auto and equipment leasing, and venture capital management services. Kasikornbank Public Company Limited was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TFG-R.BK.summary: Thaifoods Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces chicken and swine primarily in Thailand and Vietnam. The company operates through Poultry Business, Swine Business, Feed Mill Business, and Others segments. The company engages in chicken breeding, chicken meat production and sales, and sales of day-old chicks, live chickens, and processed chicken; pig breeding, sale of live pig and pork meat; manufacture and sale of feed for animals; provision of research facility services; and production and sales of animal feed sacks, plastic farming equipment, and sauce and seasoning drinks. It also offers chicken products, such as whole chickens, chicken parts, and processed chicken. In addition, the company distributes frozen chicken products; and produces and distributes swine. Further, it engages in the production and distribution of broiler and chilled chicken; research of cattle diseases; manufacture of vaccine, and sacks and plastic sacks; and provision of equipment rental services. Thaifoods Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

Thaifoods Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TFI-R.BK.long_name: Thai Film Industries Public Company Limited
TFI-R.BK.summary: Thai Film Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and sells packaging films in Thailand, Asia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. It offers BOPP, CPP, PET, and metalized films for use in printing, lamination, and adhesive tapes. The company was formerly known as TFI Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Film Industries Public Company Limited in July 2012. Thai Film Industries Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

TFMAMA-R.BK.long_name: Thai President Foods Public Company Limited
TFMAMA-R.BK.summary: Thai President Foods Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes instant noodles, biscuits and wafers, and instant foods in Thailand. The company also offers fruit juices, biscuits, wheat flour, and packaging materials for food and paper cups, as well as bread and bakery products. In addition, it is involved in the real estate investment business. The company also exports its products to rest of Asia, Australia, Europe, Canada, America, and Africa. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TFMAMA.BK.long_name: Thai President Foods Public Company Limited

The company also offers fruit juices, biscuits, wheat flour, and packaging materials for food and paper cups, as well as bread and bakery products. In addition, it is involved in the real estate investment business. The company also exports its products to rest of Asia, Australia, Europe, Canada, America, and Africa. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TGH-R.BK.long_name: Thai Group Holdings Public Company Limited
TGH-R.BK.summary: Thai Group Holdings Public Company Limited engages in the underwriting of life and non-life insurance business principally in Thailand. The company offers fire insurance products that provides coverage for residential and commercial properties caused by fire, gas explosion, and lighting. It also provides marine insurance products for losses or damages of shipping cargo, and/or ship vessels; domestic and international point-to-point marine, air, and land transportation; import and export protection; and other damages, including accident, explosive, vehicle damage or disappeared, and etc. The company's motor insurance offers coverage for vehicle damages, theft, fire, loss of life, and injury; and third party's vehicle damages, loss of life, and injury. In addition, it offers personal accidents, travel, cancer, accidental and property damage, burglary, all risk, plate glass, money, neon sign, contractors all risks, erection all risks, boiler & pressure vessel, electronic equipment, contractors' plant and equipment, machinery breakdown, public liability, medical malpractice liability, directors' and officers' liability, workmen's compensation, fidelity guarantee, golfer's indemnity, and other insurances. Further, the company provides auto leasing, used and new car hire purchase, cash your car, revolving loan, factoring loan, project finance, and other loans; and insurance agent training, business consulting, and property leasing, etc, as well as engages in the reinsurance business. Additionally, develops and rents real estate properties; management services; provides investing consultant and develops insurance technology. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TGPRO-R.BK.summary: Thai-German Products Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes stainless steel pipes, sheets, axles, and equipment in Thailand. The company offers industrial stainless steel pipes; heat exchanger tubes; stainless steel pipes for sugar and ice industries; decorative stainless steel pipes; sanitary tubes for food, beverage, and pharmaceutical industries; Hartsfield stainless 3D products; and stainless steel sheets for applications in indoor and outdoor decoration, furniture, kitchenware, refrigerator, etc. It also provides Extuba turbo tubes; ornamental tubes that are used as handles of subway and sky train stations, interior/exterior doors of buildings, overpass fences, kitchen equipment, furniture, and pushcarts; and Missspectro services. In addition, the company offers services, such as coil slitting, coil polishing, and cutting of coil to sheets for various industries, including automotive, cold storage, kitchenware, etc.; stainless steel grade testing services; and stainless steel forming services, such as round, flat, and angle bars. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

TH-R.BK.long_name: Tong Hua Holding Public Company Limited
TH-R.BK.summary: Tong Hua Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, produces and distributes newspaper in Thailand. The company also provides publishing and printing services; and short-term funds in the form of factoring, loans, and leasing services. In addition, it offers space rental for products and services business; and engages in the investment business. The company was formerly known as Tong Hua Communications Public Company Limited and changed its name to Tong Hua Holding Public Company Limited in May 2016. Tong Hua Holding Public Company Limited was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

THAF.F.long_name: Thai Airways International Public Company Limited
THAF.F.summary: Thai Airways International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the operation of airline business. It operates through three segments: Air Transportation Activities, Business Units, and Other Activities. The Air Transportation Activities segment provides composed of passenger, freight, and mail services. The Business Units segments offers cargo and mail commercial, ground customer, ground handling and equipment, and catering services. The Other Activities segment is involved in the transportation supporting activities, which include dispatch services, sales on board, THAI shop, and technical services. The company is also involved in the provision of aviation training services; tourism business; and information technology for travel services. As of December 31, 2019, it had a route network servicing to 62 destinations in 31 countries with 3 domestic destinations; and a fleet of 103 aircraft, including 32 owned aircraft, 32 aircraft under finance leases, and 39 aircraft under operating leases. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

THAI-R.BK.long_name: Thai Airways International Public Company Limited
THAI-R.BK.summary: Thai Airways International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the operation of airline business. It operates through three segments: Air Transportation Activities, Business Units, and Other Activities. The Air Transportation Activities segment provides composed of passenger, freight, and mail services. The company is also involved in the provision of aviation training services; tourism business; and information technology for travel services. THANI-R.BK.summary: Ratchthani Leasing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, provides hire-purchase and leasing services in Thailand. It operates through three segments: New Car, Used Car, and Others. The company provides super car, car, bike, truck, and taxi loans, as well as other loans. It also provides insurance brokerage services. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Ratchthani Leasing Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Thanachart SPV1 Co., Ltd.

THANI.BK.summary: Ratchthani Leasing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, provides hire-purchase and leasing services in Thailand. It operates through three segments: New Car, Used Car, and Others. The company provides super car, car, bike, truck, and taxi loans, as well as other loans. It also provides insurance brokerage services. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Ratchthani Leasing Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Thanachart SPV1 Co., Ltd.

THCOM-R.BK.summary: Thaicom Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides transponder services for domestic and international communications. The company operates through three segments: Satellite and Related Services, Internet and Media Services, and Telephone Business Abroad. It also offers broadband content, internet data center, Internet, satellite uplink-downlink, broadcasting television, telecommunications, telephone network, and mobile content services. In addition, the company sells user terminal iPSTAR, as well as direct television equipment. Further, it is involved in the provision of technical support services in relation to satellite business, as well as engineering and development services on communication technology and electronics; and system integration consultancy services for broadband networks. The company has operations in Thailand, Singapore, Cambodia, Lao PDR, Australia, New Zealand, Mauritius, the British Virgin Islands, Japan, and India. Thaicom Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company has operations in Thailand, Singapore, Cambodia, Lao PDR, Australia, New Zealand, Mauritius, the British Virgin Islands, Japan, and India. Thaicom Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

THE-R.BK.summary: The Steel Public Company Limited engages in selling and transforming steel products in Thailand. It offers hot and cold rolled coils and sheets, electro galvanized steel coils and sheets, and hot dip galvanized steel coils and sheets; and light lip channel steel products, square and rectangular steel pipes, carbon steel pipes, hot rolled steel sheets and plates, checkered plates, angle steel bars, channel steel bars, galvanized steel pipes, square and flat bars, and cold round bars. The company also provides structural steel products, including H-beams, I-beams, wide flanges, and steel sheet piles; and steel bars, such as round and deformed steel bars. In addition, it produces and processes hot rolled steel into various products comprising slitting coils, steel pipes, and C-channels; and offers logistic services. The company was formerly known as Thai Yuan Metal Public Company Limited and changed its name to The Steel Public Company Limited in July 2014. The Steel Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

THG-R.BK.long_name: Thonburi Healthcare Group Public Company Limited
THG-R.BK.summary: Thonburi Healthcare Group Public Company Limited operates private hospitals in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Medical Services Business, Healthcare Solution Provider, and Other Business. It offers services in various medical fields, including brain and neurology, bone and joint, gastro intestinal and liver, heart, and obstetrics and gynecology; and management services for provincial state hospitals, as well as for heart centers in the public and private sectors. The company also offers senior care and senior living, and home healthcare services; provides cleaning services, disinfecting and removal of dust mites; operates the patient rehabilitation center; conducts housing business for elderly; and operates care center and elderly carecenter, as well as distributes dental supplies brands, such as Adec, W&H, AO, Heraeus, Ivoclar, Megagen, SAM, Melag, and Alpro. It also sells pharmaceutical and medical goods in specialised stores; develops hospital management software; and develops land and property. The company operates three Bangkok-based hospitals, such as Thonburi, Thonburi2 and Thonburi Bamrungmuang hospitals; and four provincial hospitals, including Rajyindee, Ubonrak Thonburi, Sirivej Chanthaburi, and Thonburi Thungsong hospitals. Thonburi Healthcare Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

Thonburi Healthcare Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

THIP-R.BK.summary: Thantawan Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic products in Thailand. It offers a drinking straws, zipper and slider bags, general bags, cling wraps, zip profiles, and body puffs; and compostable products comprising paper and bio straws, bio zipper bags, bio shopping bags, bio t-shirt bag, and bio garbage bag on roll. The company sells its products under the Sun Products, Kitchen Neat, Fresh & Fresh, Zipsolution, Sun Bio, and Sun Mum brands. The company was formerly known as Blowtech (Thailand) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Thantawan Industry Public Company Limited in 1994. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Sam Phran, Thailand. Thantawan Industry Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Sunflower Company Limited.

THMUI-R.BK.long_name: Thai Mui Corporation Public Company Limited
THMUI-R.BK.summary: Thai Mui Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of wire rope products and lifting equipment in Thailand. The company operates through Sales and Service; and Project Work segments. It offers single layer or single strand, and rotation resistant or multi strand wire ropes; flat and round webbing slings; steel chain slings; and lifting equipment, such as thimbles, wire rope clamps/clips, shackles, chain blocks, level blocks or level hoists, electric chain hoists, and masterlinks, as well as HDPE pipes, electric motors, hooks, and light bulbs. The company also provides services that include inspection service on wire rope tensile strength and replacement services; visual inspection service of the crane and wire rope; non-destructive testing; and installation, repair, consultancy and training services. The company was formerly known as Thai Mui Trading Corporation Co., Ltd. Thai Mui Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

THMUI.BK.long_name: Thai Mui Corporation Public Company Limited
THMUI.BK.summary: Thai Mui Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of wire rope products and lifting equipment in Thailand. The company operates through Sales and Service; and Project Work segments. It offers single layer or single strand, and rotation resistant or multi strand wire ropes; flat and round webbing slings; steel chain slings; and lifting equipment, such as thimbles, wire rope clamps/clips, shackles, chain blocks, level blocks or level hoists, electric chain hoists, and masterlinks, as well as HDPE pipes, electric motors, hooks, and light bulbs. The company also provides services that include inspection service on wire rope tensile strength and replacement services; visual inspection service of the crane and wire rope; non-destructive testing; and installation, repair, consultancy and training services. The company was formerly known as Thai Mui Trading Corporation Co., Ltd. Thai Mui Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

THNUY.summary: Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides various financial services in Thailand. It operates through six segments: Company, Banking Business, Asset Management Business, Securities Business, Life Insurance Business, and Non-Life Insurance Business. The company offers commercial banking and asset management, securities brokerage and analysis, proprietary trading, securities borrowing and lending, and investment and financial advisory services, as well as operates as an underwriter and securities registrar. It also provides mutual fund, private fund, and provident fund management services; life and health insurance to individuals, institution clients, and general organizations;  fire, automobile, marine and transportation, and miscellaneous insurance products; hire purchase services for trucks, pick-up cars, taxies, and big bikes; and leasing service for cranes, fork lifts, motorcycles, excavators, etc. The company was formerly known as National Finance Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited in April 2006. Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1959 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

THRE-R.BK.summary: Thai Reinsurance Public Company Limited provides insurance and reinsurance services in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Conventional Products and Non-Conventional Products. The company offers reinsurance coverage for property, casualty, engineering, marine, and life customers. It also provides computer services in relation to motor claim management; claim management and marketing services; and actuarial, training, and advisory services, as well as insurance outsourcing and consulting services. In addition, the company develops electronic commerce services. Thai Reinsurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

THREL-R.BK.long_name: Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited
THREL-R.BK.summary: Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited provides life reinsurance solutions to various life insurance companies in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Conventional Products and Non-Conventional Products. It offers ordinary, group, and credit life insurance, as well as personal accident and health reinsurance products under treaties and facultative basis. Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

THREL.BK.long_name: Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited
THREL.BK.summary: Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited provides life reinsurance solutions to various life insurance companies in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Conventional Products and Non-Conventional Products. It offers ordinary, group, and credit life insurance, as well as personal accident and health reinsurance products under treaties and facultative basis. Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

THYG.F.long_name: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited
THYG.F.summary: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells frozen, chilled, and canned seafood in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Ambient Seafood; Frozen and Chilled Seafood and Related Businesses; and Pet food, Value-Added and Other Businesses. It offers ambient seafood products, including tuna, sardines, salmon, mackerel, and herring for retail and wholesale customers; frozen and chilled seafood, such as shrimp, lobster, and crab directly to restaurants, hotels, and caterers; ready-to-cook or ready-to-serve products, as well as bakery treats; marine ingredients; and pet care products comprising surimi-based fish snacks, canned cod liver, and wet seafood-based cat and dog foods. The company provides its products under the Chicken of the Sea, Genova, John West, Petit Navire, Parmentier, King Oscar, Mareblu, RÃ¼gen Fisch, Sealect, Fisho, QFresh, Monori, Bellotta, and Marvo brands. It also imports and sells shrimp and other frozen seafood products to restaurant chains, retailers, and wholesalers, as well as exports canned seafood, tuna, canned sardines, and mackerel; manufactures and distributes smoked and chilled salmon, animal feed, and aquatic animals; rents properties; refines tuna oil; and provides logistic, training and management, e-commerce, printing manufacturing, technical, food products packaging, and business strategy and investment consulting services. The company was formerly known as Thai Union Frozen Products Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Union Group Public Company Limited in September 2015. Thai Union Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

TIGER-R.BK.long_name: Thai Enger Holding Public Company Limited
TIGER-R.BK.summary: Thai Enger Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in construction and interior service business. It is also involved in the business of aluminum installation and sale of construction material. Thai Enger Holding Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is based in Bang Kruai, Thailand.

TIGER.BK.long_name: Thai Enger Holding Public Company Limited
TIGER.BK.summary: Thai Enger Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in construction and interior service business. It is also involved in the business of aluminum installation and sale of construction material. Thai Enger Holding Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is based in Bang Kruai, Thailand.

TIP-R.BK.summary: Dhipaya Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. The company offers fire, marine and transport, motor, aviation, and miscellaneous insurance products, including accident, travel, health, cancer, public property, loyalty, burglary, golf, machinery, aircraft, financial, and responsibility insurance, as well as insurance to cover broken contracts for construction/installations. Dhipaya Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

Dhipaya Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TIPCO-R.BK.summary: Tipco Foods Public Company Limited produces and distributes processed fruits, fresh fruits, fruit juices, vegetable juices, natural mineral water, and ready-to-drink beverages in Thailand. The company is also involved in operating food and drink shops; and herbal extracts and farming business. It operates through Products of Vegetable & Fruit, Beverage, and Other segments. The company offers processed fruit products that include canned pineapple, pineapple juice concentrate, aseptic crushed pineapple, pineapple in plastic cup, pineapple in retort pouch, canned tropical fruit salad, tropical fruit salad in plastic cup, canned aloe vera, aseptic crushed aloe vera, aloe vera in retort pouch, and coconut milk products, as well as provides coconut water. It also produces plant and herbal extracts that serve as ingredients for foods, beverages, cosmetics, dietary supplements, and medicines. In addition, the company produces and distributes ready-to-drink fruit juices and vegetable juices; and ready-to-drink beverages, as well as agricultural products. Further, it operates 34 Squeeze Juice Bar by Tipco shops, including 11 company branches and 23 franchise branches that serve smoothies, and healthy drinks and foods. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Thai Pineapple PLC. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TISCO-R.BK.long_name: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited
TISCO-R.BK.summary: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited provides commercial banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Thailand. It operates through Commercial Banking Business, Securities Business, and Asset Management Business segments. The company accepts deposit products, such as current accounts, savings accounts, fixed deposit accounts, and certificates of deposit, as well as cards and bill payment services. It also provides personal loans, such as home loan, new and used car loans, and loans against inheritance pension; and corporate loans, including project and long term loans, short term loans, and guarantee products. In addition, the company offers investment services, including stock and derivative brokerage, mutual funds, private funds, and provident funds, as well as long term equity funds/retirement mutual funds; and insurance services, such as life, retirement, health and critical illness, cancer, personal accident, car, and travel insurance. Further, it provides investment banking services that financial advisory and underwriting for merger and acquisition, privatization advisory and implementation, project financing, debt restructuring, feasibility study, project valuation, general advisory, etc.; and private banking, and wealth and asset management services. Additionally, the company offers mobile banking, custodian, assets for sale, car auction services, hire purchase and retail loan, SME lending, and insurance brokerage services. TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TITLE-R.BK.long_name: Rhom Bho Property Public Company Limited
TITLE-R.BK.summary: Rhom Bho Property Public Company Limited operates as a property development company in Thailand. It develops and sells residential condominiums. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TITLE.BK.long_name: Rhom Bho Property Public Company Limited

TIW-R.BK.long_name: Thailand Iron Works Public Company Limited
TIW-R.BK.summary: Thailand Iron Works Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes galvanized iron sheets primarily in Thailand. The company offers hot dipped zinc coated steel sheets, including flat sheets for use in advertising and sign boards, air-ducts, bathroom doors, cabinets, vehicles extensions, and water storage industries; and corrugated sheets for roofing, fencing, partitioning, and siding of houses and buildings, as well as painted hot dipped zinc coated steel flat and corrugated sheets. It also provides roofing and siding installation services. Thailand Iron Works Public Company Limited was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Phra Samut Chedi, Thailand.

TK-R.BK.summary: Thitikorn Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides motorcycle and automobile hire-purchase, and other related services for general retail customers in Thailand. The company also offers loan and nano finance services, as well as vehicle modification services. Thitikorn Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TKN-R.BK.long_name: Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited
TKN-R.BK.summary: Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes fried, grilled, and baked seaweed and seaweed snacks in Thailand, China, Malaysia, Indonesia, Vietnam, the United States, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Snacks, Retailer, and Others. It also operates as a retailer of snacks, and food and beverage products. In addition, the company is involved in the distribution of snacks and souvenirs; manufacture and distribution of seasoning powders; and restaurant business. Taokaenoi Food & Marketing Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Lat Lum Kaeo, Thailand.

TKS-R.BK.summary: T.K.S. Technologies Public Company Limited manufactures and sells continuous paper forms, securities printing products, and other printing and continuous labels primarily in Thailand and internationally. The company's products include digital print and mail forms, cheque on demand forms, warehouse management forms, advance forms, business forms, office papers, and flexible packaging products. It is also involved in the provision of information technology and software consultancy services; investment activities; and laser printing and enveloping of statements, bills, and invoices. In addition, the company offers printing warehouse services. The company was founded in 1954 and is based in Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

TKT-R.BK.summary: T.Krungthai Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic parts in Thailand. The company also designs, manufactures, sells, and repairs plastic injection molds. It serves automotive, electrical appliance, and packaging industries, as well as original equipment manufacturers. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TM-R.BK.summary: Techno Medical Public Company Limited trades in medical supplies, tools, and equipment in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Disposable Equipment and Supplies, and Medical Equipment and Instrument segments. Techno Medical Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TMB-R.BK.summary: TMB Bank Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides various commercial banking products and services to personal, small and medium enterprises, and corporate customers in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Commercial Banking and Retail Banking segments. It offers transactional, current accounts, savings, term deposits, time deposits, and foreign currency deposits; personal and home loans, overdraft, term loans, letter of guarantee products, and working capital facilities; and credit and business cards. The company also provides mutual funds products; security, life and health, property, and unit link insurance products; wealth banking products; mobile and Internet banking services; payment, cash collection, and liquidity management services; international trade and risk management products; and digital banking, and bancassurance and business protection products. TMB Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TMC-R.BK.summary: T.M.C. Industrial Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes hydraulic machinery and handling equipment in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Manufacture and Distribution of Machinery; Services; and Project Construction Service. The company offers hydraulic presses, including hydraulic clapper die spotting, hydraulic die spotting, hydraulic try out, hydraulic deep drawing, hydraulic hemming, hydraulic molding for hot, hydraulic trimming and bending, and hydraulic special presses, as well as provides automation machines for interior material. It also provides material handling equipment, such as hydraulic hand pallet trucks, table lifts, drum carrier trucks, X-lifts, stackers, hydraulic lift elevators, and dock levelers; and motorcycle lifters and full rise scissor lifts. In addition, the company offers automatic parking lifts, such as two post parking, two post tilt parking, scissor ranking, four post parking, four post double wide, three floors valet vertical parking level parking, three level parking, pit design parking, and rotatory parking lifts. Further, it provides mobile cranes, such as knuckle and telescoping boom cranes, and container lifts; hydraulic static pile drivers; presses mechanical and hydraulic isgec; special materials; and hydraulic cylinders and power units; and home elevators. Additionally, the company offers machine repair and maintenance, and metal machining services. T.M.C. Industrial Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

TMD-R.BK.long_name: Thai Metal Drum Manufacturing Public Company Limited
TMD-R.BK.summary: Thai Metal Drum Manufacturing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes metal drums in Thailand. The company offers steel and plastic drums for the storage and transportation of lubricant oils, petrochemicals, chemicals, agriculture products, food products, and other products; polyethylene terepthalate plastic bottles and preforms; and polypropylene corrugated sheets to the drinking water and beverage companies. It is also involved in the rental of Lake Rajada office complex with a total leasing space of 51,730 square meters located in the business district on Rachadapisek road, Thailand, as well as trading business. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TMI-R.BK.summary: Teera-Mongkol Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electrical equipment in Thailand. The company offers a range of ballasts for fluorescent lamps, compact fluorescent lamps, and HID lamps for electronic and magnetic types; and control gear products, such as ignitors, photo switches, change over switches, and transformers for halogen lamps. It also generates and sells electricity. In addition, the company exports its products. Teera-Mongkol Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

TMILL-R.BK.short_name: T S FLOUR MILL PUBLIC COMPANY L
TMILL-R.BK.long_name: T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited
TMILL-R.BK.summary: T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited produces and distributes wheat flour in Thailand. The company also trades in, imports, and exports wheat, wheat products, and other grains. Its products are used in various bakery and food products, such as bread, noodles, instant noodles, pizza, donut, biscuit, steamed bun, deep-fried stick dough, flat bread, biscuit sponge cake, and cake. The company was formerly known as Thai Sugar Inter Trade Company Limited and changed its name to T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited in 2005. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Phra Pradaeng, Thailand. T S Flour Mill Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thai Sugar Terminal Public Co., Ltd.

TMT-R.BK.summary: Tmt Steel Public Company Limited sells and transforms structural steel, plates, and sheets primarily in Thailand. It offers flat products, including hot rolled sheets and plates, flat bars, slitting coils, and checkered plates; cold forming products, including round, rectangular, square, primer coated, and galvanized steel tubes, as well as pipes, light channel and angle, and primer coated and galvanized c channel. The company also provides hot formed steel products, such as H- section, cut, and I-section beam, as well as round and deformed bars, equal angle, and channel. In addition, it provides steel processing and cold forming services. The company was formerly known as Thai Metal Trade Public Company Limited. Tmt Steel Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TMW-R.BK.summary: Thai Mitsuwa Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic and magnesium products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers plastic parts for use in automotive parts and home appliances; and magnesium parts that are used in automobiles, computers, mobile phones, cameras, etc. It also manufactures and trades in molds. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Muang, Thailand. Thai Mitsuwa Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Mitsuwa Electric Industry Co., Ltd.

TNDT-R.BK.long_name: Thai Nondestructive Testing Public Company Limited
TNDT-R.BK.summary: Thai Nondestructive Testing Public Company Limited, a technical service company, provides nondestructive engineering services in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Nondestructive Testing Services, and Inspection Services for Pressure Vessel and Others. The company offers a range of conventional inspection services, including ultrasonic, radiography, eddy current, magnetic particle, liquid penetrant, positive material identification, and visual services. It also provides advance nondestructive testing technology and inspection techniques, such as above ground storage tank program, pipeline radiography, small controlled area radiography, remote visual inspection, positive material identification, and liquid pressure test packs. In addition, the company engages in the rendering excavation and transportation services of coal for the coal mine concessionaire; generation and sale of electricity from coal-fired thermal power; and procurement and servicing of public utility systems and other related businesses, as well as offers advisory services for engineering. Further, it provides engineering inspection and nondestructive testing of pressure vessels, heat exchangers, boilers, piping, and structures in the fields of oil refinery, power plant, petrochemical plant, ship building, offshore, bridge and building construction, and other various heavy industries. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNH-R.BK.summary: Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited engages in the hospital business in Thailand. The company offers medical services in the areas of heart, bone and joint, holistic oncology, hemodialysis, skin and laser, traditional Chinese medicine, ear, nose, throat, pediatrics, obstetrics, gynecology, medicine, dental, surgery, emergency, physical therapy, gastrointestinal, breast care, lasik, diabetes, endocrinology, brain, neurology, hepato-biliary, pancreas, X-ray, and eye, as well as operates check-up centers. Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNITY-R.BK.summary: Trinity Watthana Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the securities business in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Securities and Derivatives Business; and Financial Advisory Business and Investment Banking. The company is involved in the broking, trading, borrowing and lending, and underwriting of securities. It also provides investment advisory, private fund asset management, and financial advisory services, as well as operates as a derivatives agent. In addition, the company invests in other companies and listed companies. As of December 31, 2019, it had 7 branches. Trinity Watthana Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNL-R.BK.summary: Thanulux Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes finished garments and leather products for men, women and children in Thailand. It offers shirts, T-shirts, trousers, jeans, suits, jackets, pajamas, underwear, neckties, socks, maternity wear, swimsuits, and sportswear, as well as leather goods comprising wallets, handbags, and belts. The company also provides garments for infants to 8 year-olds; and diapers, bedding, shoes, socks, dolls, and accessories for toddlers. In addition, the company manufactures and exports various other products; and manufactures uniforms, Buddhist monk triple robes, and white robes for practice of dharma under the Thammarat and Thammasorn brand, as well as green living products under the SRIDA brand. Thanulux Public Company Limited exports its products to Europe, Asia, the United States, Australia, and South Africa. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNPC-R.BK.long_name: Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited
TNPC-R.BK.summary: Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited engages in the production and distribution of flexible plastic, synthetic leather, and car mats in Thailand and internationally. It offers polyvinyl chloride (PVC), foam sheet, PP foam leather, thermoplastic olefin, and rigid PVC. The company also exports its products. Its products have applications in automotive, sports shoes and balls, furniture, leather, civil engineering, and agriculture industries. Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Samutsakorn, Thailand.

TNR-R.BK.summary: Thai Nippon Rubber Industry Public Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes condoms and lubricating gels under the Onetouch brand in Thailand. It also manufactures paper packaging products. The company sells its products through retailers and distributors. It sells its products in approximately 100 countries, including Europe, Africa, the United States, the Middle East, and internationally. Thai Nippon Rubber Industry Public Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TOA-R.BK.summary: TOA Paint (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes paints and chemicals in Thailand, Vietnam, Laos, Myanmar, Cambodia, Indonesia, and Malaysia. The company offers construction chemicals, special paints, and hardware and power tools, as well as decorative, wood, and heavy duty coatings. TOA Paint (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Bang Sao Thong, Thailand.

TOG-R.BK.long_name: Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited
TOG-R.BK.summary: Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic lens and related products in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Plastic and Glass Lens; and Other Products and Services. The Plastic and Glass Lens segment produces and sells optical lenses. It offers CR39, photochromic, high index, high impact resistant, sunÂfiltered, and polarized lenses; and mineral and prescription lenses. The Other Products and Services segment is involved in the sale of glass molds; trade of goods purchased for resale; surface treatment of hard coatings; as well as anti-reflection coating services for organic lenses. The company distributes its products on an original equipment manufacturer basis, as well as under its Excelite, Excelite Trivex, Excelite Tribrid, ONE, Discovery, freedom, and MAXIMA brands. It also exports its products to Europe, Australia, rest of Asia and Pacific, the United States, Africa, and the Middle East. Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited serves wholesalers and retailers. The company was formerly known as Thai Polymer Lens Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited in 2004. Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bang Bua Thong, Thailand.

TOIPF.summary: Thai Oil Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in oil refining and distribution business in Thailand and internationally. It operates through Oil Refinery, Lube Base Oil Refinery, Petrochemical, Power Generation, Marine Transportation Services, Solvent, Ethanol, and Other segments. The company produces gasoline, diesel/gas oil, jet fuel, kerosene, fuel oil, and liquefied petroleum gas; and petrochemical products, such as paraxylene, benzene, toluene, and mixed xylenes. It also produces and distributes lube base oil, bitumen/asphalt, and other by-products, as well as special products, such as treated distillate aromatics extract and slack wax; and hydrocarbon and chemical solvents, and other chemicals. In addition, the company operates natural gas-fired combined-cycle co-generation power plants that generate and sell electricity, steam, and utilities to industrial users, as well as invests in other power generating companies and related business. Further, it is involved in the marine transportation of petroleum and petrochemical products; production of ethanol; and provision of crew boat services. Additionally, the company offers human resource management services; and manufactures and sells linear alkyl benzene and related products. Thai Oil Public Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TOPP-R.BK.summary: Thai O.P.P. Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic films, stickers, laminate tubes, and packaging products in Thailand. The company offers plastic films, such as POF shrink films, skin vacuum films, cast polypropylene (CPP) films, metallized films, stretch films, blown linear low density polypropylene films, CPP breathable films, films for lamination, and protection films, as well as oriented polypropylene heat sealable films. It also provides CPP peels for PP cups, such as jelly, pudding, and fruit dessert cups; and cooked rice cups, in-cup drinks, juice cups, and sterilized products, as well as for frozen food packaging, individually packaged products, and microwaveable food products. In addition, the company offers manual, semi-automatic, and automatic shrink wrapping machines for products of various shapes and sizes. Its products are used in food, cosmetic, medical product, and other consumer goods and industrial packaging industries. Thai O.P.P. Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPA-R.BK.long_name: Thai Poly Acrylic Public Company Limited
TPA-R.BK.summary: Thai Poly Acrylic Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of acrylic, acrylonitrile butadiene styrene, high impact polystyrene, and other extruded plastic sheets in Thailand and internationally. The company offers general purpose, sanitary ware, impact modified, magic color, and LED block acrylic sheets, as well as light management solutions and acrylic diffusion products. It also provides extruded products, including ABS/HI.PS sheets, HD & LDPE.Net, PMMA and PS pattern, and PVC boards, as well as polypropylene profiles/boards/corrugated sheets under the ComPlas, MODEN PLAS, MAGIC COLOR, MODEN GLAS, and SuperGlas brands. Thai Poly Acrylic Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Sam Phran, Thailand.

TPAC-R.BK.summary: Thai Plaspac Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic packaging products in Thailand, India, and the United Arab Emirates. Its products include rigid plastic packaging materials, containers, plastic-wares, and others. The company serves food and beverage, pharmaceutical, homecare, personal care, and instrument sectors. Thai Plaspac Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPAC.BK.summary: Thai Plaspac Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic packaging products in Thailand, India, and the United Arab Emirates. Its products include rigid plastic packaging materials, containers, plastic-wares, and others. The company serves food and beverage, pharmaceutical, homecare, personal care, and instrument sectors. Thai Plaspac Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPBI-R.BK.summary: TPBI Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes plastic bags and other types of packaging products in Thailand. It offers plastic bags, such as loop and tape handle, flat and satchel, block and bottom, die cut, SOS, and fashion bags; woven, jute, and hybrid bags; piping bags for the use in whipping up pastries, cake, and other confectioneries; vest carrier/T-shirt bags, bio-compostable bags, and fruits and vegetables bags that are used in trade, supermarket, and convenient stores; garbage bags for garbage handling in trade, supermarket, and convenient stores; and LDPE zipper/food storage bags that are used in food protection, moisture, reusable, and resealable for food items. The company also manufactures multilayer blown films, including barrier films, which are used as a packaging for fresh food; lamination films for using in flexible packaging for food products; and stretch hoods and shrink films. In addition, it offers flexible packaging for frozen food, ready-to-eat food, and others in various package types; and mailing and reusable bags. Further, the company provides services for molding, cutting, and film-blowing for plastic bags; produces machines for plastic bags production; produces and distributes paper cups and bowls; and trades in paper and plastic packaging products. Additionally, it offers hygiene products, such as disposable masks, alcohol sprays, hand sanitizers, infrared forehead thermometers, and isolation medical waste bags; digital printing services; and plastic pellet compounds for production of various plastic products. TPBI Public Company Limited also exports its products to Australia, the United Kingdom, the United States, Japan, Singapore, Myanmar, Vietnam, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Thai Plastic Bags Industries Co., Ltd. TPBI Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

TPCH-R.BK.long_name: TPC Power Holding Public Company Limited
TPCH-R.BK.summary: TPC Power Holding Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, generates and distributes renewable electricity in Thailand. It primarily generates electricity from biomass. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. TPC Power Holding Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thai Polycons Public Company Limited.

TPCH.BK.long_name: TPC Power Holding Public Company Limited

TPCORP-R.BK.summary: Textile Prestige Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells non-woven fabric products used in automotive industry and other industries in Thailand. It offers non-woven fabrics for headlining interiors, truck liners, and seat back interiors; air cabin filters; sun shades made from polyester fabrics; pocket nets for seat backs; handle adjust reclining release for car seats; and rigid tapes. The company also provides health care products, including face mask, back support products, wrist and ankle support products, and caps and gowns; filters for air conditioners; high tenacity belts for the boat sail industry; seat and net bags for aircraft interiors; glue and lining fabrics; sponge shoulders pads and shapes, breasts, and fabric laminates; sport shirts; and blankets, pillow products, cloth napkins, bolsters, cushions, baby bedding sets, and cloth diapers. In addition, it is involved in the hire of works. Textile Prestige Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPCORP.BK.summary: Textile Prestige Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells non-woven fabric products used in automotive industry and other industries in Thailand. The company also provides health care products, including face mask, back support products, wrist and ankle support products, and caps and gowns; filters for air conditioners; high tenacity belts for the boat sail industry; seat and net bags for aircraft interiors; glue and lining fabrics; sponge shoulders pads and shapes, breasts, and fabric laminates; sport shirts; and blankets, pillow products, cloth napkins, bolsters, cushions, baby bedding sets, and cloth diapers. In addition, it is involved in the hire of works. Textile Prestige Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPIG.F.summary: IRPC Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides petroleum and petrochemical products in Thailand, Singapore, and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum Products, Petrochemical Products, and Other Business segments. Its petroleum products include refined oil comprising liquefied petroleum gas, naphtha, gasoline, diesel, and fuel oil; and lube base oil and asphalt. The company's petrochemical products comprise olefins, such as ethylene, propylene, and butadiene; aromatics comprising benzene, toluene, and xylene; polymers consisting of high-density polyethylene, polypropylene, acrylonitrile-butadiene-styrene, acrylonitrile styrene, polystyrene, and expandable polystyrene; and polyols. It also provides electricity, steam, and infrastructure, including wastewater treatment and other related services; wastewater treatment for industrial customers; port and tank services; and other business services. In addition, the company also offers tugboats, pilots, service boats, mooring, freshwater, bunkers, nautical charts, cranes, hopper cars, weighing, cargo yards, and warehouse services; and tank storage services, as well as operates liquid and chemical, and bulk and container terminals. Further, it offers asset management services in Rayong and other provinces; and various support services, as well as engages in the power plant, jetty, and other utilities operations. Additionally, the company manufactures and distributes plastic resins, as well as chemical products for polyurethanes; operates vocational schools; distributes petrochemical products; and provision of oil vessel renting services. The company was formerly known as Thai Petrochemical Industry Public Company Limited and changed its name to IRPC Public Company Limited in October 2006. IRPC Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

TPIPL-R.BK.summary: TPI Polene Public Company Limited engages in the cement, construction materials, and plastic businesses in Thailand, China, Bangladesh, and internationally. It operates through four segments: Construction Materials, Petrochemical & Chemicals, Energy & Utilities, and Agriculture. The company manufactures and distributes cement products comprising Portland, mixed, masonry, hydraulic, and oil well cement; organic fertilizers for aquatic, livestock, and plants; and fiber cement roof tiles, wood replacements, fiber cement boards, digital boards, and fiber cement accessories. It also offers concrete roof tiles, floor and wall concrete tiles, and concrete roof tile accessories; masonry, plastering, floor screed, DIY, specific purpose, and dry concrete mortars; and soaps, including hand and body wash, oil removal, and cleaning detergents. In addition, the company provides clear coat, interior and exterior, wall, water proof, floor, and artistic paints; low density polyethylene and ethylene vinyl acetate copolymer resins; and ready mixed concrete. Further, it offers tile grout, block, and drinking water products; and manufactures and distributes electricity, refuse derived fuel, organics waste, melt sheets, nitric acids, and ammonium nitrate. Additionally, the company engages in retailing, petroleum exploration, property development, export and import, and construction businesses. TPI Polene Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPIPP-R.BK.long_name: TPI Polene Power Public Company Limited
TPIPP-R.BK.summary: TPI Polene Power Public Company Limited produces and distributes electricity in Thailand. It operates through Energy & Utilities and Petrol and Gas Stations segments. The company operates refuse derived fuel fired, coal-fired, waste-to-energy, and waste-heat recovery power plants. It sells its electricity to the electricity generating authority of Thailand. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 8 power plants with a total installed power generation capacity of 440 megawatt, as well as 8 petrol stations, 3 petrol and gas stations, and a gas station under the TPIPP brand. It also manufactures and distributes organics waste. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. TPI Polene Power Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of TPI Polene Public Company Limited.

TPLAS-R.BK.summary: Thai Plastic Industrial (1994) Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic bags and food wrapping films in Thailand. Its products include polypropylene, high-density polyetehylene, and T-shirt high density polyethylene bags, as well as side gusseted products and PVC cling films. Thai Plastic Industrial (1994) markets its products under the Makrook brand. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

TPOLY-R.BK.summary: Thai Polycons Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand. It undertakes construction of building, commercial building, power plant, infrastructure, hospital, and residential building projects. The company also engages in the property development activities; trading business; and production and trading of electricity. In addition, it invests in energy business. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPP-R.BK.summary: Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes box packaging products in Thailand. The company offers corrugated boxed and white paper printed products in offset designs for various segments, including automotive, electric, medical appliance, food and beverage, houseware, fast-moving consumer, toy, and miscellaneous. Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

TPRIME.BK.long_name: Thailand Prime Property Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
TPRIME.BK.summary: Thailand Prime Property Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is a real estate investment trust externally managed by SCCP REIT Company Limited. The firm invest in leasehold rights over the Mercury Tower Project and acquiring at least 99.99 per cent. of shares of Exchange Tower Co.,Ltd which owns the Exchange Tower Project. Thailand Prime Property Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPS-R.BK.long_name: The Practical Solution Public Company Limited
TPS-R.BK.summary: The Practical Solution Public Company Limited provides solutions for network computing and e-business. It engages in the distribution and installation of computer network systems, fully integrated communication systems, wireless communication systems, network security systems, and data center solutions and management systems. The company also offers consultancy services, such as LAN/WAN infrastructure, intranet/Internet, security system, IP telephony, network management system, design and best practice recommendation, network troubleshooting, and network equipment assessment. In addition, it provides network system management and maintenance services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
