TPY1.F.summary: Tipco Asphalt Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes asphalt and petroleum products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers asphalt cement, cutback asphalt, asphalt emulsions, modified asphalt emulsion, and premium grade asphalt products; special products, including premixes, joint sealers, joint primers, jet fuel resistant joint sealants, and binders for tropical bridges; and industrial lubricants. It also engages in shipping management and agency, and marine transportation activities. The company owns and operates 7 ocean-going vessels; and delivers its products through its own fleet of 300 asphalt-carrying trucks. Tipco Asphalt Public Company Limited was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TQM-R.BK.summary: TQM Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the insurance brokerage business in Thailand. The company offers life and non-life insurance products. It also provides procurement and consulting services for computer software and services. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. TQM Corporation Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Eternal Growth Corporation Company Limited.

TQM.BK.summary: TQM Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the insurance brokerage business in Thailand. The company offers life and non-life insurance products. It also provides procurement and consulting services for computer software and services. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. TQM Corporation Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Eternal Growth Corporation Company Limited.

TR-R.BK.summary: Thai Rayon Public Company Limited manufactures and sells viscose rayon staple fiber and anhydrous sodium sulphate products in Thailand. It offers viscose rayon staple fiber that is used in textile and non-woven applications under the Birla Cellulose brand name; and anhydrous sodium sulphate for use in detergent, pulp, glass, leather, and textile industries, as well as manufactures and sells pulp. The company also exports its products. Thai Rayon Public Company Limited was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRC-R.BK.summary: TRC Construction Public Company Limited provides construction services in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Pipeline System Construction, Engineering System, Civil Work Construction, and Sales and Other Services. It primarily provides engineering design, procurement, construction, and construction management services. The company also engages in pipeline system construction, engineering system installation, and factory construction in energy and petrochemical industries, as well as project development and investment business in real estate, power plant, and petrochemical sectors. In addition, it constructs roads, water systems, bridge, wastewater treatment system, dam, water distribution system, and railway, water supply, and airport facilities, as well as other infrastructure; underground electrical conduits, including boring and pipe jacking work; and produces and distributes tap water. TRC Construction Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRITN-R.BK.summary: Triton Holding Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the construction and engineering business in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Constructions Business, and Electricity and Energy Business. It constructs non-residential buildings; and provides land and building rental services. The company also engages in the mining and construction material supply; electricity generation from solar, wind, hydro, biogas, and waste; waste management; sale of radio taps and radio compact discs; and alternative energy resource and mining businesses. In addition, it is involved in provision of directional drilling contract business, which performs works of oil, water, sewer, and gas pipelines, as well as fiber optic cables; management of real estate; film production and distribution; showcasing; radio business; and production of TV programs for pay TV businesses. The company was formerly known as Live Incorporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to Triton Holding Public Company Limited in October 2015. Triton Holding Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRITN.BK.summary: Triton Holding Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the construction and engineering business in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Constructions Business, and Electricity and Energy Business. It constructs non-residential buildings; and provides land and building rental services. The company also engages in the mining and construction material supply; electricity generation from solar, wind, hydro, biogas, and waste; waste management; sale of radio taps and radio compact discs; and alternative energy resource and mining businesses. In addition, it is involved in provision of directional drilling contract business, which performs works of oil, water, sewer, and gas pipelines, as well as fiber optic cables; management of real estate; film production and distribution; showcasing; radio business; and production of TV programs for pay TV businesses. The company was formerly known as Live Incorporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to Triton Holding Public Company Limited in October 2015. Triton Holding Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRT-R.BK.summary: Tirathai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, repairs, sells, and maintains transformer equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company offers power transformers for manufacturers and suppliers of electrical energy. It also provides various distribution transformers comprising freely breathing system, completely filled, gas cushion, inert gas pressure system, loop feed or radial feed, and power unit load center transformers. In addition, the company offers special transformers, such as rectifier transformers, which are used in chemical industrial factories; induction furnace transformers that are used in metals smelting industry; and transformers using other insulators, such as silicone oil, etc. Further, it provides transformer tank body and accessories, including covers, fins, clamps, etc.; and distributes, installs, and maintains electrical power equipment. Additionally, the company offers transformer erection and installation, oil filling, maintenance, modification and repair, testing, and equipment rental services; and custom metalwork services. Tirathai Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

TRT.BK.summary: Tirathai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, repairs, sells, and maintains transformer equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company offers power transformers for manufacturers and suppliers of electrical energy. It also provides various distribution transformers comprising freely breathing system, completely filled, gas cushion, inert gas pressure system, loop feed or radial feed, and power unit load center transformers. In addition, the company offers special transformers, such as rectifier transformers, which are used in chemical industrial factories; induction furnace transformers that are used in metals smelting industry; and transformers using other insulators, such as silicone oil, etc. Further, it provides transformer tank body and accessories, including covers, fins, clamps, etc.; and distributes, installs, and maintains electrical power equipment. Additionally, the company offers transformer erection and installation, oil filling, maintenance, modification and repair, testing, and equipment rental services; and custom metalwork services. Tirathai Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

TRU-R.BK.short_name: THAI RUNG UNION CAR PUBLIC COMP
TRU-R.BK.long_name: Thai Rung Union Car Public Company Limited
TRU-R.BK.summary: Thai Rung Union Car Public Company Limited engages in the car assembly and modification, and the manufacture and distribution of parts and molds primarily in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Car Assembly and Other Related Car Services; Manufacture of Equipment for Production of Car Accessories; and Sales of Cars, and Car Service Centre Business. It offers tooling products, including dies and molds, and assembly jigs and checking fixtures; auto parts, such as metal stamping and plastic parts; and seats and interior trim products for various motor vehicles. The company also provides contract assembly and sub-assembly services for vehicles, cargo boxes, excavator cabs, etc.; and vehicle modification and painting services. In addition, it is involved in the sale of cars, car accessories, and spare parts; and manufacture of vehicle body parts. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRUBB-R.BK.long_name: Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited
TRUBB-R.BK.summary: Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited manufactures and sells rubber and latex products in Thailand, the People's Republic of China, the Republic of Korea, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Concentrated and Prevulcanized Latex; Latex Products; and Rubber Plantation. The company produces and distributes products from natural rubber, rubber threads, and foam latex mattresses and pillows. It also trades in products from natural rubber. The company was formerly known as Thai Rubber Latex Corporation (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited in July 2019. Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

TRUE-R.BK.summary: True Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the telecommunications and diversified communications industries in Thailand. The company operates through TrueMove H, TrueOnline, and TrueVisions segments. It offers telephone, mobile, broadband Internet, Wi-Fi, and television and digital platforms. The company is also involved in entertainment, mobile equipment lessor, program production, non-government telecommunication, artist management and related, and marketing management activities. In addition, it operates news channel; and provides business solutions, online digital media services on website and telecommunication devices, distribution center services, consultancy and management services related to logistics, advertising sale and agency services, wireless telecommunication services, football club and related activities management services. Further, the company operates as a content provider; produces and distributes movie films; designs, develops, produces, and sells software products; and offers hospitality technology, as well as business process outsourcing services in technical service, marketing, and customer relations. The company was formerly known as TelecomAsia Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to True Corporation Public Company Limited in April 2004. True Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TSC-R.BK.long_name: Thai Steel Cable Public Company Limited
TSC-R.BK.summary: Thai Steel Cable Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes automobile and motorcycle control cables, and automobile window regulators in Thailand. Its products include accelerator, door lock, fuel lid opener, hood release, key inter lock, parking brake, seat belt, transmission, manual parking release, trunk opener, and engine start cables; and motorcycle products comprise brake, clutch, seat lock, speed meter, tachometer, and throttle cables. The company serves automobile and motorcycle manufacturers, and spare parts centers. It also exports its products. Thai Steel Cable Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

TSE-R.BK.long_name: Thai Solar Energy Public Company Limited
TSE-R.BK.summary: Thai Solar Energy Public Company Limited generates and distributes electricity from solar and biomass power plants to government and private sector in Thailand, Japan, and internationally. It also leases land, as well as provides maintenance service for power plants. The company was formerly known as Siam Solar Energy Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Thai Solar Energy Public Company Limited in 2009. Thai Solar Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TSI-R.BK.long_name: The Thai Setakij Insurance Public Company Limited
TSI-R.BK.summary: The Thai Setakij Insurance Public Company Limited engages in the non-life insurance business in Thailand. It offers fire, property risk, marine and transportation, motor cargo, and engineering insurance, as well as miscellaneous insurance products. The company also provides car, accident, travel, and home and condo insurance products. It serves to individual and corporate customers. The company was founded in 1942 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TSR-R.BK.summary: Thiensurat Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes water purifiers in Thailand. It also distributes air conditioners, water filters jugs, electric appliances, and other equipment, as well as offers personal and auto title loans. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

TSTE-R.BK.long_name: Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited
TSTE-R.BK.summary: Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides transfer and transportation services for sugar and various agricultural products in Thailand. The company is also involved in the land rental; land trading; land lots appropriation; and office and commercial units rental activities, as well as in the construction of buildings on land for sale. In addition, it engages in the production and distribution of wheat flour; warehousing and loading of goods; property, silo, and warehouse rental activities; extraction of palm oil; and production of packing, polypropylene bag, plastic fiber, plastic resin, and plastic products, as well as provision of port and cargo ship goods transfer services. The company was formerly known as The Thai Sugar Terminal Corporation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited in 1994. Thai Sugar Terminal Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

TSTH-R.BK.summary: Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and trades in steel bars, wire rods, and small section products primarily in Thailand. The company offers reinforcing bars (rebar); low and high carbon wire rods; carbon wire rod for cold heading; wire rod for welding electrode; small section structural steel, consisting of angle and channel steel; carbon steel round bars; and cut and bend rebar. The company also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Millennium Steel Public Company Limited and changed its name to Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited in December 2006. Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of T S Global Holdings Pte. Ltd.

TTA-R.BK.long_name: Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited
TTA-R.BK.summary: Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a shipping service company in Thailand and internationally. It operates through four segments: Shipping, Offshore Service, Agrochemical, and Investment. The company offers dry bulk shipping services that carry iron ores, coal, grains, cements, fertilizers, and steel and forest products; ship agency and ship brokerage services; and operates dry bulk vessels for tramp services. It also provides offshore services to the oil and gas industry; and produces and markets NPK compounds, bulk blending products, and fertilizers under the Stork brand for customers' needs for coffee, rice, rubber, vegetables, and various other crops. In addition, the company owns and operates Phu My port in South Vietnam; and provides ship supplies and logistics services, including supply of ship stores, cargo dunnage materials, cargo lashing and securing equipment, cargo handling equipment, tally and checker services, forklift rental/services, and warehouses and storage spaces for rental, as well as material procurement, management, and distribution services. Further, it offers cargo loading and unloading, cargo handling, and transportation services; owns and operates a fleet of nine petroleum tankers/barges and one liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) tanker; transporting fuel, such as petroleum, ethanol, and LPG products to various ports/depots; provides water and coal supply chain management services, as well as pipeline installation and repair services; produces and distributes canned food and fruit beverage; and operates and franchises Pizza Hut and Taco Bell restaurants. Additionally, the company trades in wood pellets and fertilizers; acts as a ship agent; provides property management and drilling services; road transportation services; produces and sells treated water; and engages in the lifestyle and entertainment businesses. The company was founded in 1904 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TTAPY.summary: TTW Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells treated water in Thailand. The company supplies water to the Provincial Waterworks Authority in the Amphur Nakorn Chaisri, Amphur Sam Pran, and Amphur Budha Monthon areas of Nakhon Pathom; and Amphur Muang and Amphur Kratumban areas of Samut Sakhon under the water purchase agreement. It is also involved in the management of water production and distribution systems, and waste water treatment systems; and operation and maintenance of water supply project. The company was formerly known as Thai Tap Water Supply Public Company Limited and changed its name to TTW Public Company Limited in April 2014. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

TTCL-R.BK.summary: TTCL Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, procures, and constructs integrated industrial factories in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Energy Business and Construction Business. It offers engineering design services for civil structures and utility systems, such as electricity, water, air conditioning, solid and wastewater treatment systems, storage tanks, production processes, and petrochemical and chemical plants, as well as procurement of machinery and equipment, and plant construction. The company also generates and sells electricity to the government through gas-fired power plants and solar power plants, as well as invests and develops renewable energy power plants and invests in energy business. In addition, TTCL Public Company Limited offers conceptual study, pre-feasibility study, and detailed feasibility study services. The company was formerly known as Toyo-Thai Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to TTCL Public Company Limited in April 2015. TTCL Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TTI-R.BK.summary: Thai Textile Industry Public Company Limited engages in manufacturing, spinning, and distributing yarns, apparels, and fabrics in Thailand. It also exports its products. The company is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

TTT-R.BK.summary: Toray Textiles (Thailand) Public Company Limited, a textile company, manufactures and markets various fabric products in Thailand. It provides T/R fabrics, spun T/C fabrics, filament fabrics, denim yarns, knitted fabrics, cords, airbag fabrics, and other yarns. The company also distributes its products in the United States, Canada, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and Asia. Toray Textiles (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Toray Textiles (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Toray Industries, Inc.

TU-R.BK.long_name: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited
TU-R.BK.summary: Thai Union Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells frozen, chilled, and canned seafood in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Ambient Seafood; Frozen and Chilled Seafood and Related Businesses; and Pet food, Value-Added and Other Businesses. It offers ambient seafood products, including tuna, sardines, salmon, mackerel, and herring for retail and wholesale customers; frozen and chilled seafood, such as shrimp, lobster, and crab directly to restaurants, hotels, and caterers; ready-to-cook or ready-to-serve products, as well as bakery treats; marine ingredients; and pet care products comprising surimi-based fish snacks, canned cod liver, and wet seafood-based cat and dog foods. The company provides its products under the Chicken of the Sea, Genova, John West, Petit Navire, Parmentier, King Oscar, Mareblu, RÃ¼gen Fisch, Sealect, Fisho, QFresh, Monori, Bellotta, and Marvo brands. It also imports and sells shrimp and other frozen seafood products to restaurant chains, retailers, and wholesalers, as well as exports canned seafood, tuna, canned sardines, and mackerel; manufactures and distributes smoked and chilled salmon, animal feed, and aquatic animals; rents properties; refines tuna oil; and provides logistic, training and management, e-commerce, printing manufacturing, technical, food products packaging, and business strategy and investment consulting services. The company was formerly known as Thai Union Frozen Products Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Union Group Public Company Limited in September 2015. Thai Union Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

TUUF.F.summary: Solartron Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, sells, and installs solar-cell systems and related equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Selling and Installation of Solar-Cell Systems, Distribution SolarÂCell, Sale of Electricity, Hire of Work, and Other segments. It also constructs solar power plants; and produces and distributes electricity from solar energy. Solartron Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TVD-R.BK.summary: TV Direct Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, sells goods and services through various marketing channels. It sells health and beauty products, household products, kitchen utensils, exercise products, and fashion products through the satellite and digital television, cable TV, outdoor call centers, printed media, websites, and mobile applications, as well as retail distribution through TVD shop. The company also produces and sells TV programs, and sells airtime for advertising, as well as offers data center, and life insurance brokerage and other services. As of June 30, 2020, it operated 69 distribution centers in Bangkok and other provinces. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TVO-R.BK.summary: Thai Vegetable Oil Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes soy meal and soybean oil in primarily in Thailand. In addition, it manufactures and distributes packaging products; and distributes consumer products. Thai Vegetable Oil Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TWP-R.BK.long_name: Thai Wire Products Public Company Limited
TWP-R.BK.summary: Thai Wire Products Public Company Limited engages in the manufacturing and sale of prestessed concrete wires in Thailand and internationally. Its products include steel wires and strands for prestressed concrete, galvanized steel wires and strands, cold drawn steel wires for concrete reinforcement, hard drawn steel wires, and ordinary low carbon steel wires. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

TWPC-R.BK.summary: Thai Wah Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes starch and other agricultural products in Thailand, Vietnam, Cambodia, and China. Its products include tapioca starch, which is used in the food industry, such as seasoning powder and sweetener products, as well as in other industries, such as paper and textile; tapioca pearl that is used in cooking savory dishes and desserts; alpha starch, which is used in the aquatic animal feed, mosquito repellent, and metal casting industries; and glucose and candy products. The company also provides vermicelli, bean vermicelli, rice vermicelli, rice flour, roselle flower, pandanus leaf, and other products. In addition, it is also involved in land holding activities; and generation and sale of electricity; and wholesale trading of tapioca starch products, rice flour products, and other starch-related products. Thai Wah Public Company Limited was founded in 1947 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TWZ-R.BK.summary: TWZ Corporation Public Company Limited primarily engages in communication equipment trading business in Thailand. It operates through Communication Equipment Trading, Real Estate Development, Generate and Selling Electricity Plasma, and Investment Property segments. The company distributes mobile phones, spare parts, SIM and pre-paid cards, and related accessories; and operates as a service center of telecommunication equipment. It also provides counter services for payment of service fee of mobile phones; develops and rents real estate projects; and generates and sells electricity through renewable energy. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

It also provides spheroidized annealing wires, bolts, and thread rods; and engages in trading activities. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Rayong, Thailand. Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Tycoons Group International Co., Ltd.

TYCN.BK.long_name: Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited
TYCN.BK.summary: Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and exports steel wire rods, steel annealing wires, reinforced concrete bars, steel screws, and wire products in Thailand. It also provides spheroidized annealing wires, bolts, and thread rods; and engages in trading activities. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Rayong, Thailand. Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Tycoons Group International Co., Ltd.

U-R.BK.summary: U City Public Company Limited operates as a diversified real estate investment and development company in Thailand and internationally. The company operates in three segments: Hotel Business; Rental and Management Business; and Real Estate for Sale Business. It develops, rents, and sells real estate properties; leases land and structures; invests in securities; and manages and operates golf course and sports club, as well as manages and operates hotels; owns property; and engages in the office rental business. The company was formerly known as Natural Park Public Company Limited and changed its name to U City Public Company Limited in April 2015. U City Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UAC-R.BK.summary: UAC Global Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, imports and distributes various chemicals and equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company provides consulting and advising services for the marketing of products and services; and feasibility study of various projects or works related to energy, refinery, and petrochemical industries, as well as plants and other utilities. It also produces and distributes biogas that are used in power generation, transportation, and various other industries; and produces and distributes petroleum products, including compressed natural gas, liquefied petroleum gas, and natural gas liquids. In addition, the company generates and distributes electricity, alternative energy, and fuel briquette; produces and distributes tap water and related equipment; and manufactures and distributes chemical products for the general industry. Its products are used in various industries, such as off-shore natural gas exploration and production, oil refinery and upstream petrochemicals, engine oil lubricant manufacturing plants, polymer and plastic manufacturing plants, chemical industrial plants, power plants, and other utilities systems, as well as textile, paper, and construction industrial systems. The company was formerly known as Universal Adsorbents & Chemicals Public Company Limited and changed its name to UAC Global Public Company Limited in April 2014. UAC Global Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UBIS-R.BK.summary: Ubis (Asia) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes sealing compounds, lacquers, varnishes, and coatings used in can production and bottle closure for the food, beverage, and general industries in Thailand and internationally. It serves can manufacturers producing food cans, beverage cans, aerosol cans, and other general cans. Ubis (Asia) Public Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UEC-R.BK.summary: Unimit Engineering Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, shop fabrication, field installation, and erection of steel products and construction works in Thailand and internationally. It offers pressure vessels, including cryogenic/ISO tanks, columns/towers, shell and tube heat exchangers, spherical tanks, and vessels/drums, as well as LPG tanks comprising LPG aboveground and underground tanks, and transport/wagon tanks; and machinery parts, such as fan casings/pre heaters, water treatment parts, furnace casings, diverters, stacks/chimneys, and other products. The company also provides storage tanks, including API storage tanks and silo/hopper products; steel structures, piping shop fabrication products, and platforms/ladders; and mechanical installation services, such as piping and equipment installations, module works, and shut down/modification work services. Unimit Engineering Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Phrapradaeng, Thailand.

UKEM-R.BK.summary: Union Petrochemical Public Company Limited imports and distributes chemical products in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Commodity Chemicals, Specialty Chemicals, and Others. It is also involved in the distribution of plastic pellets, lubricants, and computer equipment; provision of computer system services; and sale of oil-refinery and power plant equipment. In addition, the company sells pharmaceutical and medical products, fragrances and skin-care cosmetics, and supplements. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UMI-R.BK.long_name: The Union Mosaic Industry Public Company Limited
UMI-R.BK.summary: The Union Mosaic Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes floor and wall tiles in Thailand and internationally. It operates through two segments, Import Floor Tiles and Wall Tiles, Export Floor Tiles and Wall Tiles. The company's products include floor, wall, mosaic, and porcelain tiles. It is also involved in the sale of mineral and soil, real estate, and ceramic agent activities. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UMS-R.BK.long_name: Unique Mining Services Public Company Limited
UMS-R.BK.summary: Unique Mining Services Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, imports and sells coal in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Sales of Coal and Transport. It engages in the provision of port services and transportation by barge conveyance. The company is also involved in the logistics management and trading of fertilizers; and road transportation and trading of wood pellets. It serves medium and small sized industries, such as food and beverage, pulp and paper, and textile industries. The company also focuses on generating and distributing electricity from other renewable energy, such as wind power, biomass, solar energy, and others. Unique Mining Services Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Unique Mining Services Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Athene Holdings Ltd.

UNIQ-R.BK.long_name: Unique Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited
UNIQ-R.BK.summary: Unique Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction contracting and real estate development businesses in Thailand. Its projects include steel bridges, reinforced concrete bridges, tunnel beneath the intersections, concrete-surfaced or asphaltic concrete roads, public utility works, structural works, building works, dam and retaining walls, etc. The company also leases service machinery; manufactures construction materials; sells sand; produces concrete ready mix and precast concrete; and offers steel fabrication, assembly and survey, and repair and maintenance services for machinery and equipment. In addition, it is involved in the service of infrastructure and systems. The company primarily serves government agencies. Unique Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

UNZ.SG.summary: Univentures Public Company Limited engages in the property development business in Thailand. It develops and sells condominiums, as well as rents office buildings. The company also manufactures and sells zinc oxide and chemicals; and provides time recorders, parking control equipment, and electronics equipment. In addition, it offers finance and investment consulting services; investment and management consulting; and other related services. Further, the company operates as a manager of trusts for real estate investments; and invests in energy services, hotel, and other companies. Additionally, it acts as a broker and agent in real estate-related business; and offers corporate registration services. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Univentures Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Adelfos Company Limited.

UOBKH-R.BK.long_name: UOB Kay Hian Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited
UOBKH-R.BK.summary: UOB Kay Hian Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the securities brokerage and derivatives business in Thailand. The company operates in three segments: Securities and Derivatives Business, Financial Advisory Business, and Investing Business. It offers online trading, broker-assisted trading, asset management, debt instrument, securities underwriting, investment advisory, and derivatives trading services. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. UOB Kay Hian Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of UOB-Kay Hian Holdings Limited.

UP-R.BK.summary: Union Plastic Public Company Limited manufactures and sells thermoplastics in Thailand. The company offers various plastic parts, including automotive parts, electrical appliances, household products, and vacuum bottles; and molds comprising automotive parts, electrical appliances, sanitary wares, and others. It also provides contract manufacturing and repair services for molds; and technical support services, including design assistance, material selection, and packaging concepts. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UPA-R.BK.summary: United Power of Asia Public Company Limited engages in the electricity generation and property development activities in Thailand. The company was formerly known as CyberPlanet Interactive Public Company Limited and changed its name to United Power of Asia Public Company Limited in May 2015. United Power of Asia Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UPF-R.BK.summary: Union Pioneer Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes finished elastic products in Thailand, the United States, and internationally. The company offers rubber tapes for use in swimwear, sportwear, active wear, underwear, and innerwear; rim of pants' legs for gentlemen; medical and health care products; and furniture industry. It also provides rubber threads for use in the rims of baby and adult diaper's legs and waist; the rims of legs for gentlemen; swimming suits; and the rims of shower cap and swimming caps, as well as exercise bands. In addition, the company offers elastic braids for consumer and industrial textile applications; and elastic webbing and covering yarn products that are used as components of the underwear for gentlemen and ladies, general clothes for children and adults, warming suits, sportswear, healthy products using elastic, and tapes for flasks and bags. Further, it provides medical devices, such as Esmark and elastic bandages, as well as tourniquet for disposable or single use; and FITbands for exercise. The company offers its products under the VENUS brand name. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Union Pioneer Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Saha-Union Public Company Limited.

UPOIC-R.BK.summary: United Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and sells crude palm oil and palm kernel oil in Thailand. The company operates in two segments: Oil Palm Plantation, Crude Palm Oil, and Crude Palm Kernel Oil Processing; and Generation of Electricity from Biogases and Biomasses. It also holds concessions to use forest reserve land. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. UREKA-R.BK.summary: Eureka Design Public Company Limited designs, manufactures, and sells machinery for the automotive and other industries in Thailand, India, and internationally. It operates in five segments: Design Manufacture and Installation of Semi - Automatic Machine; Design Manufacture and Installation of Automatic Machine; Installation and Maintenance of Machine; Manufacture of Pesticides and Agrochemical Products; and Others. The company offers industrial machines, such as washing, test, tightening, press, assembly, measuring, machining, and marking machines; agricultural machines; and leak test, Skysaver, vacuum lifter, and food machines. It also provides part feeders, auto load equipment, collaborative robots, and industrial robots; stacker cranes, carriers, and shuttles; chillers; robotics for logistics; and CCTV products. In addition, the company is involved in the retail business; sale of equipment and tools; design, production, and sale of machining jigs and parts; manufacture and sale of pesticides and agrochemical products, and water; production of raw water; and manufacture and sale of energy. Eureka Design Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is based in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

It offers greige fabrics made from the blend of cotton and polyester or other synthetic fiber for the production of workwear and cloth used in other industries. Union Textile Industries Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company offers Kraft liner boards and Kraft paper for making corrugating medium papers. United Paper Public Company Limited also exports its products. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UVAN-R.BK.summary: Univanich Palm Oil Public Company Limited engages in the oil palm plantations, palm fruit processing, and oil palm seed and seedling businesses in Thailand. The company produces crude palm oil and crude palm kernel oil, which are ingredients in the manufacture of cooking oils, margarines, snack foods, dairy substitutes, soaps, and cosmetics. It also operates electric power plant with methane capture biogas project. The company also exports its products. Univanich Palm Oil Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Krabi, Thailand.

UWC-R.BK.summary: Ua Withya Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes galvanized steel structures, electricity poles, telecommunication poles, and electricity sub-stations in Thailand. The company also provides galvanizing services; and distributes power transmission equipment. In addition, it is involved in the operation of biomass, solar, and biogas power plants. Further, the company manufactures and sells agricultural products and woodchips, as well as sells industrial products. Ua Withya Public Company Limited was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

VARO-R.BK.summary: Varopakorn Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes semi-finished aluminum products in Thailand, Asia, and Oceania. The company offers a range of products, including automotive and precoated finstocks used for the manufacturing of radiator fins, intercoolers, condensers, and evaporator units in the automotive industry; bare finstocks used to produce screens for heat ventilation in air conditioners; and cap stocks that are used for the fabrication of pilfer-proof caps for energy drinks, electrolyte beverages, liquid medicines, whisky cap, etc. It also provides foils used as raw material in the construction industry; and aluminum sheets and coils, which are used in the manufacturing of various products, such as satellite dishes, traffic signs, plate eyelets, and rolled bonds used in the production of freezers for refrigerators. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

VCOM-R.BK.summary: Vintcom Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in computers and equipment in Thailand. It operates through Sale of Goods and Rendering of Services segments. The company also provides software and related services for computers. In addition, it offers installation, consulting, and computer system maintenance services; and network security monitoring services. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Vintcom Technology Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Vnet Capital Co., Ltd.

VGI-R.BK.summary: VGI Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides integrated offline-to-online solutions for clients in Thailand. It operates through four segments: BTS, Outdoor, Digital Service, and Other. The company engages in the arrangement and provision of advertising services in BTS stations, inside BTS trains, on BTS train bodies, in office buildings, and in department stores. It also rents retail space at BTS stations; invests in securities; and provides electronic payment services for mass transit system and retail stores. In addition, the company offers outdoor advertising media services; electronic money and payment services through various devices or networks, as well as bill payment services; a web portal service under the Rabbit Daily name, which includes websites and articles, as well as web pages space rental services; design and arrangement services of various e-commerce-related activities, including online marketing services; and online insurance price comparison services under the Rabbit Finance name. Further, it provides direct sale services for various types of products through telesales, such as contacting prospective buyers of insurance and following up with existing customers with policies that are close to expiration. Additionally, the company engages in the production and sale of tri-vision equipment, advertising media, and billboards; and provision of advertising services through the supply of tree wall-panel. The company was formerly known as VGI Global Media Public Company Limited and changed its name to VGI Public Company Limited in August 2019. VGI Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. VGI Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Bangkok Mass Transit System Public Company Limited.

The company provides medical services; and room rental and hotel services. In addition, it engages in the beauty business. Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

VIH-R.BK.summary: Srivichaivejvivat Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates hospitals in Thailand. Its medical services include treatment for the various heart disease, such as coronary artery bypass grafting, valvular repair/replacement, and congenital heart disease correction; various health check-up programs; services related to child development; various emergency services; and orthopedic service related to joint pain, hip pain, knee pain, trigger finger, hand pain, elbow or shoulder pain, etc. The company also provides treatment for cardiovascular disease, neurological and brain, allergy, cancer, respiratory diseases and lung, urinary tract and liver, sports injury, woman and occupational disease, digestive disease, and diabetes and endocrine, as well as blood, kidneys, and skin; and general radiography, fluoroscopy, computed tomography scanning services. In addition, it offers occupational therapy, elderly, and pediatric rehabilitation services, as well as rehabilitation services of patients with spinal cord injury, bone and joint, back pain, neck pain, shoulder pain, heart disease, cancer disease, and neuropathy; and services related to diagnosing bone and muscle abnormalities. Further, the company provides gastrointestinal, neurological, plastic, urology, orthopedics, laparoscopic, and cardiac surgery, as well as staple hemorrhoidectomy; treatment for ear, nose, and throat, such as otitis, sinusitis, etc.; hemodialysis procedure that cleans and filters the blood; dialysis services; anti-aging services; treatment for eye diseases; dermatological and dental services; medical treatment with traditional Chinese medicine; maternal and child care services. It also operates a vocational school. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Krathum Baen, Thailand.

VNG-R.BK.summary: Vanachai Group Public Company Limited produces and distributes wood plates, MDF boards, particle boards, and doorskin and melamine on wood plates in Thailand and internationally. The company's products include laminated particleboards and MDF boards, laminated flooring, laminated particleboards, and laminated vaneer. It also manufactures glue and melamine impregnated paper products, and resin, as well as veneer on MDF boards; and generates electricity from biomass. The company was formerly known as MDF Planner Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Vanachai Group Public Company Limited. The company was founded in 1943 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Vanachai Group Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Vanachai Group of Companies Co., Ltd.

VNT-R.BK.summary: Vinythai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes polyvinyl chloride (PVC) and vinyl chloride monomer. It operates through two segments, Vinyl and Biochemical. The company provides PVC resins, such as suspension and paste PVC resins under the Siamvic brand for automotive, building and construction, electrical and electronics, consumer goods, packaging, and healthcare industries; caustic soda; and Epicerol, a bio-based epichlorohydrin for automotive, aerospace, and wind turbine industries. It operates in Thailand, India, South Korea, Vietnam, China, Malaysia, Taiwan, and internationally. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand. Vinythai Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of AGC Inc.

Vinythai Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of AGC Inc.

VPO-R.BK.summary: Vichitbhan Palmoil Public Company Limited produces and distributes crude palm oil and kernel products in Thailand. It offers crude palm oil for palm oil refineries in to be used in the food business, such as the production of biscuits, creamer, and ice cream, as well as for shampoo manufacturing industry and used in the production of fatty acid and methyl ester. The company also provides palm kernel oils and fats, used as ingredients in the production of margarine, bread, cosmetics, and health supplements; raw materials for oleo chemicals industry; and ingredient in animal food. In addition, it offers by products, such as shells, empty bunches, decanter cakes, and palm fiber products. Further, the company is also involved in energy production by using waste water of the palm oil and biogas-powered fuel. Vichitbhan Palmoil Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

VRANDA-R.BK.summary: Veranda Resort Public Company Limited operates hotels and resorts in Thailand. The company operates its facilities under the Veranda Resort and Spa Hua Hin Cha Am, Veranda The High Resort Chiang Mai, Sofitel so Bangkok, Veranda Resort Pattaya, and Rocky's Boutique Resort names. It is also involved in the development and rental of properties; sale of food and beverages; and provision of human resource outsourcing services. Veranda Resort Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

W-R.BK.summary: Wow Factor Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces, imports, exports, and sells electronics spare parts in Thailand, Germany, Hong Kong, China, and internationally. The company is also involved in the rental, sale, and proceeding of advertisements; and provision of printing services for various publications. In addition, it engages in restaurant, bar, coffee shop, and food and beverages operations; and sells food and beverages. The company was formerly known as Electronics Industry Public Company Limited and changed its name to Wow Factor Public Company Limited in May 2020. Wow Factor Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

W8M1.F.summary: RPCG Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the energy and real estate businesses in Thailand. It engages in the sale of equipment, including repair and maintenance services, and construction to petroleum service stations; sale of liquefied petroleum gas through a network of gas station. The company is also involved in the manufacture and distribution of biodiesel and glycerin; and provision of systems management services. In addition, it develops, rents, and sells real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Rayong Purifier Public Company Limited and changed its name to RPCG Public Company Limited in January 2014. RPCG Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WACOAL-R.BK.summary: Thai Wacoal Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells finished garments. The company offers ladies' lingerie under the Wacoal, WIENNA, B'me, Sgarlet, Presea, and CW-X brands; ladies' outerwear under the 5.up, RacÃ©, and WACOAL BLOUSE brands; and children wear under the ENFANT, De bon, Amusant, Little Wacoal, ELLE PETITE, and ELLE POUPON brands. It also exports its products to Japan, the United States, and the ASEAN countries. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WAVE-R.BK.summary: Wave Entertainment Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes television programs in Thailand. The company also operates an institute, which provides English language courses for adult learners under the Wall Street English name; and restaurants under the name of Jeffer Steak & Seafood. In addition, it promotes and organizes concerts and events; sale of food and beverage provides marketing services. The company was formerly known as CVD Entertainment Public Company Limited and changed its name to Wave Entertainment Public Company Limited in April 2009. Wave Entertainment Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

WGE-R.BK.long_name: Well Graded Engineering Public Company Limited
WGE-R.BK.summary: Well Graded Engineering Public Company Limited provides commercial and residential construction services. It also offers after sales service, including warranties and claims, providing technical advice and maintenance to its customer. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

WGE.BK.long_name: Well Graded Engineering Public Company Limited
WGE.BK.summary: Well Graded Engineering Public Company Limited provides commercial and residential construction services. It also offers after sales service, including warranties and claims, providing technical advice and maintenance to its customer. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

WHA-R.BK.summary: WHA Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops, rents, and sells lands, buildings, factories, warehouses, and other properties in Thailand and internationally. It develops and manages properties in industrial estates and industrial zones. The company also provides raw and industrial water; wastewater treatment services; and maintenance services to industrial estate customers, such as power plants, steel mills, and automotive and petrochemical industries. In addition, the company operates power projects; and provides digital services, data center, Internet connection, and other IT services. WHA Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Muang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

WHABT.BK.long_name: WHA Business Complex Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
WHABT.BK.summary: WHA Business Complex Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust specializes in real estate investing.

WHART.BK.long_name: WHA Premium Growth Freehold And Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
WHART.BK.summary: WHA Premium Growth Freehold And Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is a real estate investment trust externally managed by WHA Real Estate Management Company Limited. The firm invests mostly in property or property leasehold rights and generate benefit from such properties including to improve, alter, develop or dispose other assets in which the Trust invest or possess whatsoever lease, sub-lease or sale or other process for the benefit of the property and create the revenue and return to the Trust and the unitholders. WHA Premium Growth Freehold And Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust was formed on December 8, 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

WHAUP-R.BK.long_name: WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited
WHAUP-R.BK.summary: WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited provides integrated utilities products and services in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Water Business, Power Business, and Holding Company. It procures and distributes raw water; produces and distributes industrial water; and provides wastewater treatment services to operators in industrial estates and industrial lands, as well as other consumers. The company also generates and distributes electricity. It operates three power plants with a capacity of 2,588 megawatts (MW) that utilize gas, coal, and water, as well as possesses a total renewable energy capacity of 18.9 MW, which comprises solar and waste to energy. The company was formerly known as Hemaraj Clean Water Company Limited and changed its name to WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited in August 2016. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Samut Prakarn, Thailand. WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of WHA Industrial Development Public Company Limited.

WICE-R.BK.summary: Wice Logistics Public Company Limited provides air and sea freight forwarding, customs brokerage, inland transportation, cross-border and multimodal transportation, warehousing, and various freight related services for imports and exports in Thailand and internationally. It operates through Sea Freight, Air Freight, Cross Border Service, and Logistics segments. The company transports sea freight, including full container load and less than container load services for various forwarders and containers; and offers air freight services. It also provides customs clearance services, including duty intensive consultation; internal transportation services using trailer and dump trucks, lorries, or minivans from pick up point to the port; and warehouse storage services, such as multi user and dedicated warehouses, and warehouse management. The company was formerly known as Wice Freight Services (Thailand) Company Limited and changed its name to Wice Logistics Public Company Limited in April 2015. Wice Logistics Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WIIK-R.BK.summary: WIIK Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes high density polyethylene (HDPE) pipes and related fittings, low density polyethylene pipes, polypropylene pipes, polybutylene pipes, and weholite spiro pipes in Thailand. The company offers polyethylene pipes for potable water and water supply systems, transmission lines, distribution systems, drainages, sewage and storm water systems, and conduits primarily for use in governmental and private sectors; structured wall HDPE pipes that are used in municipal, industrial, road construction, rehabilitation, and marine pipeline applications; and HDPE tanks for water storage. It also provides HDPE pipe welding and installation services; and consultancy, advisory, and servicing of HDPE pipe installation. In addition, the company engages in the water management and distribution business, as well as designs, constructs, and operates water supply systems. Further, it operates tap water production business with ultra-filtration and reverse osmosis systems. The company was formerly known as Wiik & Hoeglund Public Company Limited and changed its name to WIIK Public Company Limited in December 2019. WIIK Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WIN-R.BK.long_name: Wyncoast Industrial Park Public Company Limited
WIN-R.BK.summary: Wyncoast Industrial Park Public Company Limited sells and rents custom duty free zone areas for the commercial and industrial activities worldwide. The company's facilities include customs office at site, logistics solution teams, executive offices, staff accommodations, conference rooms, and food centers. Its total land area is 109,174 square meters with factory and warehouse buildings for rent of 42,754 square meters, depot area of 15,175 square meters, and a three-storey office building of 4,011 square meters. The company also operates as an auto dealer for new, old, and multipurpose cars; and other vehicles, as well as spare parts and accessories. In addition, it produces and distributes electricity from solar energy; produces and distributes water; and operates and manages properties and assets, as well as engages in the construction business. The company was formerly known as Capetronic International (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Wyncoast Industrial Park Public Company Limited in October 2013. Wyncoast Industrial Park Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bang Pakong, Thailand.

WINNER-R.BK.long_name: Winner Group Enterprise Public Company Limited
WINNER-R.BK.summary: Winner Group Enterprise Public Company Limited manufactures, imports, and distributes raw materials, ingredients, food chemicals, and consumer products in Thailand. It offers cocoa butter, liquor, and powder; couverture and compound chocolate; chocolate chips, spreads, and fillings; raisins, cranberries, cashew nuts, almonds, and rolled oats; egg white, egg yolk, and whole egg powders; popcorns, cooking papers, and pumpkin powder; margarine and shortening; seasoning products; glazing powder, maltodextrin, dextrose, aspatame, acesulfame K, and sucralose; potato, wheat, and corn starch; wheat flour and gluten; potato granules; icing, ground, and donut sugar; whipping creams; and bread improvers, yeasts, and baking powders. The company also provides carboxy methyl cellulose, carrageenan, gellan gum, pectin, and xanthan gum; potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate, and phosphate preservatives; powder drinks; baking ingredients; and batter mix, pancake mix, and creamy custard powder. In addition, it offers frozen and chilled products, comprising of fruits and vegetables, French fries, meat and seafood, cheese, and bakery products. The company also offers consumer food products, such as microwave popcorn, granular bars, seasoned laver, pasta, olive oil, fruit jams, juices, etc., as well as semi-processed raw materials and frozen products, gourmet foods and bakeries, and beverages and drinks under the Bel Normande, Betty Crocker, Clos Pons, Campagna, EL Avion, Fruit by the Foot, Golden Pot, Gemez Suki, Harvey Fresh, Ital Lemon, Kimnori, Langers, Le Sang Des Seigneurs, La Espanola, Nature Valley, Ohigya, Old El Paso, Osterberg, Olivia, Pearl River Bridge, Pop Secret, Pons, Romulo, Reggia, Streamline, Sea Friend, Serpis, Teekane, VFOODS, and Yummyto brands. In addition, it manufactures skincare and cosmetic products, makeup, supplementary foods, and pharmaceuticals. Winner Group Enterprise Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WORK-R.BK.summary: Workpoint Entertainment Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, operates as an entertainment company in Thailand. The company engages in the operation of digital television broadcasting stations; production of television programs; production of movies; editing and sound recording; and provision of event organizing and theater management services, as well as animation, computer graphics, concerts and plays, and event marketing businesses. It also produces and distributes merchandise; and trades in goods and renders services. Workpoint Entertainment Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

WP-R.BK.summary: WP Energy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) under the World Gas brand name. The company operates through Sale of LPG and Transportation segments. It distributes LPG cylinder to the LPG gas filling plants, retail gas distributors, and industrial and household users, as well as offers specialized LPG cylinders for forklift trucks. The company also transports oil, gas, and chemical substances; operates gas station; produces and distributes electricity; and leases vehicles. WP Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

WPH-R.BK.long_name: Wattanapat Hospital Trang Public Company Limited
WPH-R.BK.summary: Wattanapat Hospital Trang Public Company Limited owns and operates hospitals and clinics in Thailand. The company offers medical services in the field of medicine; hemodialysis; surgery; gynecology and delivery, and newborn; clinical pediatrics; skin and beauty; dental; physical therapy; dialysis; X-ray; MRI; wellness; and ophthalmology. It serves people through its 120 bed hospital. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Trang, Thailand.

XBLA.F.long_name: Bangkok Life Assurance Public Company Limited
XBLA.F.summary: Bangkok Life Assurance Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides life insurance services to individuals and corporates in Thailand. Its life insurance products include income protection, savings and investments, education, pension, accident plans, total permanent disability, and health and critical illness products. The company also provides general insurance products comprise personal insurance and business all risks insurance products, including fire, motor, burglary, personal accident, accident and personal health, travel accident, cancer, golfer's indemnity, home multicover, medical malpractice liability, bail bond, business interruption, marine, hull, workmen's compensation, money, contractors' plant and equipment, contractors' all risks, erection all risks, boiler and pressure vessel, electronic equipment, industrial all risks, public liability, neon-sign, plate glass fidelity guarantee, group accident and health, group accident, and shop multicover insurance products. In addition, it offers bancassurance products; equity, long term equity, mixed, foreign investment, fixed income, exchange traded, money market, local fixed income, and retirement mutual funds; and home loans, such as Bla home plans. Further, the company provides insurance brokerage services. Bangkok Life Assurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

XO-R.BK.summary: Exotic Food Public Company Limited manufactures, trades, and exports various food products. Its products include dipping and cooking marinate sauces, salad dressing and oils, wok sauce, cooking pastes, cooking essentials, herbs and spices, fruits and vegetables, heat and serve, noodles, stir fry sauces and curry sauce, snacks, and Japanese range of products, as well as seasonings, fruit juices, and canned products. The company offers its products under the Exotic Food, Thai Pride, and Coco-Loto brands. It operates in Europe, North America, and Asia. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

YGG-R.BK.summary: Yggdrazil Group Public Company Limited provides visual effect, animation, and VR studio services. It offers services to produce computer graphics for advertisements, music videos, and movies, as well as to produce animation. The company provides post production and production support services for commercials and feature films, as well as game, cinematic, and TV series; and online editing, color grading, and art and design services. It has operations in Singapore, Thailand, the People's Republic of China, and internationally. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

YTAA.F.long_name: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited
YTAA.F.summary: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes natural rubber products in Thailand, Indonesia, Singapore, the United States, China, Vietnam, and Myanmar. The company operates in four segments: Natural Rubber Products, Engineering Business, Plantation, and Other Businesses. The Natural Rubber Products segment manufactures and sells ribbed smoked sheets, concentrated latex, and block rubbers, as well as powdered and powdered-free latex examination gloves, escalator handrails, rubber-injection-molded goods, and high pressure hydraulic hoses. The Engineering Business segment provides engineering services that include research and development of machinery and production processes, as well as provides information system services. The Plantation segment engages in the plantation activities, such as rubber, palm, and temperate fruits. The Other Businesses segment offers logistic and other services. Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Hat Yai, Thailand.

YUASA-R.BK.summary: Yuasa Battery (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes batteries for automobiles and motorcycles in Thailand. It also offers industrial batteries. The company offers its products under the YUASA brand name, as well as under private brands, such as THUNDERLITE and YUCON. It serves original and replacement equipment markets. The company also exports its products. Yuasa Battery (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Samutprakan, Thailand.

The company offers its products under the YUASA brand name, as well as under private brands, such as THUNDERLITE and YUCON. It serves original and replacement equipment markets. The company also exports its products. Yuasa Battery (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Samutprakan, Thailand.

ZMICO-R.BK.summary: Seamico Capital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the securities business in Thailand. The company offers securities brokerage, securities and derivatives trading, investment advisory, securities underwriting, financial advisory, derivatives agency, online securities trading, securities borrowing and lending, wealth advisory, international market securities trading, and derivative warrants, as well as mutual, private, and provident fund management services. It is also involved in the foreign exchange business. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
